  6562                                  					; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6563 00001FAD 8B451B                  		mov	ax, [di+1Bh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6564 00001FB0 BE[0A17]                		mov	si, disktable2
  6565                                  
  6566                                  scan:					
  6567 00001FB3 2E3B14                  		cmp	dx, [cs:si]
  6568 00001FB6 720D                    		jb	short gotparm
  6569 00001FB8 7706                    		ja	short scan_next
  6570 00001FBA 2E3B4402                		cmp	ax, [cs:si+2]
  6571 00001FBE 7605                    		jbe	short gotparm
  6572                                  
  6573                                  scan_next:				
  6574 00001FC0 83C60A                  		add	si, 10		; 5*2
  6575 00001FC3 EBEE                    		jmp	short scan	; covers upto 512 mb media
  6576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6577                                  
  6578                                  gotparm:				
  6579 00001FC5 8A4C08                  		mov	cl, [si+8]	; fat size for fbigfat flag
  6580                                  		;or	ds:fbigfat, cl
  6581                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6582 00001FC8 080E[D216]              		or	[fbigfat], cl
  6583 00001FCC 2E8B4C04                		mov	cx, [cs:si+4]	; ch = number of sectors per cluster
  6584                                  					; cl = log base	2 of ch
  6585 00001FD0 2E8B5406                		mov	dx, [cs:si+6]	; dx = number of root dir entries
  6586                                  
  6587                                  ; now calculate size of fat table
  6588                                  
  6589 00001FD4 89550C                  		mov	[di+0Ch], dx	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6590                                  					; save number of (root)	dir entries
  6591 00001FD7 8B551D                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6592 00001FDA 8B451B                  		mov	ax, [di+1Bh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6593 00001FDD 886D08                  		mov	[di+8],	ch	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6594                                  					; save sectors per cluster
  6595                                  		
  6596                                  		; 05/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (optimization)
  6597 00001FE0 8A1E[D216]              		mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  6598 00001FE4 885D1F                  		mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz] ; fat	size flag
  6599 00001FE7 F6C340                  		test	bl, 40h
  6600                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6601                                  		;test	byte [fbigfat], 40h
  6602                                  		;;test	ds:fbigfat, 40h	; fbig
  6603                                  					; if (fbigfat)
  6604 00001FEA 751E                    		jnz	short dobig	; goto dobig; (16 bit fat)
  6605                                  
  6606                                  ; we don't need to change "small fat" logic since it is gauranteed
  6607                                  ; that double word total sector will not use 12 bit fat (unless
  6608                                  ; it's sectors/cluster >= 16 which will never be in this case.)
  6609                                  ; so in this case we assume dx = 0 !!
  6610                                  
  6611 00001FEC 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; (12 bit fat)
  6612 00001FEE 88EB                    		mov	bl, ch
  6613 00001FF0 4B                      		dec	bx
  6614 00001FF1 01C3                    		add	bx, ax		; dx=0
  6615 00001FF3 D3EB                    		shr	bx, cl		; bx = 1+(bpb->maxsec+BDS.secperclus-1)/
  6616 00001FF5 43                      		inc	bx		; BDS.secperclus
  6617 00001FF6 80E3FE                  		and	bl, 0FEh	; bx &= ~1; (=number of clusters)
  6618 00001FF9 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  6619 00001FFB D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1
  6620 00001FFD 01F3                    		add	bx, si
  6621 00001FFF 81C3FF01                		add	bx, 511		; bx +=	511 + bx/2
  6622 00002003 D0EF                    		shr	bh, 1		; bh >>= 1; (=bx/512)
  6623 00002005 887D11                  		mov	[di+11h], bh	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6624                                  					; save number of fat sectors
  6625 00002008 EB36                    		jmp	short massage_bpb
  6626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6627                                  
  6628                                  ; for bigfat we do need to extend this logic to 32 bit sector calculation.
  6629                                  
  6630                                  dobig:					
  6631 0000200A B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6632 0000200C 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  6633 0000200D 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6634 00002010 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  6635 00002012 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  6636 00002014 5A                      		pop	dx
  6637 00002015 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  6638 00002018 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6639 0000201B 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  6640                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs
  6641 0000201E B302                    		mov	bl, 2
  6642 00002020 8A7D08                  		mov	bh, [di+8]	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6643                                  					; bx = 256 * BDS.secperclus + 2
  6644                                  
  6645                                  ; I don't understand why to add bx here!!!
  6646                                  
  6647                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6648                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6649                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6650                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6651                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6652                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6653                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6654                                  		; (If FATType == FAT16,	BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz))
  6655                                  		
  6656 00002023 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; ax = t-r-d+256*spc+2
  6657 00002025 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  6658 00002028 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		; ax = t-r-d+256*spc+1
  6659 0000202B 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  6660                                  
  6661                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6662                                  
  6663 0000202E F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  6664                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))
  6665 00002030 894511                  		mov	[di+11h], ax	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6666                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  6667                                  
  6668                                  ; now, set the default filesys_id, volume label, serial number
  6669                                  
  6670                                  		; 05/08/2023
  6671                                  		; [di+1Fh] = [fbigfat]
  6672                                  		;
  6673                                  		;;mov	bl, ds:fbigfat
  6674                                  		;; 17/10/2022
  6675                                  		;mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  6676                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz] ; fat	size flag
  6677                                  
  6678 00002033 1E                      		push	ds
  6679 00002034 1E                      		push	ds
  6680 00002035 07                      		pop	es
  6681 00002036 0E                      		push	cs
  6682 00002037 1F                      		pop	ds
  6683                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6684 00002038 BD[CC05]                		mov	bp, CLEARIDS
  6685                                  		;mov	bp, 5D9h	; clear_ids
  6686                                  					; at 2C7h:5D9h = 70h:2B49h
  6687 0000203B 0E                      		push	cs
  6688 0000203C E826F7                  		call	call_bios_code
  6689 0000203F 1F                      		pop	ds
  6690                                  
  6691                                  ; at this point, in bpb of bds table, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS which is
  6692                                  ; set according to the partition information. we are going to
  6693                                  ; see if (hidden sectors + total sectors) > a word. if it is true,
  6694                                  ; then no change. otherwise, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be moved
  6695                                  ; to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be set to 0.
  6696                                  ; we don't do this for the bpb information from the boot record. we
  6697                                  ; are not going to change the bpb information from the boot record.
  6698                                  
  6699                                  massage_bpb:
  6700                                  		; 05/08/2023
  6701                                  		; [di+1Fh] = [fbigfat]
  6702                                  		;
  6703                                  		;; 12/12/2022
  6704                                  		;mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  6705                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz]
  6706                                  		;			; set size of fat on media

  6708 00002040 8B551D                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]

  6711                                  		;ja	short goodret	; don't have to change it.

  6715                                  		;ja	short goodret	; don't have to change it.

  6737                                  		; 12/12/2022

  6743 00002063 C3                      		retn
  6744                                  
  6745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6746                                  
  6747                                  ; 15/10/2022
  6748                                  
  6749                                  ;fdisk of pc dos 3.3 and below, os2 1.0 has a bug. the maximum number of
  6750                                  ;sector that can be handled by pc dos 3.3 ibmbio should be 0ffffh.
  6751                                  ;instead, sometimes fdisk use 10000h to calculate the maximum number.
  6752                                  ;so, we are going to check that if BPB_TOTALSECTORS + hidden sector = 10000h
  6753                                  ;then subtract 1 from BPB_TOTALSECTORS.
  6754                                  
  6755                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6756                                  cover_fdisk_bug:	
  6757 00002064 50                      		push	ax
  6758 00002065 52                      		push	dx
  6759 00002066 56                      		push	si
  6760 00002067 2E803E[7401]29          		cmp	byte [cs:disksector+26h], 29h
  6761                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
  6762                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
  6763 0000206D 7431                    		jz	short cfb_retit	; if extended bpb, then	>= pc dos 4.00
  6764 0000206F 2E817F073130            		cmp	word [cs:bx+7], 3031h ; '10' ; os2 1.0 = ibm 10.0
  6765 00002075 7507                    		jnz	short cfb_chk_BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  6766 00002077 2E807F0A30              		cmp	byte [cs:bx+10], '0'
  6767 0000207C 7522                    		jnz	short cfb_retit
  6768                                  cfb_chk_BPB_TOTALSECTORS:
  6769                                  		; 17/10/2022		
  6770 0000207E BE[5901]                		mov	si, disksector+11 ; 14Eh+0Bh
  6771                                  		;mov	si, 159h	; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB
  6772 00002081 2E837C0800              		cmp	word [cs:si+8], 0 ; [cs:si+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
  6773                                  					; just to make sure.
  6774 00002086 7418                    		jz	short cfb_retit
  6775 00002088 2E8B4408                		mov	ax, [cs:si+8]	; [cs:si+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
  6776 0000208C 2E034411                		add	ax, [cs:si+11h]	; [cs:si+EBPB.HIDDENSECTORS]
  6777 00002090 730E                    		jnb	short cfb_retit
  6778 00002092 750C                    		jnz	short cfb_retit	; if carry set and ax=0
  6779 00002094 2EFF4C08                		dec	word [cs:si+8]	; 0 -> 0FFFFh
  6780                                  					; then decrease	BPB_TOTALSECTORS by 1
  6781 00002098 836D1B01                		sub	word [di+1Bh], 1 ; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6782 0000209C 835D1D00                		sbb	word [di+1Dh], 0 ; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6783                                  cfb_retit:

  6787 000020A3 C3                      		retn

  6795                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6796                                  
  6797                                  ; 15/10/2022
  6798                                  
  6799                                  ; setdrvparms sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the system based on
  6800                                  ; the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the various form factors
  6801                                  ; are present in the bpbtable. for hard files, the recommended bpb is the same
  6802                                  ; as the bpb on the drive.
  6803                                  ;
  6804                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
  6805                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
  6806                                  
  6807                                  setdrvparms:
  6808 000020AA 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  6809                                  		; 18/10/2022
  6810 000020AC C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds in list
  6811                                  _next_bds:				
  6812 000020B0 06                      		push	es
  6813 000020B1 57                      		push	di
  6814 000020B2 268A5D22                		mov	bl, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
  6815 000020B6 80FB05                  		cmp	bl, 5		; ffHardFile
  6816 000020B9 753E                    		jnz	short nothardff
  6817 000020BB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6818 000020BD 268B450E                		mov	ax, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
  6819 000020C1 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  6820 000020C3 7508                    		jnz	short get_ccyl
  6821 000020C5 268B551D                		mov	dx, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6822 000020C9 268B451B                		mov	ax, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6823                                  
  6824                                  get_ccyl:				
  6825 000020CD 52                      		push	dx
  6826 000020CE 50                      		push	ax
  6827 000020CF 268B4515                		mov	ax, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
  6828 000020D3 26F76513                		mul	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6829                                  					; assume sectors per cyl. < 64k.
  6830 000020D7 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx has # sectors per cylinder
  6831 000020D9 58                      		pop	ax
  6832 000020DA 5A                      		pop	dx		; dx:ax	= total	sectors
  6833 000020DB 50                      		push	ax
  6834 000020DC 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  6835 000020DE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6836 000020E0 F7F1                    		div	cx
  6837 000020E2 2EA3[2905]              		mov	[cs:temp_h], ax	; ax be	0 here.
  6838 000020E6 58                      		pop	ax
  6839 000020E7 F7F1                    		div	cx		; div #sec by sec/cyl to get # cyl.
  6840 000020E9 09D2                    		or	dx, dx
  6841 000020EB 7401                    		jz	short no_cyl_rnd ; came out even
  6842 000020ED 40                      		inc	ax		; round	up
  6843                                  
  6844                                  no_cyl_rnd:				
  6845 000020EE 26894525                		mov	[es:di+25h], ax	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
  6846 000020F2 06                      		push	es
  6847 000020F3 1F                      		pop	ds
  6848 000020F4 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec]
  6849                                  					; ds:si	-> bpb for hard	file
  6850 000020F7 EB51                    		jmp	short set_recbpb
  6851                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6852                                  
  6853                                  nothardff:				
  6854 000020F9 0E                      		push	cs
  6855 000020FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  6856                                  
  6857                                  ; if fake floppy drive variable is set then we don't have to handle this bds.
  6858                                  ; we can just go and deal with the next bds at label go_to_next_bds.
  6859                                  
  6860                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6861                                  		; ds = cs
  6862                                  		; 17/10/2022 (ds=cs)
  6863 000020FB 803E[E116]01            		cmp	byte [fakefloppydrv], 1
  6864                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:fakefloppydrv], 1
  6865 00002100 7450                    		jz	short go_to_next_bds
  6866 00002102 80FB07                  		cmp	bl, 7		; ffother
  6867                                  					; special case "other" type of medium
  6868 00002105 753D                    		jnz	short not_process_other
  6869                                  process_other:
  6870 00002107 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6871 00002109 8B4525                  		mov	ax, [di+25h]	; [di+BDS.cylinders]
  6872 0000210C F76536                  		mul	word [di+36h]	; [di+BDS.rheads]
  6873 0000210F F76534                  		mul	word [di+34h]	; [di+BDS.rsecpertrack]
  6874 00002112 89452F                  		mov	[di+2Fh], ax	; [di+BDS.rtotalsecs16]
  6875                                  					; have the total number of sectors
  6876 00002115 48                      		dec	ax
  6877 00002116 B201                    		mov	dl, 1
  6878                                  _again:					
  6879 00002118 3DF60F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF6h	; 4096-10
  6880 0000211B 7206                    		jb	short _@@
  6881 0000211D D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  6882 0000211F D0E2                    		shl	dl, 1
  6883 00002121 EBF5                    		jmp	short _again
  6884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6885                                  
  6886                                  _@@:					
  6887 00002123 80FA01                  		cmp	dl, 1		; is it	a small	disk ?
  6888 00002126 7405                    		jz	short __@@	; yes, 224 root	entries	is enuf
  6889 00002128 C7452DF000              		mov	word [di+2Dh], 240 ; [di+BDS.rdirentries]
  6890                                  __@@:					
  6891 0000212D 885529                  		mov	[di+29h], dl	; [di+BDS.rsecperclus]
  6892                                  
  6893                                  ; logic to get the sectors/fat area.
  6894                                  ; fat entry is assumed to be 1.5 bytes!!!
  6895                                  
  6896                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6897                                  		; ds = cs
  6898                                  		; 17/10/2022 (ds=cs)
  6899 00002130 F726[A620]              		mul	word [word3]
  6900 00002134 F736[A420]              		div	word [word2]
  6901 00002138 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6902 0000213A F736[A820]              		div	word [word512]
  6903                                  		;
  6904                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6905                                  		;mul	word [cs:word3]	; * 3 ; mul word [cs:word3]
  6906                                  		;div	word [cs:word2]	; / 2 ; div word [cs:word2]
  6907                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  6908                                  		;div	word [cs:word512] ; / 512 ; div word [cs:word512]
  6909                                  		;
  6910 0000213E 40                      		inc	ax		; + 1
  6911                                  no_round_up:
  6912 0000213F 894532                  		mov	[di+32h], ax	; [di+BDS.rfatsecs]
  6913 00002142 EB0E                    		jmp	short go_to_next_bds
  6914                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6915                                  
  6916                                  not_process_other:			
  6917 00002144 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1		; bx is	word index into	table of bpbs
  6918                                  		;mov	si, bpbtable
  6919                                  		;mov	si, [bpbtable+bx] ; 15/10/2022
  6920                                  		; 09/12/2022
  6921                                  		;mov	si, BPBTABLE
  6922                                  		;mov	si, [bx+si]	; get address of bpb
  6923                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6924                                  		;mov	si, [BPBTABLE+bx]
  6925                                  		; 13/12/2022
  6926 00002146 8BB7[9864]              		mov	si, [SYSINITOFFSET+bpbtable+bx]
  6927                                  set_recbpb:				
  6928 0000214A 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  6929                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  6930 0000214D B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  6931 00002150 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  6932                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  6933 00002152 5F                      		pop	di
  6934 00002153 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  6935 00002154 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  6936 00002157 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  6937 0000215A 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  6938 0000215C E951FF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  6939                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6940                                  
  6941                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6942                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  6943                                  		;retn
  6944                                  
  6945                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6946                                  
  6947                                  ; 15/10/2022
  6948                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6949                                  
  6950                                  ; al = device number
  6951                                  
  6952                                  print_init:	
  6953 0000215F 98                      		cbw
  6954 00002160 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  6955 00002162 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  6956 00002164 CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  6957                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  6958                                  					; Return: AH = status
  6959                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  6960 00002166 C3                      		retn
  6961                                  
  6962                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6963                                  
  6964                                  ; al = device number
  6965                                  
  6966                                  aux_init:
  6967 00002167 98                      		cbw
  6968 00002168 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  6969                                  		;mov	al, 0A3h	; RSINIT ; 0A3h
  6970                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  6971                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  6972                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6973 0000216A B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  6974 0000216D CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  6975                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  6976                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  6977                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  6978                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  6979 0000216F C3                      		retn
  6980
