  6982                                  
  6983                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6984                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6985                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  6986                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  6987                                  
  6988                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  6989                                  ;
  6990                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  6991                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  6992                                  ;
  6993                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  6994                                  ;
  6995                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  6996                                  ;   initialize it.
  6997                                  ;
  6998                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  6999                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7000                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7001                                  ;
  7002                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7003                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7004                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7005                                  ;
  7006                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7007                                  ;   save coding.
  7008                                  ;
  7009                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7010                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7011                                  ;
  7012                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7013                                  ;
  7014                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7015                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7016                                  ;
  7017                                  ; called modules:
  7018                                  ;		  getboot
  7019                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7020                                  ;
  7021                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7022                                  ;
  7023                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7024                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7025                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7026                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7027                                  ;
  7028                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7029                                  
  7030                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7031                                  domini:	
  7032 00002170 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7033                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7034 00002174 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7035                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7036 00002176 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7037 00002178 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7038                                  domini_loop:				
  7039 0000217A 52                      		push	dx
  7040 0000217B 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7041 0000217F B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7042 00002181 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7043                                  					; DL = drive number
  7044                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7045                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7046                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7047 00002183 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7048 00002185 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7049 00002187 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7050 00002189 A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7051 0000218C 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7052 0000218F 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7053 00002191 A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7054 00002194 06                      		push	es
  7055 00002195 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7056 00002199 E83FFB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7057                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7058 0000219C 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7059 0000219E E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7060                                  domininext:				
  7061 000021A1 07                      		pop	es
  7062 000021A2 5A                      		pop	dx
  7063 000021A3 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7064 000021A5 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7065 000021A7 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7066                                  dominiret:				
  7067 000021A9 C3                      		retn
  7068                                  
  7069                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7070                                  
  7071                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7072                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7073                                  
  7074                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7075                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7076                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7077                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7078                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7079                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7080                                  ;
  7081                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7082                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7083                                  
  7084                                  
  7085                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7086 000021AA 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7087                                  fmpnext:				
  7088 000021AE 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7089 000021B2 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7090 000021B4 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7091 000021B7 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7092 000021BB 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7093                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7094                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7095                                  fmpnextfound:
  7096 000021BD C3                      		retn
  7097                                  
  7098                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7099                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7100                                  ;fmpret:
  7101                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7102                                  
  7103                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7104                                  
  7105                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7106                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7107 000021BE E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7108 000021C1 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7109 000021C3 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7110 000021C7 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7111                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7112 000021CC 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7113                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7114                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7115 000021D0 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7116                                  					; ffHardFile
  7117 000021D4 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7118 000021D9 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7119 000021DC 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7120 000021DF A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7121 000021E2 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7122 000021E5 A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7123 000021E8 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7124                                  					; set physical number
  7125 000021EB A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7126 000021EE 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7127                                  					; set logical number
  7128 000021F1 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7129 000021F6 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7130 000021F8 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7131                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7132 000021FD 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7133                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7134                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7135 000021FF 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7136 00002202 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7137 00002206 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7138 00002209 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7139 0000220B D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7140 0000220D 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7141 00002211 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7142                                  					; set hidden trks
  7143 00002214 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7144 00002218 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7145 0000221C 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7146 00002220 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7147 00002223 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7148 00002226 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7149                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7150                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7151                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7152 00002228 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7153 0000222A BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7154 0000222D 06                      		push	es
  7155 0000222E E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7156                                  					; bx value saved.
  7157 00002231 07                      		pop	es
  7158 00002232 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7159 00002234 E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7160                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7161 00002237 E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7162                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7163                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7164                                  
  7165                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7166                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7167                                  		;retn
  7168                                  
  7169                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7170                                  
  7171                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7172                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7173                                  
  7174                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7175                                  	
  7176 0000223A 57                      		push	di
  7177 0000223B 53                      		push	bx
  7178 0000223C 1E                      		push	ds
  7179 0000223D 06                      		push	es
  7180                                  setmini_1:				
  7181 0000223E 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7182 00002242 741B                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7183 00002244 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7184 00002248 7415                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7185 0000224A 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7186 0000224E 740F                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7187 00002250 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7188 00002253 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7189 00002257 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7190 00002259 F9                      		stc
  7191 0000225A 07                      		pop	es
  7192 0000225B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7193 0000225C 5B                      		pop	bx
  7194 0000225D 5F                      		pop	di
  7195 0000225E C3                      		retn
  7196                                  
  7197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7198                                  setmini_2:				
  7199 0000225F E926FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7200                                  
  7201                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7202                                  
  7203                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  7204                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  7205                                  
  7206                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7207                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7208                                  ;
  7209                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7210                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7211                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7212                                  ;
  7213                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7214                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7215                                  ;			trash ax
  7216                                  
  7217                                  dmax_check:	
  7218 00002262 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7219 00002267 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7220 00002269 06                      		push	es
  7221                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7222 0000226A B85804                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7223 0000226D 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7224                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7225 0000226F 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7226                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7227                                  					; set message flag
  7228                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7229 00002275 07                      		pop	es
  7230                                  
  7231                                  		;;push	es
  7232                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7233                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7234                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7235                                  					; set message flag
  7236                                  		;;pop	es
  7237                                  		;
  7238                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7239                                  dmax_ok:				
  7240 00002276 C3                      		retn
  7241                                  
  7242                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7243                                  
  7244                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7245                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7246                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7247                                  ;								 
  7248                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7249                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7250                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7251                                  
  7252                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7253 00002277 56                      		push	si
  7254 00002278 53                      		push	bx
  7255 00002279 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7256                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7257 0000227D 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7258 00002280 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7259                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7260 00002282 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7261 00002284 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7262                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7263                                  
  7264                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7265                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7266 00002286 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7267                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7268 00002288 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7269                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7270 0000228B C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7271                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7272 0000228F 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7273                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7274                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7275 00002292 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7276 00002295 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7277 00002299 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7278 0000229B 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7279 000022A0 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7280 000022A4 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7281 000022A9 5B                      		pop	bx
  7282 000022AA 5E                      		pop	si
  7283 000022AB C3                      		retn
  7284                                  
  7285                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7286                                  
  7287                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7288                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7289                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7290                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7291                                  
  7292                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7293 000022AC 50                      		push	ax
  7294 000022AD 51                      		push	cx
  7295 000022AE 52                      		push	dx
  7296 000022AF 55                      		push	bp
  7297 000022B0 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7298                                  loop_clock:				
  7299 000022B2 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7300 000022B4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7301 000022B6 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7302 000022B8 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7303                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7304                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7305                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7306 000022BA 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7307 000022BD 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7308 000022BF 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7309 000022C2 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7310 000022C4 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7311 000022C7 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7312 000022C9 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7313 000022CA B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7314                                  delay:					
  7315 000022CD E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7316 000022CF EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7318                                  
  7319                                  clock_present:				
  7320 000022D1 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7321 000022D7 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7322                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7323                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7324 000022DA 56                      		push	si
  7325 000022DB E84BF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7326 000022DE FA                      		cli
  7327                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7328 000022DF 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7329 000022E3 FB                      		sti
  7330 000022E4 5E                      		pop	si
  7331                                  
  7332                                  no_readdate:				
  7333 000022E5 5D                      		pop	bp
  7334 000022E6 5A                      		pop	dx
  7335 000022E7 59                      		pop	cx
  7336 000022E8 58                      		pop	ax
  7337 000022E9 C3                      		retn
  7338                                  
  7339                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7340                                  
  7341                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7342                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7343                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7344                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7345                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7346                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7347                                  ;
  7348                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7349                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7350                                  ;
  7351                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7352                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7353                                  ;
  7354                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7355                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7356                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7357                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7358                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7359                                  ;
  7360                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7361                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7362                                  
  7363                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7364                                  
  7365                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7366                                  
  7367                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7368                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7369                                  			
  7370 000022EA 50                      		push	ax
  7371 000022EB 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7372 000022F1 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7373 000022F3 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7374                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7375 000022F9 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7376 000022FB 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7377                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7378 00002301 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7379                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7380                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7381                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7382                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7383                                  cmosck4:				
  7384 00002303 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7385                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7386 00002305 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7387                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7388 00002307 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7389 0000230A B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7390                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7391 0000230C E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7392 0000230F 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7393                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7394 00002311 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7395 00002313 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7396                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7397 00002315 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7398                                  cmosck9:				
  7399 00002318 58                      		pop	ax
  7400 00002319 C3                      		retn
  7401                                  
  7402                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7403                                  
  7404                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7405                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7406                                  ;									       :
  7407                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7408                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7409                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7410                                  ;									       :
  7411                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7412                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7413                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7414                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7415                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7416                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7417                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7418                                  
  7419                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7420 0000231A 9C                      		pushf
  7421 0000231B FA                      		cli
  7422 0000231C 53                      		push	bx
  7423 0000231D 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7424 0000231E 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7425 00002320 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7426                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7427 00002322 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7428 00002323 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7429 00002325 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7430 00002327 58                      		pop	ax
  7431 00002328 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7432 0000232A 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7433 0000232C E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7434                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7435 0000232E 90                      		nop
  7436 0000232F E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7437 00002331 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7438 00002333 5B                      		pop	bx
  7439 00002334 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7440 00002335 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7441 00002338 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7442                                  
  7443                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7444                                  
  7445                                  cmos_popf:				
  7446 00002339 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7447                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7448                                  
  7449                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7450                                  
  7451                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7452                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7453                                  ;									       :
  7454                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7455                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7456                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7457                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7458                                  ;									       :
  7459                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7460                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7461                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7462                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7463                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7464                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7465                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7466                                  
  7467                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7468 0000233A 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7469 0000233B 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7470 0000233C FA                      		cli
  7471 0000233D 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7472 0000233E 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7473 00002340 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7474                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7475 00002342 90                      		nop
  7476 00002343 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7477 00002345 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7478 00002347 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7479 00002348 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7480 0000234A 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7481 0000234C E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7482                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7483 0000234E 90                      		nop
  7484 0000234F E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7485 00002351 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7486 00002352 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7487 00002353 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7488 00002356 C3                      		retn
  7489                                  
  7490                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7491                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7492                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7493                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7494                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7495                                  
  7496                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7497                                  ;
  7498                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7499                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7500                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7501                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7502                                  
  7503                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7504                                  
  7505                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7506                                  ;
  7507                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7508                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7509                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7510                                  
  7511                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7512                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7513                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7514                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7515                                  
  7516                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7517                                  getclus:				
  7518 00002357 51                      		push	cx
  7519 00002358 57                      		push	di
  7520 00002359 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7521 0000235E 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7522 00002360 48                      		dec	ax
  7523 00002361 48                      		dec	ax
  7524 00002362 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7525                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7526                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7527 00002364 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7528 00002369 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7529                                  unpack:					
  7530 0000236E 1E                      		push	ds
  7531 0000236F 50                      		push	ax
  7532 00002370 53                      		push	bx
  7533 00002371 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7534 00002376 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7535 00002378 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7536 0000237A 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7537                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7538 00002380 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7539 00002382 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7540                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7541 00002384 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7542                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7543 00002386 52                      		push	dx
  7544 00002387 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7545 00002389 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7546 0000238C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7547 0000238D 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7548 0000238F 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7549                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7550                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7551 00002391 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7552 00002395 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7553 00002396 52                      		push	dx
  7554 00002397 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7555 00002399 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7556 0000239C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7557                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7558 0000239D A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7559 000023A0 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7560 000023A4 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7561                                  even_odd:				
  7562 000023A8 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7563 000023A9 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7564 000023AA D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7565 000023AC 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7566 000023AE D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7567                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7568 000023B0 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7569 000023B2 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7570 000023B4 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7571                                  havclus:				
  7572 000023B6 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7573 000023B8 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7574 000023BC EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7575                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7576                                  
  7577                                  unpack16:				
  7578 000023BE 52                      		push	dx
  7579 000023BF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7580 000023C1 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7581 000023C3 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7582 000023C6 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7583 000023C9 5A                      		pop	dx
  7584 000023CA 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7585                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7586                                  unpackx:				
  7587 000023CC 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7588 000023CD 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7589 000023CE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7590 000023CF 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7591 000023D1 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7592 000023D4 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7593 000023D6 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7594 000023DB EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7596                                  
  7597                                  getcl2:					
  7598 000023DD 53                      		push	bx
  7599 000023DE 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7600 000023DF 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7601 000023E0 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7602 000023E4 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7603 000023E9 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7604 000023EA 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7605                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7606 000023EF 1E                      		push	ds
  7607 000023F0 0E                      		push	cs
  7608 000023F1 1F                      		pop	ds
  7609 000023F2 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7610                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7611 000023F3 BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7612                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7613                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7614 000023F6 E86CF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7615 000023F9 1F                      		pop	ds
  7616 000023FA 5B                      		pop	bx
  7617 000023FB 5F                      		pop	di
  7618 000023FC 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7619 00002400 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7620 00002402 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7621 00002404 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7622 00002406 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7623 00002407 C3                      		retn
  7624                                  
  7625                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7626                                  
  7627                                  
  7628                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7629                                  ;
  7630                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7631                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7632                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7633                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7634                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7635                                  ;
  7636                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7637                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7638                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7639                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7640                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7641                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7642                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7643                                  
  7644                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7645                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7646 00002408 50                      		push	ax
  7647 00002409 51                      		push	cx
  7648 0000240A 57                      		push	di
  7649 0000240B 56                      		push	si
  7650 0000240C 06                      		push	es
  7651 0000240D 1E                      		push	ds
  7652 0000240E 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7653 00002410 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7654 00002415 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7655 00002417 90                      		nop
  7656                                  
  7657                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7658                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7659                                  
  7660 00002418 06                      		push	es
  7661 00002419 1E                      		push	ds
  7662 0000241A 57                      		push	di
  7663 0000241B 50                      		push	ax
  7664 0000241C 0E                      		push	cs
  7665 0000241D 1F                      		pop	ds
  7666                                  
  7667 0000241E 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7668 00002422 BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7669                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7670                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7671 00002425 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7672 00002426 E83CF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7673 00002429 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7674 0000242A 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7675                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7676 0000242E 5F                      		pop	di
  7677 0000242F 1F                      		pop	ds
  7678 00002430 07                      		pop	es
  7679 00002431 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7680 00002436 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7681 00002438 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7682                                  					; sector number
  7683                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7684 0000243C 52                      		push	dx
  7685 0000243D 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7686                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7687                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7688 00002444 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7689 00002446 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7690 00002449 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7691 0000244D 1E                      		push	ds
  7692 0000244E 07                      		pop	es
  7693 0000244F 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7694 00002451 1E                      		push	ds
  7695 00002452 0E                      		push	cs
  7696 00002453 1F                      		pop	ds
  7697 00002454 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7698 00002455 BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7699                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7700                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7701 00002458 E80AF3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7702 0000245B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7703 0000245C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7704 0000245D 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7705                                  
  7706                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7707 00002462 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7708 00002463 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7709                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7710                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7711 00002465 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7712 00002467 1F                      		pop	ds
  7713 00002468 07                      		pop	es
  7714 00002469 5E                      		pop	si
  7715 0000246A 5F                      		pop	di
  7716 0000246B 59                      		pop	cx
  7717 0000246C 58                      		pop	ax
  7718 0000246D C3                      		retn
  7719                                  
  7720                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7721                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7722                                  
  7723                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7724                                  
  7725                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7726                                  		;db 0
  7727                                  
  7728                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7729                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7730                                  
  7731                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7732 0000246E 00<rep 2h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7733                                  %endif
  7734                                  
  7735                                  ;align 16
  7736                                  
  7737                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7738                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7739                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7740                                  
  7741                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7742                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7743                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7744                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7745                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7746                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7747                                  
  7748                                  ;============================================================================
  7749                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7750                                  ;============================================================================
  7751                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7752                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  7753                                  
  7754                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  7755                                  
  7756                                  ; 30/12/2022
  7757                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  7758                                  
  7759                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7760                                   
  7761                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7762                                  
  7763                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7764                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7765                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7766                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7767                                  
  7768                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7769 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7770 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7771                                  
  7772                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7773                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7774                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7775                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7776                                  
  7777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7778                                  
  7779                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7780                                  
  7781                                  ;************************************************************************
  7782                                  ;*									*
  7783                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7784                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7785                                  ;*									*
  7786                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7787                                  ;*									*
  7788                                  ;************************************************************************
  7789                                  
  7790                                  _seg_reinit:
  7791 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7792                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7793                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7794 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7795 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7796                                  
  7797                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7798 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7799 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7800 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7801 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7802 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7803                                  
  7804                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7805                                  
  7806                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7807                                  
  7808                                  ;************************************************************************
  7809                                  ;*									*
  7810                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7811                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7812                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7813                                  ;*									*
  7814                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7815                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7816                                  ;*									*
  7817                                  ;************************************************************************
  7818                                  
  7819                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7820 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7821 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7822 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7823 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7824 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7825 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7826 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7827 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7828 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7829 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7830 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7831                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7832                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7833 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7834 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7835 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7836 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7837 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7838 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7839 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7840 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7841 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7842 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7843                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7844 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7845                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7846                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7847 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7848                                  
  7849                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7850                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7851                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7852                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7853                                  ;
  7854                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7855                                  ;
  7856                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7857                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7858                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7859                                  ;
  7860                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7861                                  
  7862                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7863 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7864 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7865 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7866 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7867                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7868                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7869 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7870 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7871                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7872                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7873 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7874 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7875 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7876 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7877 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7878 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7879 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7880 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7881 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7882 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7883                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7884 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7885                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7886 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7887 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7888                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7889                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7890                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7891                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7892 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7893                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7894 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7895 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7896                                  					; mark operation complete
  7897 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  7898 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  7899 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7900 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  7901 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  7902 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  7903 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  7904 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  7905 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  7906 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7907                                  	
  7908                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7909                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7910                                  bc_retf:
  7911 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  7912                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7913                                  
  7914                                  command_error:				
  7915 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7916 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7917                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7918                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7919                                  
  7920                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7921                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7922                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7923                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7924                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7925                                  ; high.
  7926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7927                                  
  7928                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7929                                  
  7930                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7931                                  
  7932 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7933                                  
  7934 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7935                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7936                                  		
  7937                                  
  7938                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7939                                  
  7940                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7941                                  
  7942                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7943 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7944                                  					; unknown command error
  7945                                  
  7946                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7947                                  
  7948                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7949                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7950                                  
  7951                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7952                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7953                                  
  7954                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7955                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7956                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7957 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7958 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7959                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7960 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7961 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7962 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  7963                                  
  7964                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7965                                  
  7966                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  7967                                  
  7968                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7969                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  7970                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7971                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7972                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7973                                  
  7974                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7975                                  
  7976                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7977                                  
  7978                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7979                                  
  7980                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7981                                  
  7982                                  ;************************************************************************
  7983                                  ;*									*
  7984                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7985                                  ;*									*
  7986                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7987                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7988                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7989                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7990                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7991                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7992                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7993                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7994                                  ;*									*
  7995                                  ;************************************************************************
  7996                                  
  7997                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7998                                  		;db 0
  7999                                  
  8000                                  		; 13/12/202
  8001 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8002                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8003 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8004                                  					; 00 init
  8005 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8006 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8007 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8008                                  					; 03
  8009 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8010                                  					; 04
  8011 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8012                                  					; 05
  8013 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8014 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8015                                  					; 07
  8016 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8017                                  					; 08
  8018 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8019 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8020                                  con_table_end:
  8021 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8022                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8023 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8024 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8025 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8026 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8027 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8028                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8029 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8030                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8031 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8032 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8033 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8034 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8035 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8036 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8037 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8038 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8039 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8040 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8041 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8042 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8043 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8044 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8045 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8046 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8047 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8048 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8049 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8050 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8051                                  prn_table_end:
  8052 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8053                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8054 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8055 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8056 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8057 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8058 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8059 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8060 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06

  8062 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ

  8068 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
