  8080                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8081                                  
  8082                                  ;************************************************************************
  8083                                  ;*									*
  8084                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8085                                  ;*									*
  8086                                  ;************************************************************************
  8087                                  
  8088                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8089                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8090 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8091                                  con_loop:				
  8092 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8093 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8094 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8095                                  con_exit:				
  8096 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8097 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8098                                  
  8099                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8100                                  
  8101                                  ;************************************************************************
  8102                                  ;*									*
  8103                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8104                                  ;*									*
  8105                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8106                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8107                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8108                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8109                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8110                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8111                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8112                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8113                                  ;*									*
  8114                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8115                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8116                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8117                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8118                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8119                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8120                                  ;*									*
  8121                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8122                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8123                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8124                                  ;*									*
  8125                                  ;************************************************************************
  8126                                  
  8127                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8128                                  chrin:		
  8129 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8130 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8131 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8132 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8133 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8134 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8135 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8136 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8137 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8138 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8139 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8140 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8141                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8142                                  
  8143                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8144                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8145                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8146                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8147                                  ;      else
  8148                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8149                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8150                                  ;      endif
  8151                                  ;    endif
  8152                                  ;  endif
  8153                                  
  8154                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8155 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8156 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8157 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8158 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8159 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8160 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8161 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8162 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8163                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8164                                  
  8165                                  not_ext:				
  8166 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8167 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8168                                  alt_save:				
  8169 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8170                                  keyret:					
  8171 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8172                                  
  8173                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8174                                  
  8175                                  ;************************************************************************
  8176                                  ;*									*
  8177                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8178                                  ;*									*
  8179                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8180                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8181                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8182                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8183                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8184                                  ;*									*
  8185                                  ;************************************************************************
  8186                                  
  8187                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8188                                  con_rdnd:				
  8189 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8190 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8191 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8192 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8193 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8194 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8195 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8196 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8197 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8198                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8199 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8200                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8201 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8202 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8203 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8204 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8205                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8206                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8207                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8208                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8209 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8210 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8211 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8212                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8213                                  
  8214                                  gotchr:					
  8215 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8216 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8217 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8218 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8219 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8220                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8221                                  
  8222                                  notbrk:					
  8223 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8224 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8225 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8226 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8227                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8228                                  
  8229                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8230 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8231 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8232 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8233 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8234 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8235 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8236 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8237                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8238                                  rdexit:					
  8239 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8240 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8241                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8242                                  bc_exvec:				
  8243 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8244                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8245 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8246                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8247                                  
  8248                                  ;************************************************************************
  8249                                  ;*									*
  8250                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8251                                  ;*									*
  8252                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8253                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8254                                  ;*									*
  8255                                  ;************************************************************************
  8256                                  
  8257                                  con_writ:
  8258                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8259 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8260                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8261                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8262                                  con_lp:					
  8263 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8264 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8265 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8266                                  					; AL = character to display
  8267 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8268                                  cc_ret:					
  8269 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8270 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8271                                  
  8272                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

  8274                                  ;************************************************************************
  8275                                  ;*									*
  8276                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8277                                  ;*									*
  8278                                  ;************************************************************************
  8279                                  
  8280                                  con_flush:
  8281 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8282                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8283 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8284 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8285                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8286                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8287                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8288 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8289 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8290 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8291                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8292 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8293

  8298                                  ;************************************************************************
  8299                                  ;*									*
  8300                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8301                                  ;*									*
  8302                                  ;************************************************************************
  8303                                  
  8304                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8305                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8306                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8307                                  
  8308                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8309                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8310                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8311                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8312                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8313                                  ;
  8314                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8315                                  
  8316                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8317                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8318                                  
  8319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8320                                  
  8321                                  ;************************************************************************
  8322                                  ;*									*
  8323                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8324                                  ;*									*
  8325                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8326                                  ;*									*
  8327                                  ;************************************************************************
  8328                                  
  8329                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8330 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8331                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8332                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8333                                  prn_done:
  8334 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8335 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8336                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8337                                  
  8338                                  ;************************************************************************
  8339                                  ;*									*
  8340                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8341                                  ;*									*
  8342                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8343                                  ;*									*
  8344                                  ;************************************************************************
  8345                                  
  8346                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8347                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8348 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8349                                  prn_loop:				
  8350 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8351                                  prn_out:				
  8352 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8353 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8354 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8355 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8356 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8357 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8358 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8359 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8360 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8361 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8362 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8363                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8364                                  
  8365                                  _prnwf:					
  8366 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8367 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8368                                  TestPrnError:				
  8369 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8370 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8371                                  pmessg:					
  8372 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8373                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8374                                  
  8375                                  prn_con:				
  8376 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8377 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8378                                  ;prn_done:				
  8379                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8380                                  prn_done2:
  8381                                  		;clc
  8382                                  		; cf=0
  8383 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8384                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8385                                  
  8386                                  ;************************************************************************
  8387                                  ;*									*
  8388                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8389                                  ;*									*
  8390                                  ;************************************************************************
  8391                                  
  8392                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8393 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8394 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8395 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8396                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8397                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8398 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8399 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8400                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8401                                  
  8402                                  ;************************************************************************
  8403                                  ;*									*
  8404                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8405                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8406                                  ;*									*
  8407                                  ;************************************************************************
  8408                                  
  8409                                  prnstat:				
  8410 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8411                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8412                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8413                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8414                                  
  8415                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8416                                  
  8417                                  ;************************************************************************
  8418                                  ;*									*
  8419                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8420                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8421                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8422                                  ;*									*
  8423                                  ;************************************************************************
  8424                                  
  8425                                  prnop:	
  8426 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8427 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8428                                  
  8429                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8430                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8431                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8432                                  
  8433 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8434 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8435 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8436 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8437 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8438 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8439 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8440                                  
  8441                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8442                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8443                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8444                                  
  8445                                  NextTest:				
  8446 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8447                                  					; i/o error?
  8448 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8449                                  
  8450                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8451                                  
  8452 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8453                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8454 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8455 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8456 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8457                                  ret1:					
  8458 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8460                                  
  8461                                  checknotready:				
  8462 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8463 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8464 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8465                                  
  8466                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8467                                  
  8468                                  ;************************************************************************
  8469                                  ;*									*
  8470                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8471                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8472                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8473                                  ;*									*
  8474                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8475                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8476                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8477                                  ;*									*
  8478                                  ;************************************************************************
  8479                                  
  8480                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8481                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8482 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8483                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8484 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8485 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8486 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8487 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8488 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8489                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8490 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8491 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8492                                  prn_getstat:				
  8493 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8494 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8495 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8496 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8497 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8498 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8499 000002A6 26                      		es
  8500 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8501                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8502                                  					; lodsb
  8503 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8504 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8505 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8506 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8507                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8508                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8509                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8510 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8511                                  
  8512                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8513                                  
  8514                                  prn_bperr:				
  8515 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8516                                  prn_berr:				
  8517 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8519                                  
  8520                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8521                                  
  8522                                  ;************************************************************************
  8523                                  ;*									*
  8524                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8525                                  ;*									*
  8526                                  ;************************************************************************
  8527                                  
  8528                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8529                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8530                                  
  8531                                  ;********************************;*
  8532                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8533                                  ;********************************;*
  8534                                  
  8535                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8536                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8537                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8538

  8540                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8541                                  ;;endstruc
  8542                                  
  8543                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8544                                  
  8545                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8546                                  
  8547                                  		; 19/10/2022

  8551                                  					; ioc_pc

  8553                                  
  8554                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8555 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

  8557                                  
  8558                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8559 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8560 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8561 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8562                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8563 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8564 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1

  8566 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8567 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8568 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8569 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8570 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr

  8574 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx

  8576                                  					; return current retry count
  8577                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8578                                  		; cf=0
  8579                                  		;clc
  8580 000002EA C3                      		retn

  8613                                  ;************************************************************************
  8614                                  ;*									*
  8615                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8616                                  ;*									*
  8617                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8618                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8619                                  ;*									*

  8621                                  
  8622                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8623                                  
  8624                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8625                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8626                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8627                                  
  8628                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8629                                  
  8630                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8631                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8632                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8633                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8634                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8635                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8636                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout

  8638                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8639                                  
  8640                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8641                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8642                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect

  8645                                  
  8646                                  ;************************************************************************
  8647                                  ;*									*
  8648                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8649                                  ;*		   at es:di						*

  8651                                  ;************************************************************************

  8653                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh

  8656 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8657 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8658 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8659 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8660 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8661                                  aux1:					
  8662 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8663                                  					; won't return if error

  8669                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022

  8673                                  ;************************************************************************
  8674                                  ;*									*
  8675                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8676                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8677                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8678                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8679                                  ;*									*
  8680                                  ;************************************************************************
  8681                                  
  8682                                  auxin:

  8684 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop

  8686                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8687                                  		;retn
  8688                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8689 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn

  8691                                  
  8692                                  arbad:

  8694 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8695 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8696 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8697                                  
  8698                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8699                                  
  8700                                  ;************************************************************************
  8701                                  ;*									*
  8702                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8703                                  ;*									*
  8704                                  ;************************************************************************
  8705                                  
  8706                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h

  8712 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8713 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8714 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8715 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8716 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8717 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8718                                  auxdrx:

  8735 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8736 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8737 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8738                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8739                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8740                                  		;clc
  8741 00000359 C3                      		retn

  8743                                  
  8744                                  ;************************************************************************
  8745                                  ;*									*
  8746                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8747                                  ;*									*
  8748                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8749                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8750                                  ;*									*
  8751                                  ;************************************************************************
  8752                                  
  8753                                  auxstat:				
  8754 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8755                                  
  8756                                  		; fall into auxop
  8757                                  
  8758                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8759                                  
  8760                                  ;************************************************************************
  8761                                  ;*									*
  8762                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8763                                  ;*									*
  8764                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8765                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8766                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8767                                  ;*									*
  8768                                  ;************************************************************************

  8770                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8771 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8772                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8773                                  					; get port number
  8774 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8775                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8776                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8777 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8778                                  
  8779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8780                                  
  8781                                  ;************************************************************************
  8782                                  ;*									*
  8783                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8784                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8785                                  ;*									*
  8786                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8787                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8788                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8789                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8790                                  ;*									*
  8791                                  ;************************************************************************
  8792                                  
  8793                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8794 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8795 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8796                                  					; zero out buffer
  8797                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8798                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8799                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8800 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8801                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8802                                  
  8803                                  ;************************************************************************
  8804                                  ;*									*
  8805                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8806                                  ;*									*
  8807                                  ;************************************************************************
  8808                                  
  8809                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8810                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8811 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8812                                  aux_loop:

  8817 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8818 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8819 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error

  8821 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8822                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8823                                  
  8824                                  awok:					
  8825 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8826                                  					; still	more character to print
  8827                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8828                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8829                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8830 00000381 C3                      		retn

  8832                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

  8848 0000038A C3                      		retn

  8851                                  
  8852                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8853                                  
  8854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8855                                  ;								:
  8856                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8857                                  ;								:
  8858                                  ;								:
  8859                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8860                                  ;								:
  8861                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8862                                  ;								:
  8863                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8864                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8865                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8866                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8867                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8868                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8869                                  ;								:
  8870                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8871                                  ;								:
  8872                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8873                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8874                                  ;								:
  8875                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8876                                  
  8877                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8878                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8879                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8880                                  
  8881                                  ;19/07/2019
  8882                                  ;09/03/2019
  8883                                  
  8884                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8885                                  
  8886                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8887                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8888                                  
  8889 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8890 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8891 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8892 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8893 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8894 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8895 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8896 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8897 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8898 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8899 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8900 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8901 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8902 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8903 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8904                                  
  8905                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8906                                  
  8907 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8908 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8909 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8910 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8911 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8912 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8913 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8914 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8915 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8916 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8917 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8918 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8919 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8920 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8921 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8922 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8923 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8924 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8925 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8926 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8927                                  
  8928                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8929                                  
  8930                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8931                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8932                                  
  8933                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8934                                  ;
  8935                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8936                                  ;
  8937                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8938                                  ;
  8939                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8940                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8941                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8942                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8943                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8944                                  ;
  8945                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8946                                  ;
  8947                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8948                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8949                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8950                                  ;
  8951                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8952                                  
  8953                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8954 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8955 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8956                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8957 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8958                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8959 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8960 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8961                                  					; get binary hours
  8962                                  					; convert to bcd
  8963 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8964                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8965 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8966 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8967 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8968                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8969 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8970 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8971 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8972                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8973 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8974 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8975 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8976 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8977 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8978                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8979                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8980                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8981 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8982                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8983 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8984 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8985                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8986 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8987                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8988                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8989                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8990 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8991 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8992 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8993                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8994                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8995                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8996 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8997 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8998                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8999 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9000 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9001 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  9002                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  9003                                  					; convert to bcd format
  9004 00000422 FA                      		cli
  9005 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9006 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9007                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9008                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9009                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9010 00000427 FB                      		sti
  9011                                  no_cmos_2:
  9012                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9013                                  		; cf=0				
  9014                                  		;clc
  9015 00000428 C3                      		retn
  9016                                  
  9017                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9018                                  
  9019                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9020                                  
  9021                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9022                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  9023                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9024                                  ;
  9025                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9026                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9027                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9028                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9029                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9030                                  ;
  9031                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9032                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9033                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9034                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9035                                  
  9036                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9037 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9038 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9039                                  
  9040                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9041                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9042                                  ;
  9043                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9044                                  ;	       ----------------
  9045                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9046                                  ;
  9047                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9048                                  ;
  9049                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9050                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9051                                  ;		1,193,180
  9052                                  ;
  9053                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9054                                  ;
  9055                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9056                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9057                                  ;		59,659
  9058                                  ;
  9059                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9060                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9061                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9062                                  ;
  9063                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9064                                  ; multiply by 5
  9065                                  
  9066 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9067 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9068                                  					; multiply by 5
  9069 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9070 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9071 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9072 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9073 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9074 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9075 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9076                                  
  9077                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9078                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9079                                  
  9080 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9081 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9082                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9083 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9084 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9085 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9086                                  
  9087                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9088                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9089                                  
  9090 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9091 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9092                                  
  9093                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9094                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9095                                  
  9096 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9097 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9098 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9099 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9100                                  noadj:					
  9101 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9102 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9103                                  
  9104                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9105                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9106                                  
  9107 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9108 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9109 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9110 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9111 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9112 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9113 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9114 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9115                                  
  9116                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9117                                  
  9118 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9119 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9120 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9121 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9122 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9123 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9124 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9125 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9126 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9127                                  
  9128                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9129                                  
  9130                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9131                                  
  9132                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9133                                  ;
  9134                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9135                                  ;
  9136                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9137                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9138                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9139                                  ;
  9140                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9141                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9142                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9143                                  ;			else
  9144                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9145                                  ;		}
  9146                                  ;
  9147                                  ; USES : AX
  9148                                  ;
  9149                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9150                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9151                                  ;
  9152                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9153                                  
  9154                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9155                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9156 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9157 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9158                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9159                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9160                                  					; midnight
  9161                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9162 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9163 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9164 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9165                                  					; and not flag
  9166 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9167 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9168                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9169                                  
  9170                                  inc_case:				
  9171 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9172 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9173 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9174                                  no_rollover:				
  9175 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9176

  9204                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9205                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9206                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9207                                  
  9208                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9209                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9210                                  
  9211                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9212                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9213                                  
  9214                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9215                                  
  9216                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9217                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9218                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9219                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9220                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9221                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9222                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9223                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9224                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9225                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9226                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9227                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9228                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9229                                  
  9230                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9231                                  
  9232                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9233                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9234                                  ;
  9235                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9236                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9237                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9238                                  ;   else
  9239                                  ;	set slow = value
  9240                                  ;   ...
  9241                                  ;*********************************************
  9242                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9243                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9244                                  ;*	 use slow
  9245                                  ;*   else
  9246                                  ;*	 use fast
  9247                                  ;*********************************************
  9248                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9249                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9250                                  ;	use slow
  9251                                  ;   else
  9252                                  ;	use fast
  9253                                  ;   ...
  9254                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9255                                  ;
  9256                                  ;
  9257                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9258                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9259                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9260                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9261                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9262                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9263                                  
  9264                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9265                                  
  9266                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9267                                  
  9268                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9269

  9344                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9345                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9346                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9347                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9348                                  ;
  9349                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9350                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9351                                  
  9352                                  SetDrive:	
  9353                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9354 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9355                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9356 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9357 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9358 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9359 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9360 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9361 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9362                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9363 000004DE C3                      		retn
