 10608                                  diddle_back:				
 10609 000009EB 9C                      		pushf
 10610 000009EC 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10611 000009F1 7523                    		jnz	short nodiddleback
 10612 000009F3 50                      		push	ax
 10613 000009F4 06                      		push	es
 10614 000009F5 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 10615 000009F9 A0[2B01]                		mov	al, [save_eot]
 10616 000009FC 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 10617 00000A00 A0[2701]                		mov	al, [settlecurrent]
 10618 00000A03 8A26[2601]              		mov	ah, [motorstartup]
 10619 00000A07 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10620 00000A0B 26C6440302              		mov	byte [es:si+3], 2 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 10621 00000A10 2688640A                		mov	[es:si+0Ah], ah	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 10622 00000A14 07                      		pop	es
 10623 00000A15 58                      		pop	ax
 10624                                  nodiddleback:				
 10625 00000A16 9D                      		popf
 10626                                  ddbx:					
 10627 00000A17 C3                      		retn
 10628                                  
 10629                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10630                                  
 10631                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10632                                  ;read the number of sectors specified in ax, 
 10633                                  ;handling track boundaries
 10634                                  ;es:di -> bds for this drive
 10635                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10636                                  
 10637                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10638                                  block:	
 10639 00000A18 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 10640 00000A1A 74FB                    		jz	short ddbx
 10641 00000A1C 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10642                                  					; fnon_removable
 10643 00000A21 740D                    		jz	short block_floppy ;
 10644                                  
 10645                                  ; check	to see if multi	track operation	is allowed. if not
 10646                                  ; we have to go	to the block_floppy below to break up the operation.
 10647                                  
 10648 00000A23 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 10649                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:multrk_flag, 80h ; multrk_on
 10650 00000A28 7406                    		jz	short block_floppy
 10651 00000A2A E82900                  		call	Disk
 10652 00000A2D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 10653 00000A2F C3                      		retn
 10654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10655                                  
 10656                                  block_floppy:
 10657                                  
 10658                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 10659                                  				
 10660 00000A30 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10661 00000A34 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 10662 00000A36 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 10663 00000A3A 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 10664 00000A3C 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 10665 00000A3E 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 10666 00000A40 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 10667                                  
 10668                                  gotmin:
 10669                                  
 10670                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 10671                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 10672                                  					
 10673 00000A42 50                      		push	ax
 10674 00000A43 51                      		push	cx
 10675 00000A44 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 10676 00000A46 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 10677 00000A49 59                      		pop	cx
 10678 00000A4A 58                      		pop	ax
 10679                                  
 10680                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 10681                                  
 10682 00000A4B 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 10683 00000A4D D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 10684 00000A4F 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 10685 00000A51 EBC5                    		jmp	short block
 10686                                  dskerr_brdg:				
 10687 00000A53 E9EC00                  		jmp	dskerr
 10688                                  
 10689                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10690                                  
 10691                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10692                                  
 10693                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10694                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 10695                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 10696                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 10697                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 10698                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 10699                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 10700                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 10701                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10702                                  
 10703                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10704                                  Disk:
 10705                                  
 10706                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 10707                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 10708                                  
 10709 00000A56 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 10710                                  					; set up retry count
 10711 00000A59 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1	;
 10712                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 10713 00000A5E 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10714 00000A60 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 10715 00000A63 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10716 00000A65 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 10717                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 10718 00000A68 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 10719 00000A6C 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 10720 00000A70 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 10721                                  ;retry:
 10722                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10723                                  _retry:					
 10724 00000A74 50                      		push	ax
 10725 00000A75 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 10726 00000A79 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10727 00000A7E 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 10728 00000A80 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 10729                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 10730 00000A85 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 10731 00000A87 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 10732                                  					; add hidden trks.
 10733                                  disk_not_mini:				
 10734 00000A8B D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10735 00000A8D D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10736 00000A8F 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 10737 00000A93 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 10738 00000A95 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 10739 00000A97 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 10740 00000A9B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 10741                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10742 00000A9F 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 10743 00000AA4 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 10744                                  
 10745                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 10746                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 10747                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 10748                                  
 10749 00000AA6 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 10750 00000AAB 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 10751 00000AAD 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 10752 00000AB0 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 10753 00000AB2 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 10754 00000AB5 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 10755                                  do_writej:	
 10756                                  
 10757                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 10758                                  			
 10759 00000AB7 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 10760                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10761                                  
 10762                                  do_fast:				
 10763 00000AB9 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 10764                                  
 10765                                  testerr:				
 10766 00000ABC 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 10767                                  
 10768                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 10769                                  
 10770 00000ABE 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 10771 00000AC2 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10772                                  no_set:
 10773                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 10774 00000AC6 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 10775 00000ACC 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 10776                                  noverify:				
 10777 00000ACE 58                      		pop	ax
 10778                                  
 10779                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 10780                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 10781                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 10782                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 10783                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 10784                                  
 10785 00000ACF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10786                                  					; fnon_removable
 10787 00000AD4 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 10788 00000AD6 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 10789 00000ADB 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 10790                                  its_removable:				
 10791 00000ADD 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 10792 00000AE0 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10793 00000AE2 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 10794 00000AE6 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 10795 00000AE8 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 10796 00000AEC 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10797                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 10798 00000AF0 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 10799 00000AF2 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 10800 00000AF7 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 10801 00000AFB FEC6                    		inc	dh
 10802 00000AFD 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 10803 00000B01 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 10804 00000B03 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10805 00000B05 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 10806                                  noxor:					
 10807 00000B09 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 10808                                  disk_ret:				
 10809 00000B0D F8                      		clc
 10810 00000B0E C3                      		retn
 10811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10812                                  
 10813                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10814                                  
 10815                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10816                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 10817                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 10818                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10819                                  
 10820                                  do_write:				
 10821 00000B0F 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 10822 00000B13 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 10823 00000B15 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10824 00000B19 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 10825                                  
 10826                                  do_norm:				
 10827 00000B1B E87500                  		call	normspeed
 10828 00000B1E EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 10829                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10830                                  
 10831                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10832                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 10833                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10834                                  
 10835                                  doverify:				
 10836 00000B20 58                      		pop	ax
 10837 00000B21 50                      		push	ax
 10838 00000B22 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 10839 00000B24 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 10840 00000B27 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 10841                                  
 10842                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 10843                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 10844                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 10845                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 10846                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 10847                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 10848                                  
 10849 00000B29 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 10850 00000B2C 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 10851 00000B2E FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 10852 00000B32 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 10853 00000B34 E84405                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 10854 00000B37 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 10855                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10856                                  
 10857                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 10858 00000B39 E83F05                  		call	ResetDisk
 10859 00000B3C FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 10860 00000B40 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 10861                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10862                                  
 10863                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10864                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 10865                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 10866                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10867                                  
 10868                                  dskerr:					
 10869 00000B42 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 10870 00000B47 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 10871 00000B49 E82F0D                  		call	checkio
 10872                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 10873 00000B4C 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 10874 00000B51 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 10875 00000B53 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 10876 00000B56 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 10877                                  dochkagain:				
 10878 00000B5B E8AA00                  		call	again
 10879                                  dskerr0:				
 10880 00000B5E 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 10881 00000B60 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10882                                  					; fnon_removable
 10883 00000B65 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 10884 00000B67 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 10885 00000B6A 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 10886                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 10887 00000B6C 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 10888 00000B6F 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 10889 00000B71 C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 10890                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 10891                                  dskerr1:				
 10892 00000B77 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 10893                                  		;jmp	retry
 10894                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10895 00000B78 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 10896                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10897                                  
 10898                                  write_fault_err:			
 10899 00000B7B BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 10900                                  					; for write fault error.
 10901 00000B7E EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 10902                                  
 10903                                  		; fall into harderr
 10904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10905                                  
 10906                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 10907                                  
 10908                                  harderr:				
 10909 00000B80 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 10910                                  harderr2:				
 10911 00000B83 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 10912                                  					; force a media check through rom
 10913 00000B88 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 10914 00000B8C 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 10915                                  
 10916                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 10917                                  
 10918                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 10919                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10920 00000B90 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 10921                                  
 10922                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10923                                  
 10924                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 10925                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 10926                                  
 10927                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10928                                  normspeed:
 10929 00000B93 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10930 00000B98 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 10931 00000B9A 06                      		push	es
 10932 00000B9B 50                      		push	ax
 10933 00000B9C A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 10934 00000B9F C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 10935 00000BA3 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10936 00000BA7 58                      		pop	ax
 10937 00000BA8 07                      		pop	es
 10938 00000BA9 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 10939 00000BAC 06                      		push	es
 10940 00000BAD C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 10941 00000BB1 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10942                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 10943 00000BB6 07                      		pop	es
 10944 00000BB7 C3                      		retn
 10945                                  
 10946                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10947                                  
 10948                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 10949                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 10950                                  
 10951                                  fastspeed:		
 10952 00000BB8 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 10953                                  					; ftoobig
 10954 00000BBD 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 10955 00000BBF 06                      		push	es
 10956 00000BC0 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 10957 00000BC4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 10958 00000BC6 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 10959 00000BCA 07                      		pop	es
 10960 00000BCB C3                      		retn
 10961                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10962                                  
 10963                                  notready:				
 10964 00000BCC F9                      		stc
 10965 00000BCD B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 10966 00000BCF C3                      		retn
 10967                                  
 10968                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10969                                  
 10970                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 10971                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 10972                                  
 10973                                  maperror:	
 10974 00000BD0 51                      		push	cx
 10975 00000BD1 06                      		push	es
 10976 00000BD2 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 10977 00000BD3 07                      		pop	es
 10978 00000BD4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 10979 00000BD6 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 10980 00000BD9 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 10981                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 10982 00000BDC BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 10983 00000BDF F2AE                    		repne scasb
 10984                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10985 00000BE1 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 10986                                  					; get translation
 10987                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 10988                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 10989 00000BE4 07                      		pop	es
 10990 00000BE5 59                      		pop	cx
 10991 00000BE6 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 10992 00000BE7 C3                      		retn
 10993                                  
 10994                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10995                                  
 10996                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 10997                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 10998                                  
 10999                                  set_tim:		
 11000 00000BE8 50                      		push	ax
 11001 00000BE9 E88EF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11002                                  
 11003                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11004                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11005                                  
 11006 00000BEC 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11007 00000BF0 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11008 00000BF2 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11009                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11010                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11011 00000BF6 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11012                                  setaccess:				
 11013 00000BF8 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11014 00000BFD 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11015 00000C01 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11016                                  done_set:				
 11017 00000C05 F8                      		clc
 11018                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11019 00000C06 58                      		pop	ax
 11020 00000C07 C3                      		retn
 11021                                  
 11022                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11023                                  
 11024                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11025                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11026                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11027                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11028                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11029                                  
 11030                                  again:	
 11031 00000C08 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11032 00000C0B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11033 00000C0E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11034                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11035 00000C10 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11036 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 11037                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11038                                  
 11039                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11040 00000C12 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11041 00000C14 C3                      		retn
 11042

 11052                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11053                                  ;
 11054                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11055                                  ;
 11056                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11057                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11058                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11059                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11060                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11061                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11062                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11063                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11064                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11065                                  
 11066                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 11067                                  
 11068                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11069                                  
 11070                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11071 00000C15 00                      		db 0
 11072                                  
 11073                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 11074                                  %if 0
 11075                                  
 11076                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11077                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11078                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	;gh ReadTrack
 11079                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 11080                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11081                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11082                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11083                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 11084                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11085                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11086                                  
 11087                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11088                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11089                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11090                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11091                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11092                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11093                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11094                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 11095                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11096                                  
 11097                                  %endif
 11098                                  
 11099                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11100 00000C16 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8
 11101 00000C17 [810C]                  		dw GetDeviceParameters	; 60h
 11102 00000C19 [BC0E]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 11103 00000C1B [5C0E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 11104 00000C1D [7D0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11105 00000C1F [7D0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11106 00000C21 [7D0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11107 00000C23 [5D11]                  		dw GetMediaId		; 66h
 11108 00000C25 [2912]                  		dw GetAccessFlag	; 67h ; unpublished function
 11109 00000C27 [7B12]                  		dw SenseMediaType	; 68h
 11110                                  
 11111 00000C29 08                      IoWriteJumpTable: db ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 7
 11112 00000C2A [CC0C]                  		dw SetDeviceParameters	; 40h
 11113 00000C2C [C30E]                  		dw WriteTrack		; 41h
 11114 00000C2E [970D]                  		dw FormatTrack		; 42h
 11115 00000C30 [7D0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11116 00000C32 [7D0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11117 00000C34 [7D0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11118 00000C36 [9311]                  		dw SetMediaId		; 46h
 11119 00000C38 [3F12]                  		dw SetAccessFlag	; 47h ; unpublished function
 11120                                  
 11121                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11122                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 11123                                  ;
 11124                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 11125                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.
 11126                                  ; Added for 5.00
 11127                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11128                                  
 11129 00000C3A 60                      IOC_DC_Table:	db 60h			; GET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 11130 00000C3B 40                      		db 40h			; SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 11131 00000C3C 61                      		db 61h			; READ_TRACK
 11132 00000C3D 41                      		db 41h			; WRITE_TRACK
 11133 00000C3E 62                      		db 62h			; VERIFY_TRACK
 11134 00000C3F 42                      		db 42h			; FORMAT_TRACK
 11135 00000C40 66                      		db 66h			; GET_MEDIA_ID
 11136 00000C41 46                      		db 46h			; SET_MEDIA_ID
 11137 00000C42 67                      		db 67h			; GET_ACCESS_FLAG
 11138 00000C43 47                      		db 47h			; SET_ACCESS_FLAG
 11139 00000C44 68                      		db 68h			; SENSE_MEDIA_TYPE
 11140                                  
 11141                                  ;IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN EQU $ - IOC_DC_Table
 11142

 11147                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11148                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11149                                  ;
 11150                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11151                                  ;
 11152                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11153                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11154                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11155                                  ;
 11156                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11157                                  
 11158                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11159                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11160                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11161 00000C45 E883F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11162 00000C48 06                      		push	es
 11163 00000C49 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11164 00000C4D 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11165                                  					; RAWIO
 11166 00000C52 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11167 00000C56 07                      		pop	es
 11168 00000C57 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11169                                  
 11170                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11171                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11172                                  
 11173                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11174 00000C59 BE[160C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11175                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11176                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11177 00000C5C A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11178 00000C5E 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11179                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11180 00000C60 BE[290C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11181                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11182                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11183                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11184 00000C63 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11185 00000C65 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11186 00000C67 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11187 00000C6A 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11188 00000C6C 98                      		cbw
 11189 00000C6D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11190 00000C6F 46                      		inc	si
 11191 00000C70 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11192 00000C72 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11193                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11194 00000C75 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11195                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11196                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11197 00000C7A B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11198 00000C7C C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11199                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11200                                  
 11201                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11202                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11203                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11204 00000C7D 5A                      		pop	dx
 11205                                  
 11206                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11207 00000C7E E954F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11208                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11209                                  
 11210                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11211                                  
 11212                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11213                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11214                                  ;
 11215                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11216                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11217                                  ;
 11218                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11219                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11220                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11221                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11222                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11223                                  
 11224                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11225                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11226                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11227                                  
 11228 00000C81 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11229 00000C85 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11230                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11231 00000C88 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11232 00000C8C 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11233 00000C8F 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11234 00000C93 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11235                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11236 00000C96 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11237 00000C99 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11238 00000C9D 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11239 00000CA0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11240 00000CA2 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11241                                  					
 11242                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11243 00000CA5 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11244 00000CA8 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11245                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11246 00000CAB 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11247 00000CAD 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11248 00000CAE 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11249                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11250                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11251                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11252 00000CB3 E885FB                  		call	checksingle
 11253 00000CB6 E83EF9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11254 00000CB9 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11255 00000CBA 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11256 00000CBC 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11257                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11258                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11259 00000CBF 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11260                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11261 00000CC2 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11262                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11263 00000CC5 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11264 00000CC6 06                      		push	es
 11265 00000CC7 1F                      		pop	ds
 11266 00000CC8 07                      		pop	es
 11267 00000CC9 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11268                                  		
 11269                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11270                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11271                                  		;clc
 11272                                  GetParmRet:				
 11273 00000CCB C3                      		retn
 11274                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11275                                  
 11276                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11277                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11278                                  
 11279                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11280                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 11281                                  ;
 11282                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11283                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11284                                  
 11285                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11286                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h
 11287 00000CCC C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11288 00000CD0 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11289 00000CD3 26814D234001            		or	word [es:di+23h], 140h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11290                                  					; fchanged_by_format|fchanged
 11291 00000CD9 F60702                  		test	byte [bx], 2	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11292                                  					; ONLY_SET_TRACKLAYOUT
 11293 00000CDC 7579                    		jnz	short setTrackTable
 11294 00000CDE 8A4701                  		mov	al, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11295 00000CE1 26884522                		mov	[es:di+34], al	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11296 00000CE5 8B4704                  		mov	ax, [bx+4]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11297 00000CE8 26894525                		mov	[es:di+37], ax	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11298 00000CEC 8B4702                  		mov	ax, [bx+2]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11299 00000CEF 1E                      		push	ds
 11300                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11301 00000CF0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11302                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11303                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11304                                  		;cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11305 00000CF5 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11306 00000CFA 1F                      		pop	ds
 11307 00000CFB 7502                    		jnz	short HaveChange ; we have changeline support
 11308                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11309 00000CFD 24FD                    		and	al, 0FDh
 11310                                  		;and	ax, 0FFFDh	; ~fchangeline
 11311                                  
 11312                                  		; Ignore all bits except non_removable and changeline
 11313                                  HaveChange:				
 11314 00000CFF 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable|fchangeline
 11315 00000D02 268B4D23                		mov	cx, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11316 00000D06 81E1F4FD                		and	cx, 0FDF4h	; ~(fnon_removable|fchangeline|good_tracklayout|unformatted_media)
 11317 00000D0A 09C8                    		or	ax, cx
 11318 00000D0C 26894523                		mov	[es:di+35], ax	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11319 00000D10 8A4706                  		mov	al, [bx+6]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11320                                  					; Set media type
 11321 00000D13 1E                      		push	ds
 11322 00000D14 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11323                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11324 00000D19 A2[3706]                		mov	[mediatype], al
 11325                                  		;mov	ds:mediatype, al
 11326 00000D1C 1F                      		pop	ds
 11327                                  
 11328                                  		; The media changed (maybe) so we will have to do a set dasd
 11329                                  		; the next time we format a track
 11330                                  
 11331                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11332 00000D1D 26804D2380              		or	byte [es:di+35], 80h
 11333                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11334                                  					; set_dasd_true
 11335 00000D22 57                      		push	di		; Save bds pointer
 11336                                  
 11337                                  		; Figure out what we are supposed to do with the bpb
 11338                                  		; were we asked to install a fake bpb?
 11339                                  
 11340 00000D23 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11341                                  					; INSTALL_FAKE_BPB
 11342 00000D26 7514                    		jnz	short InstallFakeBpb
 11343                                  
 11344                                  		; were we returning a fake bpb when asked to build a bpb?
 11345                                  
 11346                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11347 00000D28 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+35], 4
 11348                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11349                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 11350 00000D2D 7405                    		jz	short InstallRecommendedBpb
 11351                                  
 11352                                  		; we were returning a fake bpb but we can stop now
 11353                                  
 11354                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11355 00000D2F 26806523FB              		and	byte [es:di+35], 0FBh
 11356                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FFFBh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11357                                  					; ~return_fake_bpb
 11358                                  InstallRecommendedBpb:			
 11359 00000D34 B91F00                  		mov	cx, 31		; A_BPB.size
 11360 00000D37 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB] = [di+BDS.rbytespersec]
 11361 00000D3A EB0B                    		jmp	short CopyTheBpb
 11362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11363                                  
 11364                                  InstallFakeBpb:
 11365                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11366 00000D3C 26804D2304              		or	byte [es:di+35], 4				
 11367                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 4 ; byte [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11368                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 11369 00000D41 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11370                                  					; move 'smaller' bpb
 11371 00000D44 8D7D06                  		lea	di, [di+6]	; [es:di+BDS.BPB] = [es:di+BDS.bytespersec]
 11372                                  
 11373                                  CopyTheBpb:				
 11374 00000D47 8D7707                  		lea	si, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11375 00000D4A F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11376 00000D4C 1E                      		push	ds		; Save packet segment
 11377                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11378 00000D4D 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11379                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11380                                  					; Setup	for ds -> Bios_Data
 11381 00000D52 E8DA03                  		call	RestoreOldDpt	; Restore the old Dpt from TempDpt
 11382 00000D55 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore packet segment
 11383 00000D56 5F                      		pop	di		; Restore bds pointer
 11384                                  setTrackTable:				
 11385 00000D57 8B4F26                  		mov	cx, [bx+38]
 11386 00000D5A 1E                      		push	ds
 11387 00000D5B 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11388 00000D60 890E[3905]              		mov	[sectorspertrack], cx
 11389 00000D64 1F                      		pop	ds
 11390                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11391 00000D65 26806523F7              		and	byte [es:di+35], 0F7h
 11392                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FFF7h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11393                                  					; ~good_tracklayout
 11394 00000D6A F60704                  		test	byte [bx], 4	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11395                                  					; TRACKLAYOUT_IS_GOOD
 11396 00000D6D 7405                    		jz	short UglyTrackLayOut
 11397                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11398 00000D6F 26804D2308              		or	byte [es:di+35], 8
 11399                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11400                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11401                                  UglyTrackLayOut:			
 11402 00000D74 83F93F                  		cmp	cx, 63		; MAX_SECTORS_IN_TRACK
 11403 00000D77 771A                    		ja	short TooManyPerTrack
 11404                                  		;jcxz	short SectorInfoSaved
 11405 00000D79 E316                    		jcxz	SectorInfoSaved	; 19/10/2022
 11406 00000D7B BF[3B05]                		mov	di, tracktable
 11407 00000D7E 8D7728                  		lea	si, [bx+40]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SECTORTABLE]
 11408                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11409 00000D81 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11410                                  		;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11411                                  					; Trash	our bds	pointer
 11412                                  StoreSectorInfo:			
 11413 00000D86 47                      		inc	di
 11414 00000D87 47                      		inc	di		; Skip over cylinder and head
 11415 00000D88 AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector id
 11416 00000D89 AA                      		stosb			; Copy it
 11417 00000D8A AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector size
 11418 00000D8B E8E301                  		call	SectSizeToSectIndex
 11419 00000D8E AA                      		stosb			; Store	sector SIZE index
 11420 00000D8F E2F5                    		loop	StoreSectorInfo
 11421                                  SectorInfoSaved:			
 11422 00000D91 F8                      		clc
 11423 00000D92 C3                      		retn
 11424                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11425                                  
 11426                                  TooManyPerTrack:			
 11427 00000D93 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch
 11428 00000D95 F9                      		stc
 11429 00000D96 C3                      		retn
 11430                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11431                                  
 11432                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11433                                  
 11434                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11435                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11436                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11437                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11438                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11439                                  ;
 11440                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11441                                  ;
 11442                                  ; output:
 11443                                  ;	for status call:
 11444                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11445                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11446                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11447                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11448                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11449                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11450                                  ;
 11451                                  ;	for format track:

 11505                                  					; about	the illegal combination)

 11518 00000DF1 88CC                    		mov	ah, cl

 11527                                  FormatRetry:

 11538                                  					;	set ES:BX to 00:00

 11594

 11599                                  					; Get option flag word

 11604 00000E7C 8B0E[3905]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 11605                                  
 11606                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11607                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11608                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11609                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11610                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11611                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11612                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11613                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11614                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11615                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11616                                  		; register.
 11617                                  
 11618                                  					; Special function requested?

 11620 00000E83 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 11621 00000E85 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get ax = number of trks to verify
 11622 00000E87 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11623 00000E89 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 11624 00000E8B F6E1                    		mul	cl
 11625 00000E8D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11626 00000E8F 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 11627 00000E91 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 11628                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11629 00000E93 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 11630                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11631                                  					; fnon_removable
 11632 00000E98 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 11633                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?
 11634                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11635                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11636 00000E9A F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11637                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11638                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11639 00000E9F 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 11640 00000EA1 C606[3605]01            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1
 11641                                  NormVerifyTrack:

 11693                                  
 11694                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 11695                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 11696                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 11697                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 11698                                  		
 11699                                  		; 19/10/2022	
 11700 00000EC8 06                      		push	es
 11701 00000EC9 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	-> to request header
 11702 00000ECD 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11703 00000ED1 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 11704 00000ED5 A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax
 11705 00000ED8 268B4701                		mov	ax, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_HEAD]
 11706 00000EDC A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; Assume heads < 256!!!
 11707 00000EDF 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 11708 00000EE3 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 11709 00000EE7 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 11710                                  					; Get transfer address
 11711                                  
 11712                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 11713                                  
 11714 00000EEB 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; Pass transfer	segment
 11715 00000EEF 07                      		pop	es
 11716                                  
 11717                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 11718                                  
 11719                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11720                                  
 11721                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11722                                  
 11723                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11724                                  ;
 11725                                  ; TrackIo:
 11726                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11727                                  ;
 11728                                  ;   input:
 11729                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11730                                  ;		  3 = write
 11731                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11732                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11733                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11734                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11735                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11736                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11737                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11738                                  ;
 11739                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11740                                  
 11741                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11742                                  		
 11743                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11744                                  TrackIo:	
 11745                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11746 00000EF0 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11747 00000EF4 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11748 00000EF7 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11749                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11750 00000EFC 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11751 00000EFE 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11752 00000EFF 51                      		push	cx
 11753 00000F00 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11754 00000F03 59                      		pop	cx
 11755 00000F04 58                      		pop	ax
 11756                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11757 00000F05 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11758 00000F08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11759 00000F0A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11760 00000F0C 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11761                                  
 11762                                  		; WE WANT:
 11763                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11764                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11765                                  		
 11766 00000F0E BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11767                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11768 00000F11 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11769                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11770                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11771 00000F16 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11772                                  		
 11773 00000F18 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11774                                  ionextsector:				
 11775 00000F1A 51                      		push	cx
 11776 00000F1B 52                      		push	dx
 11777 00000F1C 46                      		inc	si
 11778 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11779                                  					; the track table
 11780 00000F1E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11781 00000F1F A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11782                                  
 11783                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11784                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11785                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11786                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11787                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11788                                  		
 11789                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11790 00000F22 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11791                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11792                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11793 00000F27 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11794                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11795 00000F29 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11796                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11797                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11798 00000F2E 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11799 00000F30 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11800 00000F34 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11801 00000F36 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 11802 00000F39 5A                      		pop	dx
 11803 00000F3A 59                      		pop	cx
 11804 00000F3B F8                      		clc
 11805 00000F3C C3                      		retn
 11806                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11807                                  
 11808                                  IoRemovable:				
 11809 00000F3D AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11810                                  					; table	and save it
 11811 00000F3E 50                      		push	ax
 11812 00000F3F 56                      		push	si
 11813 00000F40 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11814 00000F41 50                      		push	ax
 11815 00000F42 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11816                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11817 00000F46 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11818 00000F4A 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11819 00000F4D 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11820 00000F50 58                      		pop	ax
 11821 00000F51 1F                      		pop	ds
 11822 00000F52 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11823 00000F54 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11824 00000F57 E8FCFA                  		call	Disk
 11825 00000F5A 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 11826                                  					; sector size
 11827 00000F5B 58                      		pop	ax
 11828 00000F5C E81D00                  		call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 11829 00000F5F 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 11830 00000F61 5A                      		pop	dx
 11831 00000F62 59                      		pop	cx
 11832 00000F63 E2B5                    		loop	ionextsector
 11833 00000F65 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11834                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 11835                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11836 00000F6A 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 11837 00000F6C E872FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 11838                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 11839                                  NoNeedDone:				
 11840 00000F6F F8                      		clc
 11841                                  NoNeedDone2:
 11842 00000F70 C3                      		retn
 11843                                  
 11844                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11845                                  
 11846                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11847                                  ;
 11848                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11849                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11850                                  ; are permissible.
 11851                                  ;
 11852                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11853                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11854                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11855                                  ;
 11856                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11857                                  
 11858                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 11859 00000F71 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 11860                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11861 00000F74 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11862 00000F76 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11863 00000F78 C3                      		retn
 11864                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11865                                  
 11866                                  OneK:					
 11867 00000F79 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 11868 00000F7B C3                      		retn
 11869                                  
 11870                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11871                                  
 11872                                  
 11873                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 11874 00000F7C 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 11875 00000F7E B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 11876 00000F81 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 11877 00000F83 C3                      		retn
 11878                                  
 11879                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11880                                  
 11881                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11882                                  
 11883                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11884                                  ;
 11885                                  ; SetDASD
 11886                                  ;
 11887                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 11888                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 11889                                  ;
 11890                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 11891                                  ;
 11892                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11893                                  
 11894                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11895                                  SetDasd:	
 11896 00000F84 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 11897                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 11898 00000F89 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 11899                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11900 00000F8B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 11901                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11902                                  					; set_dasd_true
 11903 00000F90 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 11904                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11905 00000F92 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 11906                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11907                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 11908                                  DoSetDasd:

 11910 00000F9C C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 11911 00000FA1 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 11912 00000FA3 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11913                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 11914 00000FA8 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 11915 00000FAA 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11916                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 11917 00000FAF 7404                    		jz	short GotBig

 11919 00000FB3 EB0F                    		jmp	short DoSet

 11922                                  GotBig:

 11924 00000FB7 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 11925 00000FBC 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 11926                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 11927                                  		; 10/12/2022

 11929                                  		; 18/12/2022

 11932                                  DoSet:

 11934 00000FC5 56                      		push	si

 11936                                  
 11937 00000FCA C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 11938                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 11939                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 11940

 11943 00000FD2 5E                      		pop	si
 11944 00000FD3 1F                      		pop	ds
 11945 00000FD4 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 11946 00000FD6 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 11947 00000FDA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 11948                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 11949                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 11950 00000FDC 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11951 00000FE0 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
