 11954                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11955                                  
 11956                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11957                                  
 11958                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11959                                  ;
 11960                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 11961                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 11962                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 11963                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 11964                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 11965                                  ;
 11966                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 11967                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 11968                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 11969                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 11970                                  ;
 11971                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 11972                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 11973                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 11974                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 11975                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 11976                                  ;
 11977                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11978                                  
 11979                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11980                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 11981 00000FE5 51                      		push	cx
 11982 00000FE6 52                      		push	dx
 11983                                  
 11984                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 11985                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 11986                                  
 11987 00000FE7 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11988 00000FEC 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 11989 00000FEE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 11990 00000FF0 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11991 00000FF5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 11992 00000FF7 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 11993                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11994                                  
 11995                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 11996 00000FF9 06                      		push	es
 11997 00000FFA 56                      		push	si
 11998 00000FFB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 11999 00000FFF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12000                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12001                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12002 00001004 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12003 00001008 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12004                                  
 12005                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12006                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12007                                  
 12008 0000100C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12009 00001011 5E                      		pop	si
 12010 00001012 07                      		pop	es
 12011                                  
 12012                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12013 00001013 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12014 00001017 49                      		dec	cx
 12015 00001018 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12016 0000101B D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12017 0000101D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12018 0000101F 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12019 00001021 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12020 00001025 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12021 00001029 06                      		push	es
 12022 0000102A 1E                      		push	ds
 12023 0000102B 56                      		push	si
 12024 0000102C 57                      		push	di
 12025 0000102D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12026 0000102F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12027                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12028 00001031 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12029 00001033 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12030 00001038 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12031 0000103A 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12032 0000103B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12033 0000103F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12034                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12035                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12036 00001044 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12037 00001048 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12038 0000104C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12039                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12040 00001050 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12041                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12042 00001055 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12043 0000105A C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12044                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 12045 0000105F 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12046                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12047 00001061 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12048 00001064 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12049                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12050                                  
 12051                                  FormaStatErr:
 12052                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12053 00001066 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12054                                  				
 12055 00001068 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12056                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12057 0000106B 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12058 0000106D 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12059 00001070 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12060                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12061                                  		;dec	al
 12062                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12063 00001072 48                      		dec	ax
 12064                                  		; al = 2
 12065                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12066                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12067                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12068                                  
 12069                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 12070                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12071                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12072                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12073 00001073 48                      		dec	ax
 12074                                  		; al = 2				
 12075                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12076                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12077                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12078                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12079                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12080                                  
 12081                                  FormatStatTimeOut:			
 12082                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12083                                  		; al = 3
 12084                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 12085                                  					; Media	not present.
 12086                                  PopStatRet:

 12088 00001075 5E                      		pop	si
 12089 00001076 1F                      		pop	ds

 12097                                  
 12098                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12099                                  
 12100                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12101                                  ;
 12102                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12103                                  ;
 12104                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12105                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12106                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12107                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12108                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12109                                  ;
 12110                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12111                                  
 12112                                  ResetDisk:	
 12113 0000107B 50                      		push	ax
 12114 0000107C 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12115                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12116 00001081 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12117                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12118 00001083 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12119                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12120 00001088 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12121 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12122                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12123 0000108C C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12124                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12125 00001091 58                      		pop	ax
 12126 00001092 C3                      		retn

 12128                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12129                                  
 12130                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12131                                  
 12132                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12133                                  ;
 12134                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12135                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12136                                  ;
 12137                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12138                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12139                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12140                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12141                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12142                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12143                                  ;
 12144                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12145                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12146                                  ;
 12147                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12148                                  
 12149                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12150                                  ToRom:	
 12151 00001093 53                      		push	bx
 12152 00001094 56                      		push	si
 12153                                  
 12154                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12155                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12156                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12157                                  
 12158 00001095 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12159 0000109A 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12160 0000109C 50                      		push	ax
 12161 0000109D 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12162 0000109E 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12163                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12164 000010A3 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12165 000010A4 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12166                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12167 000010A8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12168                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12169                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12170 000010AD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12171 000010B1 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12172                                  		
 12173 000010B5 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12174 000010B8 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12175 000010BC A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12176 000010BF 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12177                                  					; Important for	format
 12178 000010C3 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12179                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12180                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12181 000010C8 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12182 000010C9 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12183 000010CB 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12184                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12185 000010D0 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12186 000010D1 58                      		pop	ax
 12187                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12188 000010D2 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12189 000010D6 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12190 000010D8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12191 000010DC 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12192 000010E0 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12193 000010E1 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12194 000010E5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12195 000010E7 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12196 000010E8 5E                      		pop	si
 12197 000010E9 5B                      		pop	bx
 12198 000010EA C3                      		retn

 12200                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12201                                  
 12202                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12203                                  
 12204                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12205                                  
 12206                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12207                                  ;
 12208                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12209                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12210                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12211                                  ;
 12212                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12213                                  
 12214                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12215                                  ioctl_getown:
 12216 000010EB E8DDF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12217 000010EE 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12218                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12219 000010F2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12220                                  ownloop:				
 12221 000010F6 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12222 000010FA 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12223                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12224 000010FC 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12225                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12226                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12227 00001101 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12228                                  getnextBDS:				
 12229 00001103 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12230 00001106 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12231                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12232                                  
 12233                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12234                                  ;
 12235                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12236                                  ; in al to al.
 12237                                  ;
 12238                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12239                                  
 12240                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12241                                  ioctl_setown:
 12242 00001108 E8C0F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12243 0000110B C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12244                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12245 00001110 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12246 00001113 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12247                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12248                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12249                                  
 12250                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12251                                  ;
 12252                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12253                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12254                                  ;
 12255                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12256                                  
 12257                                  exitown:				
 12258 00001118 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12259                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12260 0000111A 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12261                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12262                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12263 0000111F 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12264 00001121 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12265                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12266                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12267 00001125 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12268                                  exitnomult:				
 12269 00001127 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12270 0000112B 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12271                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12272                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12273                                  		; cf=0
 12274                                  		;clc
 12275 0000112E C3                      		retn
 12276                                  
 12277                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12278                                  
 12279                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12280                                  
 12281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12282                                  ;
 12283                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 12284                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 12285                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 12286                                  ;
 12287                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12288                                  
 12289                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12290                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 12291                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 12292                                  		; do not do it again.
 12293                                  	
 12294 0000112F 50                      		push	ax

 12308 00001149 268E06[1A00]            		mov	es, [es:zeroseg]
 12309                                  		;mov	es, es:zeroseg	; CAS -- bleeeech!
 12310                                  
 12311                                  		;mov	es:78h,	si	; [es:DSKADR]
 12312 0000114E 2689367800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], si
 12313                                  		;mov	word ptr es:7Ah, ds ; [es:DSKADR+2]

 12326

 12328                                  
 12329                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12330                                  ;	get media id
 12331                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12332                                  ;
 12333                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12334                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12335                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12336                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12337                                  ;
 12338                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12339                                  ;
 12340                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12341                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12342                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12343                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12344                                  ;
 12345                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12346                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12347                                  ;
 12348                                  ; LOGIC:
 12349                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12350                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12351                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12352                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12353                                  ;
 12354                                  ; {
 12355                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12356                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12357                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12358                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12359                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12360                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12361                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12362                                  ;		};
 12363                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12364                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12365                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12366                                  ;		};
 12367                                  ;	else
 12368                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12369                                  ;
 12370                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12371                                  
 12372                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12373                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12374                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12375                                  
 12376                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12377                                  GetMediaId:
 12378 0000115D E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12379 00001160 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12380 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12381 00001169 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12382 0000116C 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12383                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12384 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12385                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12386 00001173 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12387                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12388 00001175 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12389 00001178 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12390                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12391                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12392 0000117B 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12393 0000117D C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12394 00001181 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12395                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12396 00001185 46                      		inc	si
 12397                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12398                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12399 00001186 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12400 00001189 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12401                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12402                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12403 0000118C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12404                                  	
 12405                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12406                                  		; cf = 0
 12407                                  		;clc
 12408                                  
 12409 0000118E C3                      		retn
 12410                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12411                                  
 12412                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12413 0000118F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12414 00001191 F9                      		stc
 12415                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12416 00001192 C3                      		retn
 12417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12418                                  
 12419                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12420                                  
 12421                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12422                                  ;  set media id
 12423                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12424                                  
 12425                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12426                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12427                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12428                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12429                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12430                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12431                                  ;
 12432                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12433                                  ;
 12434                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12435                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12436                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12437                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12438                                  ;
 12439                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12440                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12441                                  ;
 12442                                  ; logic:
 12443                                  ;
 12444                                  ; {
 12445                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12446                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12447                                  ;	BootIo;
 12448                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12449                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12450                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12451                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12452                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12453                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12454                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12455                                  ;		};
 12456                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12457                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12458                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12459                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12460                                  ;		};
 12461                                  ;	else
 12462                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12463                                  ;
 12464                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12465                                  
 12466                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12467                                  SetMediaId:
 12468 00001193 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12469 00001196 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12470                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12471 0000119A 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12472 0000119C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12473 000011A1 52                      		push	dx
 12474 000011A2 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12475 000011A5 5A                      		pop	dx
 12476 000011A6 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12477                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12478 000011A8 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12479                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12480 000011AD 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12481 000011AF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12482                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12483 000011B4 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12484 000011B6 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12485 000011B7 57                      		push	di
 12486 000011B8 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12487 000011B9 07                      		pop	es
 12488 000011BA BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12489 000011BD C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12490 000011C1 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12491 000011C4 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12492 000011C7 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12493                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12494                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12495 000011CA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12496 000011CC 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12497 000011CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12498 000011CE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12499 000011CF 07                      		pop	es
 12500 000011D0 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12501 000011D3 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12502 000011D5 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12503 000011DA E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12504 000011DD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12505                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12506                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12507 000011E2 C3                      		retn
 12508                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12509                                  
 12510                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12511 000011E3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12512 000011E5 F9                      		stc
 12513                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12514 000011E6 C3                      		retn
 12515                                  
 12516                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12517                                  
 12518                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12519                                  
 12520                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12521                                  ;	BootIo
 12522                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12523                                  ;
 12524                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12525                                  ;
 12526                                  ; input :
 12527                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12528                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12529                                  ;
 12530                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12531                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12532                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12533                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12534                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12535                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12536                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12537                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12538                                  ;
 12539                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12540                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12541                                  ;
 12542                                  ; logic:
 12543                                  ;
 12544                                  ; {
 12545                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12546                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12547                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12548                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12549                                  ; }
 12550                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12551                                  
 12552                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12553                                  BootIo:	
 12554 000011E7 06                      		push	es
 12555 000011E8 57                      		push	di
 12556 000011E9 53                      		push	bx
 12557 000011EA 1E                      		push	ds
 12558 000011EB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12559                                  
 12560                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12561                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12562                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12563                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12564                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12565                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12566                                  
 12567 000011EC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12568 000011EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12569 000011F1 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12570 000011F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12571 000011F8 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12572 000011FB 5B                      		pop	bx
 12573 000011FC 5F                      		pop	di
 12574 000011FD 07                      		pop	es
 12575 000011FE C3                      		retn
 12576                                  
 12577                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12578                                  
 12579                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12580                                  
 12581                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12582                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12583                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12584                                  ;
 12585                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12586                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12587                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12588                                  ; history in the flags.
 12589                                  ;
 12590                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12591                                  ;
 12592                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12593                                  ;
 12594                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12595                                  ;
 12596                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12597                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12598                                  ;
 12599                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12600                                  
 12601                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12602 000011FF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12603 00001203 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12604 00001205 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12605                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12606 00001207 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12607                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12608                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12609 0000120C 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12610 0000120E 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12611 00001213 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12612 00001215 E80507                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12613 00001218 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12614                                  
 12615                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12616                                  
 12617 0000121A B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12618 0000121C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12619                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12620                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12621 0000121E 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12622 00001220 53                      		push	bx
 12623 00001221 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12624                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12625                                  					; physical drive
 12626 00001224 E8CF06                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12627 00001227 5B                      		pop	bx
 12628                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12629 00001228 C3                      		retn
 12630                                  
 12631                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12632                                  
 12633                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12634                                  
 12635                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12636                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12637                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12638                                  ;
 12639                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12640                                  ;
 12641                                  ; INPUT :
 12642                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12643                                  ;
 12644                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12645                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12646                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12647                                  
 12648                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12649                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12650 00001229 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12651 0000122D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12652                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12653                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12654 00001230 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12655                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12656 00001232 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12657                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12658                                  					; unformatted_media
 12659 00001237 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12660 00001239 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12661                                  
 12662                                  GafDone:				
 12663 0000123B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12664 0000123E C3                      		retn
 12665                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12666                                  
 12667                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12668                                  
 12669                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12670                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12671                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12672                                  ;
 12673                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12674                                  ;
 12675                                  ; input :
 12676                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12677                                  ;
 12678                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12679                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12680                                  
 12681                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12682                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12683 0000123F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12684 00001243 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12685                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12686 00001246 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12687                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12688                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12689 0000124B 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12690 0000124F 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12691                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12692 00001251 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12693                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12694                                  					; unformatted_media
 12695                                  saf_Done:				
 12696 00001256 C3                      		retn
 12697                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12698                                  
 12699                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12700                                  
 12701                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12702                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12703                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12704                                  ;
 12705                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12706                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12707                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12708                                  ;
 12709                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12710                                  
 12711                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12712                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12713 00001257 06                      		push	es
 12714 00001258 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12715 0000125C 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12716                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12717 00001260 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12718                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12719 00001262 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12720 00001264 0E                      		push	cs
 12721 00001265 07                      		pop	es
 12722 00001266 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12723                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12724 00001269 BF[3A0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12725                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12726                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12727 0000126C 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12728 0000126E F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12729 00001270 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12730 00001272 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12731                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12732                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12733                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12734                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12735                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12736                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12737                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12738 00001275 07                      		pop	es
 12739                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12740                                  		; cf = 0
 12741                                  		;clc
 12742 00001276 C3                      		retn
 12743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12744                                  nosupport:				
 12745 00001277 07                      		pop	es
 12746 00001278 E95AEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12747                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12748                                  
 12749                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12750                                  
 12751                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12752                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12753                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12754                                  ;
 12755                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12756                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12757                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12758                                  ;	    drive)
 12759                                  ;
 12760                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12761                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12762                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12763                                  ;
 12764                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12765                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12766                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12767                                  ;
 12768                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12769                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12770                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12771                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12772                                  ;
 12773                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12774                                  ;
 12775                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12776                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12777                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12778                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12779                                  ; 
 12780                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12781                                  
 12782                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12783                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12784 0000127B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12785 0000127F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12786                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12787                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12788 00001282 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12789 00001284 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12790                                  		;
 12791 00001286 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12792                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12793                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12794                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12795 0000128A B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12796                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12797 0000128C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12798 0000128E 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12799 00001290 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12800                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12801 00001292 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12802 00001294 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12803 00001296 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12804 00001298 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12805 0000129A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12806 0000129C 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12807 0000129E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12808 000012A0 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12809                                  GotMediaType:				
 12810 000012A2 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12811                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12812                                  		; cf = 0
 12813                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12814 000012A5 C3                      		retn

 12816

 12835                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12836                                  
 12837                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12838                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12839                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12840                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12841                                  
 12842                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12843                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12844                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12845                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12846                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12847                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12848                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12849                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12850                                  ;
 12851                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12852                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12853                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12854                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12855                                  ;
 12856                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12857                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12858                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12859                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12860                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12861                                  ;
 12862                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12863                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12864                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12865                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12866                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12867                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12868                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12869                                  
 12870                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12871                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12872                                  
 12873                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12874                                  
 12875                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12876 000012B8 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12877 000012BB 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12878 000012BD 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12879 000012C0 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12880                                  
 12881                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12882                                  
 12883 000012C2 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12884 000012C5 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 12885 000012C7 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 12886 000012CA 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12887 000012CC E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12888                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12889                                  
 12890                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12891 000012CF CF                      		iret
 12892                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12893                                  
 12894                                  int2f_replace_int13:

 12896 000012D1 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12897                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12898                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 12899                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12900 000012D3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12901                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12902                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12903                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12904                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12905                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 12906 000012D8 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 12907 000012DC FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 12908 000012E0 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 12909 000012E4 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 12910                                  
 12911                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 12912                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 12913                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 12914                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 12915 000012E8 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 12916 000012EC A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 12917 000012EF 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 12918 000012F3 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 12919                                  
 12920 000012F7 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 12921 000012F8 5B                      		pop	bx
 12922 000012F9 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 12923 000012FA 5A                      		pop	dx
 12924 000012FB 58                      		pop	ax

 12995                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 12996                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 12997                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 12998                                  
 12999                                  win386call:				
 13000 00001340 1E                      		push	ds
 13001 00001341 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13002                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13003                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13004 00001346 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13005                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13006 00001348 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13007 0000134A 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13008                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13009 0000134C 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13010                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13011 0000134E F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13012                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13013 00001351 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13014                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13015 00001353 8026[CE08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13016 00001358 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13017                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13018                                  
 13019                                  Win386Init:	
 13020                                  		; 12/12/2022

 13024                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present

 13027                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es

 13031 0000136C BB[9A08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13032 0000136F 1E                      		push	ds
 13033 00001370 07                      		pop	es
 13034                                  win_iret:

 13036                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022

 13040                                  handle_multmult:			
 13041 00001374 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13042 00001376 7515                    		jnz	short try_2
 13043 00001378 1E                      		push	ds
 13044 00001379 E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13045                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13046                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13047                                  		;dec	bx
 13048 0000137C BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13049 0000137F 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13050 00001381 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13051 00001383 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13052 00001385 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13053 00001387 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13054 00001389 43                      		inc	bx
 13055                                  try_1:

 13062 0000138F 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13063 00001391 1E                      		push	ds
 13064                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13065                                  		;xor	di, di
 13066                                  		;dec	di
 13067 00001392 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 13068 00001395 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 13069 00001397 E82900                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13070 0000139A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13071 0000139D 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 13072 0000139F F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 13073 000013A1 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 13074 000013A3 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 13075                                  		; 10/12/2022

 13086                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 13087                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13088 000013B1 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 13089                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 13090 000013B4 011E[F508]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 13091 000013B8 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA
