 14133 00001770 E894EA                  		call	con_flush	; flush out keyboard queue
 14134                                  					; call rom-bios
 14135 00001773 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 14136 00001775 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 14137                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 14138 00001777 5B                      		pop	bx
 14139                                  swpdsk9:				
 14140 00001778 5A                      		pop	dx
 14141 00001779 59                      		pop	cx
 14142 0000177A C3                      		retn
 14143                                  
 14144                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14145                                  
 14146                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14147                                  
 14148                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14149                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14150                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14151                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14152                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14153                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14154                                  
 14155                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14156 0000177B 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14157 0000177D 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14157 00001786 736B6574746520666F-
 14157 0000178F 7220647269766520   
 14158                                  
 14159                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14160 00001797 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14160 000017A0 65737320616E79206B-
 14160 000017A9 6579207768656E2072-
 14160 000017B2 656164790D0A       
 14161 000017B8 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14162                                  
 14163                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14164                                  
 14165                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14166                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14167                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14168                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14169                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14170                                  
 14171                                  chkopcnt:		
 14172 000017BA 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14173 000017BF C3                      		retn
 14174                                  
 14175                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14176                                  
 14177                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14178                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14179                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14180                                  ;
 14181                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14182                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14183                                  
 14184                                  mediacheck:	
 14185 000017C0 E878F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14186 000017C3 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14187 000017C5 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14188 000017C8 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14189 000017CA E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14190 000017CD 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14191 000017CF 50                      		push	ax
 14192 000017D0 52                      		push	dx
 14193 000017D1 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14194                                  					; set logical drive number
 14195 000017D5 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14196 000017D7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14197                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14198                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14199 000017D9 5A                      		pop	dx
 14200 000017DA 58                      		pop	ax
 14201 000017DB 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14202 000017DD BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14203                                  
 14204                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14205                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14206                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14207                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14208                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14209                                  ; status.
 14210                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14211 000017E0 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14212 000017E4 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14213                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14214                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14215                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14216                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14217 000017E8 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14218                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14219                                  
 14220                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14221                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14222                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14223                                  
 14224 000017EA 50                      		push	ax
 14225 000017EB 51                      		push	cx
 14226 000017EC 52                      		push	dx
 14227 000017ED E863ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14228 000017F0 5A                      		pop	dx
 14229 000017F1 59                      		pop	cx
 14230 000017F2 58                      		pop	ax
 14231 000017F3 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14232 000017F5 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14233                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14234 000017F7 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14235                                  mediaret:				
 14236 000017F9 C3                      		retn
 14237                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14238                                  
 14239                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14240                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14241                                  ; or write.
 14242                                  
 14243                                  mediadovolid:				
 14244 000017FA E8FAED                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14245 000017FD 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14246 000017FF E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14247 00001802 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14248 00001804 E9C9F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14249                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14250                                  
 14251                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14252                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14253                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14254                                  ; dos.
 14255                                  ;
 14256                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14257                                  
 14258                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14259                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14260                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14261                                  
 14262                                  checklatchio:	
 14263                                  
 14264                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14265                                  			
 14266 00001807 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14267 0000180A 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14268                                  
 14269                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14270                                  
 14271 0000180C E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14272 0000180F 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14273                                  
 14274                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14275                                  ; expensive verification.
 14276                                  
 14277 00001811 E8E3ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14278 00001814 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14279 00001816 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14280 00001819 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14281 0000181B 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14282 0000181D 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14283 0000181F E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14284                                  checklatchret:				
 14285 00001822 E8ABF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14286                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14287 00001825 F9                      		stc
 14288 00001826 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14289                                  checkret:				
 14290 00001827 C3                      		retn
 14291                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14292                                  
 14293                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14294                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14295                                  ;
 14296                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14297                                  
 14298                                  checkfatvid:				
 14299 00001828 E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14300 0000182B 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14301 0000182D 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14302                                  
 14303                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14304                                  
 14305                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14306                                  
 14307                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14308                                  
 14309                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14310                                  ;
 14311                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14312                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14313                                  ;
 14314                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14315                                  ;
 14316                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14317                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14318                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14319                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14320                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14321                                  ;
 14322                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14323                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14324                                  ; routine.)
 14325                                  ;
 14326                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14327                                  
 14328                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14329                                  check_vid:
 14330                                  
 14331                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14332                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14333                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14334                                  
 14335 0000182F 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14336                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14337                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14338 00001834 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14339 00001836 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14340 00001839 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14341 0000183B 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14342 0000183D 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14343                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14344 00001842 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14345                                  					; if not fat system
 14346 00001844 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14347 00001847 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14348 00001849 E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14349 0000184C BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14350                                  					; definitely changed
 14351 0000184F 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14352                                  
 14353 00001851 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14354                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14355 00001852 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14356                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14357                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14358                                  		;clc
 14359                                  checkfatret:				
 14360 00001855 C3                      		retn
 14361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14362                                  
 14363                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14364                                  changed_drv:
 14365 00001856 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14366 00001857 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14367                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14368 0000185C C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14369                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14370                                  
 14371                                  ; extended id check
 14372                                  
 14373                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14374                                  
 14375                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14376                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14377                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14378                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14379                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14380                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14381                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14382                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14383                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14384                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14385                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14386                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14387                                  ;
 14388                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14389                                  
 14390                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14391                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14392 0000185D 50                      		push	ax
 14393                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14394                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14395 0000185E A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14396 00001861 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14397 00001865 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14398 00001867 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14399 0000186A 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14400 0000186E 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14401 00001870 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14402                                  					; don't know
 14403 00001872 58                      		pop	ax
 14404 00001873 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14405                                  					; reset the flag
 14406                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14407                                  
 14408                                  ext_changed:				
 14409 00001875 58                      		pop	ax
 14410 00001876 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14411                                  					; disk changed!
 14412                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14413                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14414                                  		;clc
 14415 00001879 EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14416                                  
 14417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14418                                  
 14419                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14420                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14421                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14422                                  ;
 14423                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14424                                  
 14425                                  checkio:				
 14426 0000187B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14427 0000187E 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14428 00001880 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14429 00001883 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14430 00001885 E86FED                  		call	GetBp
 14431 00001888 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14432 0000188A E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14433 0000188D 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14434 0000188F 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14435 00001891 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14436 00001893 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14437 00001894 C3                      		retn
 14438                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14439                                  
 14440                                  checkioerr:				
 14441 00001895 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14442                                  
 14443                                  checkioret:				
 14444 00001898 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14445 00001899 E9E4F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14446                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14447                                  
 14448                                  no_error_map:				
 14449 0000189C E9E4F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14450                                  
 14451                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14452                                  
 14453                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14454                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14455                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14456                                  
 14457                                  returnvid:		
 14458 0000189F BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14459                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14460 000018A2 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14461 000018A5 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14462 000018A7 F9                      		stc
 14463 000018A8 C3                      		retn
 14464                                  
 14465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14466                                  
 14467                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14468                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14469                                  ;
 14470                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14471                                  ; **trashes si**
 14472                                  
 14473                                  media_set_vid:				
 14474 000018A9 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14475                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14476                                  
 14477                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14478                                  
 14479                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14480                                  
 14481                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14482                                  
 14483                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14484                                  vid_into_packet:
 14485 000018AC 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14486 000018AD C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14487 000018B1 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14488 000018B4 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14489 000018B6 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14490 000018B9 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14491 000018BC 1F                      		pop	ds
 14492                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14493 000018BD C3                      		retn
 14494                                  
 14495                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14496                                  
 14497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14498                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14499                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14500                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14501                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14502                                  ;
 14503                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14504                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14505                                  ;
 14506                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14507                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14508                                  ;		carry set
 14509                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14510                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14511                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14512                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14513                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14514                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14515                                  ;
 14516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14517                                  
 14518                                  hidensity:
 14519                                  
 14520                                  ; check for correct drive
 14521                                  		
 14522                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14523 000018BE 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14524                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14525                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14526 000018C3 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14527                                  
 14528                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14529                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14530                                  
 14531 000018C5 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14532 000018CA 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14533                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14534                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14535 000018CC 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14536 000018CF 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14537                                  
 14538                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14539                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14540                                  
 14541 000018D1 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14542                                  					; ffOther
 14543 000018D6 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14544 000018D8 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14545                                  					; ff288
 14546 000018DD 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14547 000018DF B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14548 000018E1 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14549                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14550                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14551 000018E4 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14552                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14553                                  					; 2 sides
 14554 000018E7 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14555                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14556                                  					; & head max
 14557 000018EA 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14558 000018ED E979ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14559                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14560                                  
 14561                                  Is720K:					
 14562 000018F0 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14563 000018F3 E93AED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14564                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14565                                  
 14566                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14567                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14568                                  		;retn
 14569                                  
 14570                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14571                                  
 14572                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14573                                  
 14574                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14575                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14576                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14577                                  ;
 14578                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14579                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14580                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14581                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14582                                  ;
 14583                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14584                                  ;
 14585                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14586                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14587                                  
 14588                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14589 000018F6 06                      		push	es
 14590 000018F7 57                      		push	di
 14591                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14592                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14593 000018F8 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14594                                  
 14595                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14596                                  
 14597                                  scan_bds:				
 14598 000018FC 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14599 00001900 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14600                                  
 14601                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14602                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14603                                  
 14604 00001902 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14605                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14606                                  get_next_bds:				
 14607 00001906 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14608                                  					; go to	next bds
 14609 00001909 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14610 0000190C 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14611 0000190E 5F                      		pop	di
 14612 0000190F 07                      		pop	es
 14613 00001910 C3                      		retn
 14614                                  
 14615                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14616                                  
 14617                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14618                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14619                                  ;
 14620                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14621                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14622                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14623                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14624                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14625                                  
 14626                                  checkromchange:	
 14627                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14628                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14629 00001911 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14630                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14631                                  					; fchanged
 14632 00001916 C3                      		retn
 14633                                  
 14634                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14635                                  
 14636                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14637                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14638                                  ;
 14639                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14640                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14641                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14642                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14643                                  
 14644                                  resetchanged:	
 14645                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14646                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14647 00001917 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14648                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14649                                  					; ~fchanged
 14650 0000191C C3                      		retn
 14651                                  
 14652                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14653                                  
 14654                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14655                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14656                                  ;
 14657                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14658                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14659                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14660                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14661                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14662                                  
 14663                                  haschange:
 14664                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14665                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14666 0000191D 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14667                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14668                                  					; fchangeline
 14669 00001922 C3                      		retn
 14670                                  
 14671                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14672                                  
 14673                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14674                                  
 14675                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14676                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14677                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14678                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14679                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14680                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14681                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14682                                  
 14683                                  ; set_volume_id
 14684                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14685                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14686                                  ;
 14687                                  ;   on entry:
 14688                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14689                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14690                                  ;
 14691                                  ;   on exit:
 14692                                  ;	carry clear:
 14693                                  ;	   successful call
 14694                                  ;	carry set
 14695                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14696                                  
 14697                                  set_volume_id:				
 14698 00001923 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14699 00001924 50                      		push	ax
 14700 00001925 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14701 00001928 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14702 0000192A E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14703 0000192D 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14704 0000192F E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14705 00001932 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14706                                  setvret:				
 14707                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14708                                  		; cf = 0
 14709                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14710 00001935 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14711 00001936 5A                      		pop	dx
 14712 00001937 C3                      		retn
 14713                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14714                                  
 14715                                  seterr:					
 14716 00001938 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14717 00001939 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14718 0000193A C3                      		retn
 14719                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14720 0000193B 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14721                                  
 14722                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14723                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14724                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14725                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14726                                  
 14727                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14728                                  
 14729                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14730                                  
 14731                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14732                                  ;
 14733                                  ;   on entry:
 14734                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14735                                  ;
 14736                                  ;   on exit:
 14737                                  ;	carry clear
 14738                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14739                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14740                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14741                                  ;
 14742                                  ;	carry set:
 14743                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14744                                  
 14745                                  read_volume_id:
 14746 0000193D 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14747 0000193E 51                      		push	cx
 14748 0000193F 53                      		push	bx
 14749 00001940 50                      		push	ax
 14750 00001941 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14751 00001942 57                      		push	di
 14752 00001943 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14753 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14754 00001945 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14755 00001948 BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14756 0000194B B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14757 0000194E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14758 00001950 5F                      		pop	di
 14759 00001951 07                      		pop	es
 14760 00001952 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14761                                  					; # of fats
 14762 00001956 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14763                                  					; sectors / fat
 14764 0000195A F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14765 0000195C 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14766                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14767                                  					;
 14768                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14769                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14770 00001960 2EA3[3B19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14771                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14772                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14773 00001964 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14774                                  					; # root dir entries
 14775 00001968 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14776 0000196A D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14777 0000196C 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14778                                  next_sec:				
 14779 0000196E 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14780 0000196F 2EA1[3B19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14781                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14782                                  					; get sector #
 14783 00001973 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14784                                  					; sectors / track
 14785 00001977 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14786 00001979 F7F1                    		div	cx
 14787                                  
 14788                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14789                                  
 14790 0000197B 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14791                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14792 0000197C 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14793 0000197E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14794 00001980 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14795                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14796 00001984 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14797 00001986 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14798 00001988 E8EEED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14799                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14800 0000198B 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14801 0000198D B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14802 00001990 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14803                                  fvid_loop:				
 14804 00001992 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14805 00001995 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14806 00001997 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14807 0000199A 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14808 0000199C 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14809 0000199F 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14810                                  ent_loop:				
 14811 000019A1 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14812 000019A4 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14813 000019A6 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14814 000019A7 2EFF06[3B19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14815                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14816                                  					; next sector
 14817 000019AC E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14818                                  notfound:				
 14819 000019AE 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14820 000019B0 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14821                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14822                                  
 14823                                  found_vid:				
 14824 000019B2 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14825 000019B3 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14826 000019B5 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14827 000019B6 57                      		push	di
 14828 000019B7 1E                      		push	ds
 14829 000019B8 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14830 000019B9 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14831 000019BC B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14832                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14833 000019BF F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14834 000019C1 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14835 000019C3 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14836 000019C4 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14837 000019C6 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14838 000019C7 07                      		pop	es
 14839                                  fvid_ret:				
 14840 000019C8 58                      		pop	ax
 14841                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14842                                  		; cf = 0
 14843                                  		;clc
 14844                                  rvidret:				
 14845 000019C9 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14846 000019CA 59                      		pop	cx
 14847 000019CB 5A                      		pop	dx
 14848 000019CC C3                      		retn
 14849                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14850                                  
 14851                                  no_vid:					
 14852 000019CD 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14853 000019CE EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14854                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14855                                  
 14856                                  readviderr:				
 14857 000019D0 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14858 000019D1 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14859 000019D2 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14860                                  
 14861                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14862                                  
 14863                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14864                                  ;
 14865                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14866                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14867                                  
 14868                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14869 000019D4 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14870 000019D5 56                      		push	si
 14871 000019D6 51                      		push	cx
 14872 000019D7 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14873                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14874 000019DA 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14875                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14876 000019DD B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14877 000019E0 FC                      		cld
 14878 000019E1 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14879 000019E3 59                      		pop	cx
 14880 000019E4 5E                      		pop	si
 14881 000019E5 5F                      		pop	di
 14882 000019E6 C3                      		retn
 14883                                  
 14884                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14885                                  
 14886                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14887                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14888                                  ;
 14889                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14890                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14891                                  
 14892                                  check_volume_id:	
 14893 000019E7 57                      		push	di
 14894 000019E8 51                      		push	cx
 14895 000019E9 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14896                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14897 000019EC 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14898                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14899 000019EF B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14900 000019F2 FC                      		cld
 14901 000019F3 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14902 000019F5 59                      		pop	cx
 14903 000019F6 5F                      		pop	di
 14904 000019F7 C3                      		retn
 14905                                  
 14906                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14907                                  
 14908                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14909                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14910                                  ;
 14911                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14912                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14913                                  ;
 14914                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14915                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14916                                  ;
 14917                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14918                                  
 14919                                  fat_check:		
 14920 000019F8 50                      		push	ax
 14921 000019F9 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14922 000019FB A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14923 000019FE 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14924                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14925 00001A02 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14926 00001A04 4E                      		dec	si
 14927                                  okret1:					
 14928 00001A05 58                      		pop	ax
 14929 00001A06 C3                      		retn
 14930                                  
 14931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14932                                  
 14933                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14934                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14935                                  
 14936                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14937                                  
 14938                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14939                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14940                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14941                                  
 14942                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14943                                  
 14944                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14945                                  		;db 0
 14946                                  
 14947                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14948                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14949                                  
 14950                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14951 00001A07 00<rep 9h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14952                                  %endif
 14953                                  
 14954                                  ;align 16
 14955                                  
 14956                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14957                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14958                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14959                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14960                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14961                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 14962                                  
 14963                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 14964                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
