 30138                                  	;;pop	di ; ?
 30139                                  	;pop	bx
 30140                                  
 30141 00002BFF C3                      	retn
 30142                                  
 30143                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30144                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 30145                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 30146                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 30147                                  ; A-F are considered valid iff gnradix is 16.
 30148                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30149                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 30150                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 30151                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 30152                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 30153                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30154                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 30155                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 30156                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 30157                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30158                                  
 30159                                  gnradix:
 30160 00002C00 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 30161                                  
 30162                                  toDigit:
 30163 00002C02 2E833E[002C]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 30164 00002C08 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 30165                                  
 30166                                  toDigit_hex:
 30167 00002C0A 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 30168 00002C0D 7209                    	jb	short td10
 30169 00002C0F 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 30170 00002C12 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'z' at all...
 30171 00002C14 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 30172                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 30173 00002C17 C3                      	retn
 30174                                  td10:	
 30175 00002C18 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 30176 00002C1B 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'?  Not a letter...
 30177 00002C1D 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 30178 00002C20 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'?  Not a digit.
 30179 00002C22 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 30180                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 30181 00002C25 C3                      	retn
 30182                                  toDigit_dec:
 30183                                  td20:	
 30184 00002C26 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 30185                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 30186 00002C29 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 30187 00002C2B 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 30188 00002C2E 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 30189 00002C30 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 30190                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 30191 00002C33 C3                      	retn
 30192                                  tdE:	
 30193 00002C34 F9                      	stc
 30194                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 30195 00002C35 C3                      	retn
 30196                                  
 30197                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30198                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 30199                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30200                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 30201                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 30202                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 30203                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 30204                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30205                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 30206                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 30207                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 30208                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30209                                  
 30210                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30211                                  
 30212                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30213                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 30214                                  
 30215                                  GetXNum:
 30216                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 30217                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30218                                  	;push	bx
 30219 00002C36 51                      	push	cx ; *
 30220                                  	;push	ds
 30221                                  
 30222 00002C37 FC                      	cld
 30223 00002C38 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 30224 00002C3A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 30225 00002C3C 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 30226 00002C3E 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 30227                                  
 30228 00002C40 2EC706[002C]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 30229                                  
 30230 00002C47 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 30231                                  	;call	toDigit
 30232 00002C4A E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 30233                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 30234                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30235 00002C4D 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 30236                                  
 30237 00002C4F 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 30238 00002C51 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 30239 00002C53 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 30240 00002C57 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 30241 00002C5A 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 30242 00002C5C 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 30243 00002C5F 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 30244                                  
 30245                                  gxn10:	
 30246 00002C61 2EC706[002C]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 30247 00002C68 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 30248 00002C69 46                      	inc	si
 30249                                  
 30250                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 30251                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 30252                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 30253                                  ;        BX    = 0
 30254                                  ;        CH    = 0
 30255                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 30256                                  
 30257                                  gxn20:	
 30258 00002C6A 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 30259 00002C6D 46                      	inc	si
 30260                                  
 30261 00002C6E E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 30262 00002C71 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 30263                                  
 30264 00002C73 E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 30265 00002C76 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 30266                                  
 30267 00002C78 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 30268 00002C7A 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 iff last add wrapped
 30269                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 30270                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 30271 00002C7C 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 30272                                  gxnE:	
 30273                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 30274 00002C7E EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 30275                                  gxnQ:	
 30276 00002C80 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 30277 00002C81 F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 30278                                  gxnX:	
 30279                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30280                                  	;pop	ds
 30281 00002C82 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 30282                                  	;pop	bx
 30283 00002C83 C3                      	retn
 30284                                  
 30285                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30286                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 30287                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30288                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 30289                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 30290                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 30291                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 30292                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30293                                  
 30294                                  mul32:
 30295 00002C84 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30296 00002C85 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30297 00002C87 2EF726[002C]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30298 00002C8C 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 30299                                  
 30300 00002C8E 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30301 00002C90 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 30302                                  
 30303 00002C91 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 30304 00002C93 2EF726[002C]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry,  AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 30305 00002C98 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 30306 00002C9A 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 30307 00002C9C 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 30308 00002C9E C3                      	retn
 30309                                  m32E:	
 30310 00002C9F 58                      	pop	ax
 30311 00002CA0 C3                      	retn
 30312                                  
 30313                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30314                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 30315                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30316                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 30317                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 30318                                  ; ERROR:   None
 30319                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 30320                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30321                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 30322                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 30323                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30324                                  
 30325                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30326                                  toPara:
 30327 00002CA1 51                      	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 30328                                  
 30329 00002CA2 B104                    	mov	cl,4		;
 30330 00002CA4 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 30331 00002CA6 92                      	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 30332 00002CA7 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 30333 00002CA9 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 30334 00002CAB 09D0                    	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 30335                                  
 30336 00002CAD 59                      	pop	cx
 30337 00002CAE C3                      	retn
 30338                                  
 30339                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30340                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30341                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30342                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30343                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30344                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30345                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30346                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30347                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 30348                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 30349                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 30350                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 30351                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30352                                  
 30353                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30354                                  UmbHead:
 30355                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 30356                                  
 30357                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30358                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 30359                                  	;push	es
 30360                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 30361                                  
 30362                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30363                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30364                                  
 30365 00002CAF B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30366 00002CB1 CD21                    	int	21h
 30367                                  
 30368 00002CB3 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 30369                                  	
 30370                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30371 00002CB7 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30372 00002CBA F5                      	cmc
 30373                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 30374 00002CBB C3                      	retn
 30375                                  
 30376                                  ; 01/01/2023
 30377                                  ;%if 0
 30378                                  ;	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30379                                  ;	je	short uhE		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30380                                  ;
 30381                                  ;	clc				; Else, it isn't (CLC done by prev cmp)
 30382                                  ;	;jmp	short uhX
 30383                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 30384                                  ;	retn
 30385                                  ;uhE:	
 30386                                  ;	stc
 30387                                  ;uhX:	
 30388                                  ;	;pop	bx ; *
 30389                                  ;	;pop	es
 30390                                  ;	;pop	ds ; ?
 30391                                  ;	;pop	si ; ?
 30392                                  ;	retn
 30393                                  ;%endif

 30395                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30396                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 30397                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30398                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 30399                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 30400                                  ; USES:   Flags
 30401                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30402                                  
 30403                                  isSysMCB:
 30404                                  	;push	ax
 30405

 30407                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30408                                  	;je	short ism10
 30409                                  	;cmp	ax,JapanPSPOwner	; 9 (for Japan) is valid
 30410                                  	;;je	short ism10
 30411                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 30412                                  	;jne	short ismX
 30413 00002CBC 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 30414 00002CC2 7507                    	jne	short ismX 
 30415                                  ism10:	
 30416                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 30417                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 30418 00002CC4 26813E08005343          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 30419                                  ismX:	
 30420                                  	;pop	ax
 30421 00002CCB C3                      	retn

 30423                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30424                                  
 30425                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30426                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 30427                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30428                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 30429                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 30430                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 30431                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30432                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30433                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 30434                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 30435                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 30436                                  ;      ...
 30437                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 30438                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30439                                  
 30440                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30441                                  AddrToUmb:
 30442                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30443                                  	;push	cx
 30444                                  	;push	dx
 30445 00002CCC 06                      	push	es
 30446                                  
 30447 00002CCD 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 30448                                  
 30449 00002CCF E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 30450 00002CD2 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 30451                                  
 30452                                  	; 22/07/2023
 30453                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 30454 00002CD4 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 30455                                  
 30456                                  	; 22/07/2023
 30457                                  atu10:
 30458 00002CD6 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 30459                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 30460                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 30461                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 30462                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 30463                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 30464                                  
 30465                                  ;atu10:	
 30466                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 30467 00002CD8 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 30468 00002CDA 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 30469                                  
 30470 00002CDC E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 30471 00002CDF 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 30472                                  
 30473 00002CE1 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 30474                                  atu20:	
 30475                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30476                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 30477                                  	; 22/07/2023
 30478                                  	; ax = es
 30479                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 30480 00002CE2 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30481 00002CE7 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 30482 00002CED 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30483                                  
 30484                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 30485                                  
 30486                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 30487                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 30488                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30489 00002CEF 40                      	inc	ax
 30490                                  	; 22/07/2023
 30491                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 30492 00002CF0 EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 30493                                  
 30494                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30495                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 30496                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 30497                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30498                                  
 30499                                  atu30:	
 30500                                  	; 22/07/2023
 30501                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 30502                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 30503                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 30504 00002CF2 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 30505 00002CF4 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 30506                                  atuE:	
 30507 00002CF6 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 30508 00002CF8 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 30509                                  atuX:	
 30510 00002CF9 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 30511                                  	
 30512 00002CFB 07                      	pop	es	
 30513                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30514                                  	;pop	dx
 30515                                  	;pop	cx
 30516 00002CFC C3                      	retn
 30517                                  
 30518                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30519                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 30520                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 30521                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 30522                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 30523                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30524                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 30525                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 30526                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30527                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30528                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30529                                  
 30530                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30531                                  convUMB:
 30532 00002CFD 2E833E[002C]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 30533 00002D03 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 30534 00002D05 E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 30535                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30536                                  	;jne	short cu10
 30537                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 30538                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30539 00002D08 40                      	inc	ax
 30540 00002D09 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 30541 00002D0B 48                      	dec	ax
 30542                                  cu10:	
 30543 00002D0C C3                      	retn
 30544                                  
 30545                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30546                                  ;%if 0
 30547                                  ;

 30550                                  ;;            -- if LoadHigh, the allocation strategy MAY be LOW_FIRST instead
 30551                                  ;; of the usual HIGH_FIRST. See the code.

 30571                                  %if 0

 30573                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30574                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 30575                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30576                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30577                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 30578                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 30579                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30580                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 30581                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30582                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 30583                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 30584                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 30585                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 30586                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30587                                  
 30588                                  loadLow:

 30596                                  	jne	short ll10
 30597                                  
 30598                                  	stc
 30599                                  ll15:
 30600                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 30601                                  	;stc
 30602                                  	;jmp	short llX
 30603                                  	retn
 30604                                  ll10:	
 30605                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 30606                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 30607                                  
 30608                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30609                                  	retn
 30610                                  
 30611                                  	;mov	al,1
 30612                                  	;clc
 30613                                  ;llX:
 30614                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 30615                                  	;retn
 30616                                  
 30617                                  %endif

 30619                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30620                                  ;*** HideUMBs - links UMBs and hides upper-memory as appropriate
 30621                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30622                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30623                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30624                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30625                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 30626                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30627                                  
 30628                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 30652 00002D19 C606[771F]01            	mov	byte [fInHigh],1
 30653

 30655                                  	;mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 30658                                  
 30659 00002D21 3CFF                    	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED	; If they didn't,
 30660 00002D23 7420                    	je	short husX	; then we shouldn't do this loop:
 30661                                  
 30662 00002D25 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 30663                                  
 30664                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 30665                                  ; HUS10-CX - UMB number (after inc, 1==first UMB)
 30666                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 30667                                  
 30668 00002D27 41                      hus10:	inc	cx		; For each UMB:
 30669                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30670 00002D28 80F910                  	cmp	cl,MAXUMB
 30671                                  	;cmp	cx,MAXUMB ; 16
 30672 00002D2B 730E                    	jae	short hus20
 30673                                  
 30674 00002D2D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; (stopping as soon as we're outside of the

 31004                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31005                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 31006                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 31007                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31008                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31009                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 31010                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 31011                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31012                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31013                                  
 31014                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31015                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 31016                                  findUMB:
 31017                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31018                                  	;push	ax
 31019                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31020 00002DD1 51                      	push	cx ; *
 31021                                  	;push	dx
 31022                                  
 31023 00002DD2 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31024                                  
 31025 00002DD4 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 31026                                  
 31027 00002DD6 E8D6FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31028                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31029                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31030 00002DD9 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31031                                  
 31032                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31033                                  fu10:
 31034 00002DDB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 31035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31036                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 31037                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 31038                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 31039                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31040                                  
 31041                                  ;fu10:	
 31042 00002DDD 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 31043 00002DDF 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 31044                                  
 31045 00002DE1 E8D8FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31046 00002DE4 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 31047                                  
 31048 00002DE6 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31049                                  fu20:	
 31050                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31051                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31052                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31053 00002DE7 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 31054 00002DED 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31055                                  
 31056                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31057                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31058                                  	; ax = es
 31059                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 31060                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31061 00002DEF 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31062 00002DF4 40                      	inc	ax
 31063                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31064                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 31065 00002DF5 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 31066                                  fuE:	
 31067 00002DF7 F9                      	stc
 31068                                  fuX:
 31069                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31070                                  	;pop	dx
 31071                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31072 00002DF8 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 31073                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 31074 00002DF9 C3                      	retn
 31075                                  
 31076                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31077                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 31078                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31079                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31080                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 31081                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 31082                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31083                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31084                                  
 31085                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31086                                  BigFree:
 31087                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31088                                  	;push	bx
 31089 00002DFA 51                      	push	cx
 31090                                  
 31091 00002DFB E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 31092 00002DFE 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 31093                                  
 31094 00002E00 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 31095 00002E02 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 31096                                  
 31097                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31098                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31099                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 31100                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 31101                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31102                                  
 31103                                  bf10:	
 31104 00002E04 E8B5FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 31105 00002E07 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 31106                                  
 31107                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31108 00002E09 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31109 00002E0F 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 31110                                  
 31111 00002E11 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31112                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 31113 00002E15 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 31114                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 31115                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31116 00002E17 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 31117                                  
 31118 00002E19 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 31119                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 31120 00002E1B 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 31121                                  
 31122                                  bf20:	
 31123                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31124                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 31125                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31126                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 31127 00002E1D 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31128 00002E23 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 31129                                  
 31130                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 31131 00002E25 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 31132                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31133 00002E27 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31134 00002E2C 40                      	inc     ax
 31135 00002E2D 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 31136                                  
 31137 00002E2F EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 31138                                  
 31139 00002E31 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 31140 00002E33 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 31141 00002E35 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31142 00002E37 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 31143                                  bfE:	
 31144 00002E39 F9                      	stc
 31145                                  bfX:
 31146 00002E3A 59                      	pop	cx
 31147                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31148                                  	;pop	bx
 31149 00002E3B C3                      	retn
 31150

 31153                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31186 00002E47 C3                      	retn
 31187                                  
 31188                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31189                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 31190                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31191                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 31192                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 31193                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 31194                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31195                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31196                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 31197                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 31198                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 31199                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 31200                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 31201                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31202                                  
 31203                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 31204

 31281                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31282                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31283                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31284                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31285                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31286                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31287                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31288                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31289                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31290                                  ;
 31291                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31292                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31293                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31294                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31295                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31296                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31297                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31298                                  ;       Endif
 31299                                  ;    Endif
 31300                                  ; Endif
 31301                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31302                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31303                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31304                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31305                                  ;    ENDIF
 31306                                  ; ENDIF
 31307                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31308                                  
 31309                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31310                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 31311                                  _hideUMB_:
 31312                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31313                                  	; ds = cs
 31314                                  
 31315                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31316                                  	;push	bx
 31317                                  	;push	dx
 31318 00002E85 06                      	push	es
 31319                                  
 31320 00002E86 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31321 00002E88 E8B1FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31322 00002E8B 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 31323                                  
 31324 00002E8D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31325 00002E8F E868FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31326 00002E92 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31327                                  
 31328 00002E94 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31329 00002E95 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31330 00002E97 E8B0FE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31331 00002E9A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31332                                  
 31333 00002E9B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31334 00002E9D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31335                                  
 31336 00002E9F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31337 00002EA1 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 31338                                  
 31339 00002EA3 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31340 00002EA5 E814FD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31341 00002EA8 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 31342                                  hu_10:	
 31343                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31344                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 31345                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31346                                  ;isTiny:
 31347                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 31348                                  	;or	al,al
 31349 00002EAA 800E[781F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 31350 00002EAF 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 31351                                  
 31352 00002EB1 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31353 00002EB4 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31354                                  
 31355 00002EB6 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 31356 00002EB8 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31357                                  
 31358 00002EBA 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31359 00002EBC E87DFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31360 00002EBF 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31361                                  
 31362 00002EC1 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31363                                  hu_30:	
 31364 00002EC3 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31365                                  
 31366 00002EC5 E89CFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31367                                  
 31368 00002EC8 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31369 00002ECA 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31370                                  
 31371 00002ECC 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31372 00002ECE E8E5FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31373                                  hu_X:	
 31374 00002ED1 07                      	pop	es
 31375                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31376                                  	;pop	dx
 31377                                  	;pop	bx
 31378 00002ED2 C3                      	retn
 31379                                  
 31380                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31381                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31382                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31383                                  ; Entry:  None
 31384                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31385                                  ; Error:  None
 31386                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31387                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31388                                  
 31389                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31390                                  UnFreeze:
 31391                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31392                                  	;push	ax
 31393 00002ED3 06                      	push	es
 31394                                  
 31395 00002ED4 E8D8FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31396 00002ED7 721A                    	jc	short ufX
 31397                                  
 31398                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31399                                  uf10:
 31400 00002ED9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 31401                                  
 31402                                  ; ------------------------------
 31403                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31404                                  ; ------------------------------
 31405                                  
 31406                                  ;uf10:

 31408 00002EDE 7503                    	jnz	short uf20

 31415 00002EE9 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 31416

 31418                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31419                                  	; ax = es

 31423 00002EF0 40                      	inc	ax
 31424                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31425                                  	;mov	es,ax
 31426 00002EF1 EBE6                    	jmp	short uf10
 31427                                  ufX:	
 31428 00002EF3 07                      	pop	es

 31431 00002EF4 C3                      	retn

 31518                                  fum10:

 31566                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31567                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31568                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31569                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31570                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31571                                  ; ERROR:    None

 31599                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31600                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31601                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31602                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31603                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31604                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31605                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31606                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31607                                  
 31608                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31609                                  	; (SYSINIT:3541h)
 31610                                  
 31611                                  WalkMem:
 31612                                  	;push	ax ; ?
 31613                                  	;push	bx ; ?
 31614                                  	;;push	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:352Fh)
 31615                                  	;push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31616                                  		   	
 31617 00002F8A B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31618 00002F8C CD21                    	int	21h

 31632                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31633 00002F94 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31634 00002F9A 7408                    	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31635                                  
 31636                                  	;NextMCB es,bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31637

 31639                                  	;;add	bx,[es:3]

 31644                                  	; ax = es

 31647 00002FA1 40                      	inc	ax
 31648                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 31649                                  	
 31650 00002FA2 EBEE                    	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31651                                  um20:	
 31652                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31653                                  	; ax = es
 31654                                  	;mov	ax,es
 31655                                  
 31656 00002FA4 3DFF9F                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF if ax < 9FFF.

 31658                                  	;pop	es ; ?

 31660                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 31661                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 31662                                  	
 31663 00002FA7 C3                      	retn

 31712                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31713                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31714                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31715                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31716                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31717                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31718                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31719                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag

 31725                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31726 00002FB4 50                      	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31727                                  
 31728                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31729                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31730                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31731                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31732                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31733                                  ;    every command execution.
 31734                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31751

 31753 00002FBD F9                      	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31754 00002FBE C3                      	retn			; that.

 31757 00002FC2 E81200                  	call	FreeUMBs

 31814                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31815                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31816                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31817                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31818                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31819                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31820                                  ; USES:     Flags

 31822                                  
 31823                                  FreeUMBs:
 31824 00002FD7 50                      	push	ax
 31825 00002FD8 06                      	push	es
 31826                                  
 31827 00002FD9 E86500                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31828 00002FDC 721A                    	jc	short fusX
 31829                                  fus10:
 31830 00002FDE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31831                                  ;fus10:	
 31832 00002FE0 E81800                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31833 00002FE3 7503                    	jnz	short fus20
 31834 00002FE5 E83E00                  	call	freeMCB
 31835                                  fus20:	   
 31836                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31837                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31838                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31839 00002FE8 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31840 00002FEE 7408                    	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31841                                  	
 31842                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31843                                  	; ax = es
 31844                                  	;mov	ax,es
 31845 00002FF0 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31846 00002FF5 40                      	inc	ax
 31847                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31848                                  	;mov	es,ax
 31849 00002FF6 EBE6                    	jmp	short fus10	; Go on forward.
 31850                                  fusX:	
 31851 00002FF8 07                      	pop	es
 31852 00002FF9 58                      	pop	ax
 31853 00002FFA C3                      	retn
 31854                                  
 31855                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31856                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31857                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31858                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31859                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31860                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31861                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31862                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31863                                  
 31864                                  isHideMCB:
 31865                                  	;push	ax
 31866                                  
 31867 00002FFB 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31868 00003001 7522                    	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31869                                  
 31870                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31871                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31872 00003003 26813E08004849          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31873 0000300A 7519                    	jne	short ihm_x
 31874                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31875                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31876 0000300C 26813E0A004444          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31877 00003013 7510                    	jne	short ihm_x
 31878                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31879                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31880 00003015 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31881 0000301C 7507                    	jne	short ihm_x
 31882                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31883                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31884 0000301E 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31885                                  ihm_x:	
 31886                                  	;pop	ax
 31887 00003025 C3                      	retn
 31888                                  
 31889                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31890                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31891                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31892                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31893                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31894                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31895                                  ; USES:     AX
 31896                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31897                                  
 31898                                  freeMCB:
 31899 00003026 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31900 0000302D B82020                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; mov ax,2020h ; 31/12/2022
 31901 00003030 26A30800                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31902 00003034 26A30A00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31903 00003038 26A30C00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31904 0000303C 26A30E00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31905 00003040 C3                      	retn
 31906                                  
 31907                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31908                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31909                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31910                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31911                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31912                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31913                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31914                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31915                                  
 31916                                  HeadUmb:
 31917                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31918                                  
 31919                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31920                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31921                                  	;push	es
 31922                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31923                                  
 31924                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31925                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31926                                  
 31927 00003041 B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31928 00003043 CD21                    	int	21h
 31929                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31930                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31931                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31932 00003045 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31933 00003049 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31934                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31935                                  
 31936                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31937                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31938                                  xhu_e:	
 31939                                  	;stc
 31940 0000304C F5                      	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31941                                  xhu_x:	
 31942                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31943                                  	;pop	es	
 31944                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31945                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31946 0000304D C3                      	retn

 31948                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31949                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31950                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31951                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31952                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31953                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31954                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31955                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31956                                  
 31957                                  linkumb:
 31958 0000304E B80258                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31959 00003051 CD21                    	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31960                                  
 31961 00003053 08C0                    	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31962 00003055 7508                    	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31963                                  
 31964 00003057 B80358                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31965 0000305A BB0100                  	mov	bx,1
 31966 0000305D CD21                    	int	21h
 31967                                  lumbX:
 31968 0000305F C3                      	retn
