 31980                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31981                                  ;
 31982                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31983                                  ;
 31984                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31985                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31986                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31987                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31988                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31989                                  ;
 31990                                  ;	Output : none
 31991                                  ;
 31992                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31993                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31994                                  ;
 31995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31996                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31997                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31998                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31999                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 32000                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32001                                  
 32002                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32003                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32004                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 32005                                  InitDevLoad:
 32006                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32007                                  	;push	es ; *
 32008                                  
 32009                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32010                                  	; ds = cs
 32011 00003060 803E[CD1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32012                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 32013                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 32014 00003065 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 32015                                  
 32016                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32017                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32018                                  ; %if 0
 32019                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32020 00003067 803E[BD1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 32021                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 32022 0000306C 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 32023                                  
 32024                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 32025                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 32026                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 32027                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 32028                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 32029                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 32030                                  
 32031 0000306E E86904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 32032                                  
 32033 00003071 E899FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 32034 00003074 E8CDFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 32035 00003077 E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 32036 0000307A 9C                      	pushf
 32037 0000307B E855FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 32038 0000307E 9D                      	popf
 32039                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 32040                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 32041                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 32042 0000307F EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 32043                                  
 32044                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 32045                                  
 32046                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32047                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 32048                                  InitForConv:
 32049                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32050                                  	; ds = cs
 32051 00003081 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 32052                                  					;  current UMB ?
 32053 00003084 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 32054 00003086 E85104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 32055 00003089 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 32056                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 32057 0000308C 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 32058                                  					;  in low memory
 32059                                  InitForHi:
 32060                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32061                                  	; ds = cs
 32062                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 32063                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 32064                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 32065 0000308E A1[C31F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 32066 00003091 8B16[BF1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32067 00003095 0316[C11F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 32068 00003099 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 32069                                  
 32070                                  InitForLo:
 32071                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32072                                  	; ds = cs
 32073                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 32074 0000309B C606[CD1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32075                                  initforlo_x:
 32076                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32077                                  	; ds = cs
 32078                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 32079                                  					;  we are loading low
 32080                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 32081                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 32082 000030A0 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 32083 000030A3 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 32084                                  idl1:
 32085 000030A7 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 32086                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32087                                  	; ds = cs
 32088                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 32089                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 32090                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 32091                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 32092 000030AA A3[B11F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 32093 000030AD 8916[B31F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 32094 000030B1 C706[B51F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 32095 000030B7 A3[B71F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 32096                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32097                                  	;pop	es ; *
 32098 000030BA C3                      	retn
 32099                                  
 32100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32101                                  ;
 32102                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 32103                                  ;
 32104                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 32105                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 32106                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 32107                                  ;		   current UMB
 32108                                  ;
 32109                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32110                                  
 32111                                  SpaceInUMB:
 32112                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32113                                  	; ds = cs
 32114                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 32115                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 32116                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 32117 000030BB A1[C11F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 32118 000030BE 0306[BF1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 32119 000030C2 2B06[C31F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 32120                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32121                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 32122                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 32123                                  	;stc
 32124                                  	;retn
 32125                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32126 000030C6 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 32127 000030C9 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 32128                                  spcinumb1:
 32129 000030CB 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 32130                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32131                                  	; ds = cs
 32132 000030CC 3B06[AF1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 32133                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 32134                                  spcinumb2:
 32135 000030D0 C3                      	retn
 32136                                  
 32137                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32138                                  ;
 32139                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 32140                                  ;
 32141                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 32142                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 32143                                  ;
 32144                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32145                                  
 32146                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32147                                  ;
 32148                                  ;PrepareMark:
 32149                                  ;	push	ds
 32150                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 32151                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32152                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32153                                  ;	pop	ds
 32154                                  ;
 32155                                  ;	inc	ax
 32156                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32157                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32158                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32159                                  ;	retn
 32160                                  
 32161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32162                                  ;
 32163                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32164                                  ;
 32165                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32166                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32167                                  ;		 the device.
 32168                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32169                                  ;
 32170                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32171                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32172                                  ;	UMB.
 32173                                  ;
 32174                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32175                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32176                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32177                                  ;
 32178                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32179                                  
 32180                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32181                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 32182                                  
 32183                                  GetUMBForDev:
 32184                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32185                                  	; ds = cs
 32186 000030D1 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 32187 000030D4 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32188 000030D7 CD21                    	int	21h
 32189                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 32190                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 32191                                  
 32192 000030D9 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32193 000030DB 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 32194                                  
 32195 000030DD 4B                      	dec	bx
 32196                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32197                                  	; ds = cs
 32198 000030DE 391E[AF1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx

 32246                                  ;
 32247                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32248                                  ;
 32249                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32250                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32251                                  ;
 32252                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32253                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32254                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32255                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32256                                  ;
 32257                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32258                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32259                                  ;
 32260                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32261                                  
 32262                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32263                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)

 32271 00003119 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 32273 00003121 40                      	inc	ax
 32274 00003122 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax

 32277                                  
 32278 00003126 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr

 32280                                  
 32281 0000312C 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32282 0000312E FC                      	cld
 32283                                  dsm_again:
 32284 0000312F AC                      	lodsb
 32285 00003130 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32286 00003132 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash

 32291 0000313A 7504                    	jne	short isit_null

 32293 0000313E EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32294                                  isit_null:

 32296 00003142 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32297 00003144 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32298                                  
 32299 00003146 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32300 00003149 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 32301                                  dsm_next_char:
 32302 0000314C AC                      	lodsb
 32303 0000314D 08C0                    	or	al, al
 32304 0000314F 7407                    	jz	short blankout

 32319 00003161 07                      	pop	es
 32320 00003162 C3                      	retn

 32718                                  SkipDelim:

 32720 00003292 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 32721 00003295 E81E10                  	call	delim
 32722 00003298 75F7                    	jnz	short sd_ret
 32723 0000329A 46                      	inc	si
 32724 0000329B EBF5                    	jmp	short sd_next_char ; 01/11/2022
 32725                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32726                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32727                                  ;sd_ret:
 32728                                  	;retn

 32730                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32731                                  ;
 32732                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32733                                  ;
 32734                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32735                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32736                                  ;
 32737                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32738                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32739                                  ;
 32740                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32741                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32742                                  ;
 32743                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32744                                  
 32745                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32746                                  
 32747                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32748                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 32749                                  
 32750                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32751                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32752                                  GetHexNum:
 32753 0000329D 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32754 0000329F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32755                                  ghn_next:
 32756 000032A1 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32757 000032A4 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32758 000032A7 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32759 000032A9 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32760 000032AC 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32761 000032AE 50                      	push	ax
 32762 000032AF 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32763 000032B1 E80210                  	call	delim
 32764 000032B4 58                      	pop	ax
 32765                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32766 000032B5 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 32767 000032B8 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32768 000032BA E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32769                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32770                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32771 000032BD 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32772                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32773                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32774                                  ghn_shift1:
 32775 000032BF D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32776 000032C1 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32777 000032C3 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32778 000032C5 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32779 000032C7 46                      	inc	si
 32780 000032C8 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32781                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32782 000032CA 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32783 000032CD 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32784 000032D0 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32785 000032D4 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32786                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32787                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32788                                  ghn_shift2:
 32789 000032D6 F8                      	clc
 32790 000032D7 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32791 000032D9 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32792 000032DB E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32793 000032DD F8                      	clc
 32794 000032DE C3                      	retn
 32795                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32796                                  ghn_err:
 32797                                  gnib_err:
 32798 000032DF F9                      	stc
 32799                                  ghn_ret:
 32800                                  gnib_ret:
 32801 000032E0 C3                      	retn

 32803                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32804                                  ;
 32805                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32806                                  ;
 32807                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32808                                  ;
 32809                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 32810                                  ;
 32811                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32812                                  ;
 32813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32814                                  
 32815                                  GetNibble:
 32816 000032E1 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32817                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32818                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32819 000032E4 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32820 000032E6 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32821 000032E9 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32822 000032EB 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32823 000032EE C3                      	retn
 32824                                  is_it_hex:
 32825 000032EF 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32826                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32827                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32828 000032F2 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32829 000032F4 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32830 000032F7 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32831 000032F9 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32832 000032FC C3                      	retn
 32833                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32834                                  ;gnib_err:
 32835                                  ;	stc
 32836                                  ;gnib_ret:
 32837                                  ;	retn

 32922                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32923                                  ;
 32924                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32925                                  ;
 32926                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32927                                  ;
 32928                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32929                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32930                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32931                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32932                                  ;				NC
 32933                                  ;			  else 
 32934                                  ;				CY
 32935                                  ;
 32936                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32937                                  ;
 32938                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32939                                  
 32940                                  umb_allocate:
 32941                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32942                                  	; ds = cs
 32943 0000333E 50                      	push	ax
 32944 0000333F B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32945 00003341 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32946                                  					;   possible
 32947                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32948 00003344 FF1E[C51F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32949                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32950                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32951                                  					; the largest UMB
 32952 00003348 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32953 0000334A 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32954

 32956                                  
 32957                                  	; 31/12/2022

 32960

 32962                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32963                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 32964 00003355 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32965                                  ua_err:
 32966 00003357 F9                      	stc	
 32967                                  
 32968                                  	;clc
 32969                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32970                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32971                                  	; cf=0
 32972                                  	;clc 
 32973                                  ua_done:
 32974 00003358 58                      	pop	ax
 32975 00003359 C3                      	retn
 32976                                  	; 27/07/2023
 32977                                  ;ua_err:
 32978                                  	;stc
 32979                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 32980                                  
 32981                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32982                                  ;
 32983                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32984                                  ;
 32985                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32986                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32987                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32988                                  ;			; DS = data
 32989                                  ;
 32990                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32991                                  ;
 32992                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32993                                  ;
 32994                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32995                                  
 32996                                  umb_insert:
 32997 0000335A 1E                      	push	ds
 32998                                  
 32999                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33000                                  	; ds = cs
 33001                                  
 33002                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33003 0000335B 8E1E[DC1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33004                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33005 0000335F 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33006 00003363 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33007 00003365 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33008                                  ui_next:
 33009 00003367 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33010                                  					;    new block
 33011 00003369 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33012                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33013                                  					;    last
 33014 0000336B 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33015 00003371 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33016                                  					; N: get next block
 33017 00003373 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33018                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33019 00003375 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33020 00003378 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33021                                  
 33022                                  ui_insert:
 33023 0000337A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33024 0000337C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33025                                  
 33026 0000337D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33027 0000337F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33028                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33029 00003381 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33030                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33031 00003386 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33032                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33033 0000338C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33034                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33035 00003390 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33036                                  
 33037                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33038                                  
 33039 00003396 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33040 00003398 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33041 0000339E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33042                                  					; mark as free
 33043 000033A5 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33044                                  					; start & end of new block
 33045 000033A8 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33046                                  
 33047                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33048                                  	
 33049 000033AD 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 33050 000033AF 43                      	inc	bx
 33051 000033B0 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 33052 000033B2 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 33053                                  
 33054                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 33055                                  					; this block
 33056 000033B3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 33057                                  	
 33058 000033B5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33059 000033BB 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33060 000033C2 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33061 000033C6 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33062                                  
 33063 000033CD EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33064                                  
 33065                                  ui_append:
 33066                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 33067 000033CF 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 33068 000033D4 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 33069                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33070                                  					; block for the next arena.
 33071                                  	; 13/05/2019
 33072 000033DA 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33073                                  
 33074 000033E0 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 33075 000033E2 40                      	inc	ax
 33076 000033E3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 33077                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33078 000033E5 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33079                                  
 33080 000033E7 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33081                                  
 33082 000033E9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33083 000033EF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33084 000033F6 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33085 000033FA 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33086                                  
 33087                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33088 00003401 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33089 00003403 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33090 00003409 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 33091                                  					; mark as free
 33092 00003410 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33093 00003411 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33094                                  ui_done:
 33095                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33096 00003416 1F                      	pop	ds
 33097                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33098                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33099 00003417 C3                      	retn
 33100                                  
 33101                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33102                                  
 33103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33104                                  ;
 33105                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33106                                  ;
 33107                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33108                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33109                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33110                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33111                                  ;
 33112                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33113                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33114                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 33115                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33116                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33117                                  ;
 33118                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33119                                  
 33120                                  umb_coalesce:
 33121                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33122                                  	; ds = cs
 33123 00003418 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33124                                  
 33125 00003419 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33126                                  
 33127                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33128                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33129 0000341B 8E06[DC1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33130 0000341F 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33131                                  uc_nextfree:
 33132 00003424 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33133 00003426 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33134                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33135 00003428 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33136 0000342D 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33137                                  					; N: get next arena
 33138 0000342F E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33139 00003432 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33140 00003434 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33141                                  uc_again:
 33142 00003436 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 33143 00003439 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33144                                  uc_check:
 33145 0000343B 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33146 00003440 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33147                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33148 00003442 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33149 00003447 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33150                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33151 00003448 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33152 0000344C 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33153 0000344F 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33154 00003451 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33155                                  
 33156                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33157                                  ;uc_done:
 33158                                  	;retn
 33159                                  
 33160                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33161                                  ;
 33162                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 33163                                  ;
 33164                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 33165                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 33166                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 33167                                  ;
 33168                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33169                                  
 33170                                  	; 01/11/2022
 33171                                  get_next:
 33172 00003453 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33173 00003458 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 33174                                  _get_next_:
 33175 0000345A 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 33176 0000345C 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 33177 00003460 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 33178 00003461 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33179                                  	;clc
 33180                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33181                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33182                                  	; cf=0
 33183                                  	;clc
 33184 00003463 C3                      	retn
 33185                                  gn_err:
 33186 00003464 F9                      	stc
 33187                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 33188                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 33189 00003465 C3                      	retn
 33190                                  
 33191                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33192                                  ;
 33193                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 33194                                  ;
 33195                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33196                                  
 33197                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33198                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 33199                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 33200                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33201                                  	; ds = cs
 33202 00003466 E8D5FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 33203 00003469 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33204                                  
 33205                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 33206                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 33207                                  
 33208                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33209                                  	; ds = cs
 33210                                  
 33211 0000346B CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 33212 0000346D B106                    	mov	cl,6
 33213 0000346F D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 33214                                  
 33215 00003471 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 33216 00003473 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33217                                  
 33218 00003475 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33219                                  
 33220 00003477 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 33221 0000347A 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 33222

 33243                                  					;  data segment with the arena

 33250 000034B9 31FF                    	xor	di,di

 33254 000034BB 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'

 33261                                  	;jmp	short scan_next

 33307 000034EA 8E06[BF1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33308                                  	
 33309 000034EE B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33310 000034F1 CD21                    	int	21h
 33311                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33312                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33313                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs

 33318                                  	; 01/01/2023

 33361                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33362                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33363                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33364                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33365                                  
 33366                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33367                                  ;
 33368                                  ; Summary:
 33369                                  ;
 33370                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33371                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33372                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33373                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33374                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33375                                  ;
 33376                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33377                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33378                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33379                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33380                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33381                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33382                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33383                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33384                                  ;
 33385                                  ; Example:
 33386                                  ;
 33387                                  ;   [menu]
 33388                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33389                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33390                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33391                                  ;
 33392                                  ;   [network]
 33393                                  ;   include misc
 33394                                  ;   device=foo
 33395                                  ;
 33396                                  ;   [misc]
 33397                                  ;   device=bar
 33398                                  ;   include alternate
 33399                                  ;
 33400                                  ;   [alternate]
 33401                                  ;   device=tar
 33402                                  ;
 33403                                  ;
 33404                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33405                                  ;
 33406                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33407                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33408                                  ;
 33409                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33410                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33411                                  ;   following order:
 33412                                  ;
 33413                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33414                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33415                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33416                                  ;
 33417                                  
 33418                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33419                                  
 33420                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33421                                  
 33422                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33423                                  
 33424                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33425                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33426                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33427                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33428                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33429                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33430                                  
 33431                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33432                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33433                                  
 33434                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33435                                  
 33436                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33437                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33438

 33575                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33576                                  ;
 33577                                  ; procedure : parseline
 33578                                  ;
 33579                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 33580                                  ;
 33581                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33582                                  
 33583                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33584                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 33585                                  
 33586                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33587                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 33588                                  parseline:
 33589                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33590                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 33591                                  
 33592                                  	;push	ds ; *
 33593                                  
 33594                                  	;push	cs ; *
 33595                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 33596                                  
 33597                                  nextswtch:
 33598                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 33599                                  	je	short done_line
 33600                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 33601                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 33602                                  
 33603                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 33604                                  
 33605                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 33606                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 33607                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 33608                                  	je	short getparm
 33609                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 33610                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 33611                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33612                                  swterr:
 33613                                  	retn
 33614                                  
 33615                                  getparm:
 33616                                  	call	check_switch
 33617                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 33618                                  	jc	short swterr
 33619                                  getnext:
 33620                                  	call	getchr
 33621                                  	;jc	short done_line
 33622                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 33623                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33624                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 33625                                  ;swterr:
 33626                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 33627                                  
 33628                                  done_line:
 33629                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33630                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 33631                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 33632                                  	jnz	short okay
 33633                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 33634                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 33635                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33636                                  	retn
 33637                                  
 33638                                  okay:
 33639                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 33640                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 33641                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 33642                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 33643                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 33644                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33645                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33646                                  	; cf=0
 33647                                  	;clc
 33648                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 33649                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33650                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 33651                                  ;exitpl:
 33652                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33653                                  	; ds = cs
 33654                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 33655                                  	retn
 33656                                  put_back:
 33657                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 33658                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 33659                                  	jmp	short done_line
 33660                                  
 33661                                  %endif

 33663                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33664                                  ;
 33665                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 33666                                  ;
 33667                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 33668                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 33669                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 33670                                  ; error.
 33671                                  ;
 33672                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33673                                  
 33674                                  check_switch:
 33675 0000358F E805F4                  	call	getchr
 33676                                  	;jc	short err_check
 33677 00003592 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 33678 00003594 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 33679 00003596 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 33680                                  	;jb	short err_check
 33681 00003598 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33682 0000359A 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 33683 0000359C 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 33684                                  
 33685 0000359E 06                      	push	es
 33686                                  
 33687 0000359F 0E                      	push	cs
 33688 000035A0 07                      	pop	es
 33689                                  
 33690 000035A1 8A0E[9C4A]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 33691 000035A5 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 33692 000035A7 BF[9D4A]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 33693 000035AA F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 33694                                  
 33695 000035AC 07                      	pop	es
 33696 000035AD 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 33697                                  
 33698 000035AF B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 33699 000035B2 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 33700 000035B4 8B1E[094A]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 33701 000035B8 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 33702 000035BA 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 33703                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33704 000035BC A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 33705                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 33706 000035BE 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 33707                                  
 33708 000035C0 E8D4F3                  	call	getchr
 33709 000035C3 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 33710                                  
 33711 000035C5 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33712 000035C7 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 33713                                  
 33714 000035C9 E8CBF3                  	call	getchr
 33715 000035CC 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 33716                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33717                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 33718                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33719                                  	; ds = cs
 33720 000035CD C606[AE02]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 33721 000035D2 E8AD0D                  	call	getnum
 33722                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 33723                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33724 000035D5 C606[AE02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 33725 000035DA 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 33726                                  
 33727                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 33728                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 33729                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 33730                                  
 33731 000035DB E80500                  	call	process_num
 33732                                  
 33733                                  done_swtch:

 33837                                  ;

 33839                                  ;

 33843                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)

 33861

 33863

 33866 00003621 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'

 33877 0000362E 72F6                    	jc	short swterr

 33879 00003630 E864F3                  	call	getchr
 33880                                  	;jc	short done_line

 33894                                  	; 03/01/2023

 33898                                  	; 03/01/2023

 33900                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 33901                                  	;retn
 33902

 33905 00003642 FF0E[5A03]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 33906 00003646 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line

 33927                                  ;
 33928                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33929                                  ;
 33930                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33931                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33932                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33933                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33934                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33935                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33936                                  ;
 33937                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33938                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33939                                  ;
 33940                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33941                                  ;
 33942                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33943                                  
 33944                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33945                                  
 33946                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33947                                  
 33948                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33949                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 33950                                  
 33951                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33952                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33953                                  	; ds = cs
 33954                                  
 33955 00003657 06                      	push	es
 33956                                  
 33957 00003658 0E                      	push	cs
 33958 00003659 07                      	pop	es
 33959                                  
 33960 0000365A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33961 0000365C 8A1E[E148]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33962 00003660 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33963 00003663 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33964                                  
 33965 00003665 C706[E448]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33966                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33967                                  got_80:
 33968 0000366B D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 33969 0000366D 8BB7[884A]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 33970                                  
 33971                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 33972                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33973 00003671 BF[E748]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 33974 00003674 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 33977                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33978 00003678 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 33979

 33981                                  
 33982                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33983 0000367B F606[094A]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h

 33992                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33993 00003688 F606[094A]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h

 34001                                  heads_not_altered:
 34002                                  
 34003                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 34004                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 34005                                  
 34006                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 34007                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34008                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 34009                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34010 00003695 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 34011 00003698 A2[E948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 34012                                  
 34013 0000369B B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 34014                                  
 34015                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 34016                                  
 34017                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 34018                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34019 0000369D 8A3E[F148]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 34020                                  	
 34021                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34022                                  	; ax = 2
 34023 000036A1 3906[F648]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 34024                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 34025 000036A5 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 34026                                  
 34027 000036A7 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 34028                                  
 34029                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 34030                                  
 34031 000036A9 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 34032                                  
 34033                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34034                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34035                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34036                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34037                                  
 34038                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34039                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34040                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 34041                                  
 34042 000036AB 833E[F448]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 34043 000036B0 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 34044 000036B2 833E[E448]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34045 000036B7 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 34046                                  
 34047                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 34048                                  
 34049 000036B9 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34050                                  
 34051                                  ;	check for 320K
 34052                                  
 34053                                  not_144m:
 34054 000036BB 833E[E448]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 34055 000036C0 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34056 000036C2 833E[F448]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34057 000036C7 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34058                                  
 34059 000036C9 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 34060 000036CB EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 34061                                  
 34062                                  only_one_head:
 34063                                  
 34064                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 34065                                  
 34066 000036CD 803E[E148]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34067 000036D2 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34068                                  
 34069                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 34070                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 34071                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 34072                                  
 34073 000036D4 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 34074 000036D6 833E[F448]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34075                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34076 000036DB 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 34077                                  
 34078 000036DD B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 34079                                  
 34080                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 34081                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 34082                                  
 34083                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 34084                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34085                                  	; ax = 2
 34086 000036DF 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 34087 000036E0 A2[E948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 34088                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 34089                                  
 34090                                  got_correct_mediad:
 34091 000036E3 881E[F148]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 34092                                  
 34093                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 34094                                  
 34095 000036E7 A1[E448]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 34096 000036EA F726[F648]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 34097 000036EE F726[F448]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34098 000036F2 A3[EF48]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 34099 000036F5 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 34100                                  
 34101 000036F6 C3                      	retn

 34616                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34617                                  ;
 34618                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34619                                  ;
 34620                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34621                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34622                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34623                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34624                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34625                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34626                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34627                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34628                                  ;
 34629                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34630                                  
 34631                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34632                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 34633                                  
 34634                                  skip_comment:
 34635 00003903 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34636                                  
 34637                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34638                                  	; ds = cs	
 34639                                  
 34640 00003905 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34641                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34642 0000390A 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34643                                  
 34644 0000390C 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34645                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34646 00003911 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34647                                  
 34648 00003913 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34649                                  	
 34650 00003916 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34651                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34652 0000391A 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34653                                  
 34654 0000391C 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34655                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34656 00003921 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34657                                  
 34658 00003923 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34659                                  	
 34660 00003927 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34661                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34662 0000392B 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34663                                  skip_cmmt:
 34664 0000392D E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34665 0000392F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34666 00003932 46                      	inc	si
 34667 00003933 49                      	dec	cx
 34668 00003934 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34669 00003936 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34670                                  no_commt:
 34671 00003938 C3                      	retn
 34672                                  
 34673                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34674                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)
 34675                                  
 34676                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34677                                  ;%if 0
 34678                                  
 34679                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34680                                  
 34681                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34682                                  ;
 34683                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34684                                  ;
 34685                                  ;   INPUT
 34686                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34687                                  ;
 34688                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34689                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34690                                  ;
 34691                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34692                                  ;       All
 34693                                  ;
 34694                                  ;   HISTORY
 34695                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34696                                  ;
 34697                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34698                                  
 34699                                  kbd_read:
 34700 00003939 F606[AC47]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34701 0000393E 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34702                                  
 34703 00003940 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34704 00003941 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34705 00003943 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34706                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34707                                  kbd_loop:
 34708 00003945 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 34709 00003947 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34710 00003949 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34711 0000394B B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34712 0000394D CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34713 0000394F A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34714 00003951 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34715 00003953 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34716                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34717                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34718 00003956 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h
