 34719                                  
 34720 0000395B 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 34721 0000395D 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34722                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34723 0000395F 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34724                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34725 00003960 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34726 00003962 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34727 00003964 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34728 00003966 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34729 00003968 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34730 0000396A 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 34731 0000396B 43                              inc     bx
 34732                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34733 0000396C 800E[B047]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34734                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34735 00003971 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34736 00003973 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34737 00003975 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34738 00003977 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34739 00003979 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34740                                  
 34741                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34742 0000397B 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34743 0000397E 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34744                                  	
 34745 00003980 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34746 00003983 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34747                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34748 00003985 BA[434C]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34749 00003988 E8F30B                          call    print
 34750                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34751 0000398B 800E[B047]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 34752 00003990 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34753                                  kbd_notf5:
 34754                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34755 00003992 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34756 00003995 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34757                                  
 34758 00003997 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34759 0000399A 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34760                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34761 0000399C BA[814C]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34762 0000399F E8DC0B                          call    print           ;
 34763 000039A2 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34764 000039A4 881E[B047]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34765                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34766 000039A8 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 34767 000039AA CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34768 000039AC C606[B647]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34769 000039B1 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 34770 000039B3 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34771                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34772 000039B5 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34773 000039B8 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34774                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34775 000039BA E88608                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34776 000039BD F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34777 000039BE C3                              retn			;
 34778                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34779 000039BF F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34780 000039C0 C3                              retn			;
 34781                                  
 34782                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34783                                  ;
 34784                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34785                                  ;
 34786                                  ;   INPUT
 34787                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34788                                  ;
 34789                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34790                                  ;       None
 34791                                  ;
 34792                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34793                                  ;       None
 34794                                  ;
 34795                                  ;   HISTORY
 34796                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34797                                  ;
 34798                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34799                                  
 34800                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 34801                                  
 34802                                  set_numlock:
 34803                                          ; 04/01/2023
 34804                                  	;push	ax
 34805 000039C1 1E                              push    ds
 34806 000039C2 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 34807 000039C4 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 34808 000039C6 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34809 000039C9 2E3B06[1E4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34810 000039CE 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 34811 000039D0 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34812 000039D5 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 34813                                  not_off:
 34814 000039D7 2E3B06[1C4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34815 000039DC F9                              stc
 34816 000039DD 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 34817 000039DF 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 34818                                  set_done:
 34819 000039E4 1F                              pop     ds
 34820                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34821                                  	;pop	ax
 34822 000039E5 C3                              retn
 34823                                  
 34824                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34825                                  
 34826                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34827                                  ;
 34828                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34829                                  ;
 34830                                  ;   INPUT
 34831                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34832                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34833                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34834                                  ;
 34835                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34836                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34837                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34838                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34839                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34840                                  ;
 34841                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34842                                  ;       All
 34843                                  ;
 34844                                  ;   NOTES
 34845                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34846                                  ;
 34847                                  ;   HISTORY
 34848                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34849                                  ;
 34850                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34851                                  
 34852                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34853                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 34854                                  
 34855                                  menu_check:
 34856                                  
 34857                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 34858                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34859                                  
 34860 000039E6 51                              push    cx              ;
 34861 000039E7 56                              push    si              ;
 34862 000039E8 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34863                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34864 000039EA E84C07                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34865 000039ED 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34866 000039EF 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 34867 000039F1 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34868 000039F3 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34869 000039F4 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34870                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34871 000039F6 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34872 000039F8 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34873 000039FA 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34874 000039FC 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34875 000039FE E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34876 00003A01 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 34877 00003A06 EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34878                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34879 00003A08 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34880 00003A0A 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34881                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34882 00003A0C E82A07                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34883                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34884 00003A0F 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34885 00003A11 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34886 00003A13 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34887 00003A15 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34888 00003A17 E81F07                          call    get_char        ;
 34889 00003A1A 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34890 00003A1C 3A06[0B1F]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34891 00003A20 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34892 00003A22 800E[AC47]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34893 00003A27 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34894                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34895 00003A29 3A06[171F]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34896 00003A2D 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34897 00003A2F 800E[AC47]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34898 00003A34 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34899                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34900 00003A36 E8DA06                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34901 00003A39 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34902                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34903 00003A3B 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34904 00003A3C 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34905                                  
 34906                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34907                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34908                                  
 34909 00003A3D F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34910 00003A42 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 34911                                  ;
 34912                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34913                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34914                                  ;
 34915 00003A44 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 34916 00003A47 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 34917 00003A49 E9F601                          jmp	menu_abort
 34918                                  
 34919                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34920                                  
 34921                                  menu_search:
 34922 00003A4C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34923 00003A4E BF[F147]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 34924 00003A51 E81804                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34925 00003A54 733D                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 34926 00003A56 C606[E947]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34927 00003A5B E91402                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34928                                  
 34929                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34930                                  
 34931                                  menu_color:
 34932 00003A5E 51                              push    cx              ;
 34933 00003A5F 52                              push    dx              ;
 34934 00003A60 BA0700                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34935 00003A63 E8B206                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34936 00003A66 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34937 00003A69 88DD                            mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34938                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 34939                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 34940                                  	;and	dl,0F0h         ;
 34941 00003A6B 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 34942 00003A6D E84608                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34943 00003A70 7511                            jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34944 00003A72 E8A306                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34945 00003A75 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34946 00003A78 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34947 00003A7A 80E20F                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34948 00003A7D B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 34949 00003A7F D2E3                            shl     bl,cl           ;
 34950 00003A81 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 34951                                  check_color:                    ;
 34952 00003A83 38F5                            cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34953 00003A85 7503                            jne	short set_color	; no
 34954 00003A87 80F208                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34955                                  set_color:
 34956 00003A8A 8816[A747]                      mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34957 00003A8E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 34958 00003A8F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34959 00003A90 E9AB00                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34960                                  
 34961                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34962                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34963                                  
 34964                                  menu_found:
 34965 00003A93 C606[B147]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34966 00003A98 C706[B347]0000                  mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34967 00003A9E C606[B547]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34968 00003AA3 8026[B047]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34969                                  
 34970 00003AA8 E86806                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34971 00003AAB 29D2                            sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34972                                  
 34973                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34974                                  
 34975                                  menu_process:
 34976 00003AAD E88906                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34977 00003AB0 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34978 00003AB2 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34979 00003AB4 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34980 00003AB6 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34981 00003AB8 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34982 00003ABA 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34983 00003ABC 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34984 00003ABE 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34985 00003AC0 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34986 00003AC2 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34987 00003AC4 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34988 00003AC6 7496                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34989 00003AC8 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34990 00003ACA 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 34991 00003ACC 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34992 00003ACE 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34993 00003AD0 E8D307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34994 00003AD3 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34995 00003AD5 F9                              stc                     ;
 34996 00003AD6 E83607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34997 00003AD9 EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34998                                  menu_numlock:
 34999 00003ADB E8E3FE                          call    set_numlock
 35000 00003ADE EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35001                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 35002 00003AE0 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 35003                                  
 35004                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 35005                                  
 35006                                  menu_default:
 35007 00003AE2 8936[B347]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 35008 00003AE6 803E[B647]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 35009 00003AEB 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 35010 00003AED E8F905                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 35011 00003AF0 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 35012 00003AF2 E80A06                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 35013 00003AF5 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 35014 00003AF7 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 35015 00003AF9 E81C06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 35016 00003AFC 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 35017                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 35018 00003AFF 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 35019 00003B01 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 35020                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 35021 00003B03 881E[B547]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 35022                                  timeout_skip:
 35023 00003B07 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35024                                  
 35025                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 35026                                  
 35027                                  menu_item:
 35028                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 35029 00003B09 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 35030 00003B0C 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 35031 00003B0E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 35032 00003B10 E84003                          call    srch_block      ;
 35033 00003B13 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 35034 00003B15 F9                              stc                     ;
 35035 00003B16 E8F606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 35036 00003B19 EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 35037                                  
 35038                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 35039                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 35040                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 35041                                  
 35042                                  menu_itemfound:
 35043 00003B1B 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 35044 00003B1C 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 35045 00003B1E 8887[B747]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 35046 00003B22 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 35047                                  
 35048                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 35049                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 35050                                  ;   description...
 35051                                  
 35052 00003B24 89B7[C147]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 35053 00003B28 89B7[D547]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 35054 00003B2C 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 35055 00003B2E E8B805                          call    skip_token      ;
 35056 00003B31 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35057 00003B33 E8C905                          call    skip_delim      ;
 35058 00003B36 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35059 00003B38 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 35060 00003B3A 89BF[D547]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 35061                                  
 35062                                  menu_nextitem:
 35063 00003B3E E8D205                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35064 00003B41 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 35065                                  
 35066                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 35067                                  
 35068                                  menu_getdefault:
 35069 00003B44 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 35070 00003B46 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 35071 00003B48 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 35072 00003B4A E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 35073                                  menu_valid:
 35074 00003B4D 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 35075 00003B4F 8816[B247]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 35076 00003B53 8B3E[B347]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 35077 00003B57 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 35078 00003B59 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 35079 00003B5B 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 35080                                  menu_chkdefault:
 35081 00003B5C 53                              push    bx              ;
 35082 00003B5D 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35083 00003B5F 8BB7[C147]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35084 00003B63 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 35085 00003B66 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35086 00003B67 06                              push    es              ;
 35087 00003B68 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35088 00003B69 E82703                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 35089 00003B6C 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35090 00003B6D 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35091 00003B6E 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 35092 00003B70 43                              inc     bx              ;
 35093 00003B71 3A1E[B247]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 35094 00003B75 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 35095                                  menu_nodefault:
 35096 00003B77 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 35097                                  menu_setdefault:
 35098 00003B79 881E[B147]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 35099                                  
 35100                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 35101                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 35102                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 35103                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 35104                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 35105                                  ;   with no timeout)
 35106                                  
 35107 00003B7D 803E[B547]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 35108 00003B82 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 35109 00003B84 F606[B047]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 35110 00003B89 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 35111 00003B8B E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 35112                                  
 35113                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 35114                                  
 35115                                  menu_display:
 35116 00003B8E B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 35117 00003B90 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35118 00003B92 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 35119 00003B94 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35120 00003B96 06                              push    es              ;
 35121 00003B97 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 35122 00003B9A 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 35123 00003B9C 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 35124 00003BA0 A3[AE47]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 35125 00003BA3 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 35126 00003BA7 A2[AD47]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 35127 00003BAA A1[A847]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 35128 00003BAD CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35129 00003BAF B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 35130 00003BB2 8A3E[A747]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 35131 00003BB6 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 35132                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 35133 00003BB8 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 35134 00003BBD FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 35135                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 35136 00003BBF 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 35137 00003BC4 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 35138 00003BC6 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 35139 00003BC8 8A36[AB47]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 35140                                  menu_clear:
 35141 00003BCC CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 35142 00003BCE 07                              pop     es              ;
 35143 00003BCF 8836[AB47]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 35144 00003BD3 BA[BE4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 35145 00003BD6 E8A509                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 35146                                  
 35147 00003BD9 F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35148 00003BDE 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 35149 00003BE0 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35150 00003BE4 8A36[AB47]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 35151 00003BE8 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 35152 00003BEA B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 35153 00003BEC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35154 00003BEE BA[0A4D]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 35155 00003BF1 E88A09                          call    print           ;
 35156 00003BF4 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 35157 00003BF6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35158 00003BF8 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 35159 00003BFB 8816[AA47]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 35160                                  
 35161                                  menu_nostatus:
 35162 00003BFF BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 35163                                  menu_disploop:
 35164 00003C02 E8BD02                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 35165 00003C05 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 35166 00003C06 3A1E[B247]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 35167 00003C0A 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 35168                                  
 35169                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 35170                                  
 35171 00003C0C B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 35172 00003C0E 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 35173 00003C10 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 35174 00003C13 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35175 00003C17 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 35176 00003C19 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35177                                  
 35178 00003C1B BA[F74C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 35179 00003C1E E85D09                          call    print           ;
 35180 00003C21 E83603                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 35181 00003C24 BA[CA4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 35182 00003C27 E85409                          call    print           ;
 35183 00003C2A FF36[AC47]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 35184 00003C2E 800E[AC47]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35185 00003C33 E87404                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 35186 00003C36 8F06[AC47]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 35187                                  
 35188                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 35189                                  
 35190                                  menu_autoselect:
 35191 00003C3A 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 35192 00003C3D 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 35193 00003C3F E80106                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 35194                                  menu_abort:
 35195 00003C42 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 35196 00003C44 E9EE00                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 35197                                  
 35198                                  normal_boot:
 35199 00003C47 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 35200 00003C4A 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 35201 00003C4C 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 35202 00003C50 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35203 00003C52 E9F7FD                          jmp     menu_search
 35204                                  
 35205                                  not_topmenu:
 35206 00003C55 80BF[B747]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35207 00003C5A 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 35208 00003C5C 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35209 00003C5E 8BBF[C147]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35210 00003C62 E8EE01                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 35211 00003C65 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 35212 00003C67 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 35213 00003C69 E927FE                          jmp     menu_found
 35214                                  
 35215                                  not_submenu:
 35216 00003C6C 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 35217 00003C6E 8B9F[C147]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35218                                  
 35219                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 35220                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 35221                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 35222                                  
 35223                                  no_selection:
 35224 00003C72 891E[B347]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 35225 00003C76 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 35226 00003C7A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35227 00003C7C 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35228 00003C7D 8E1E[DD14]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 35229 00003C81 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 35230                                  
 35231                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 35232                                  ;
 35233                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 35234                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 35235                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 35236                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 35237                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 35238                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 35239                                  ;
 35240                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 35241                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 35242                                  
 35243                                  copyblock_loop:
 35244 00003C83 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 35245 00003C84 E83C01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 35246 00003C87 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35247 00003C88 723C                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35248                                  
 35249                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 35250                                  
 35251                                  copyblock_begin:
 35252 00003C8A 50                              push    ax              ;
 35253 00003C8B 51                              push    cx              ;
 35254 00003C8C 56                              push    si              ;
 35255 00003C8D 57                              push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 35256 00003C8E BF[F647]                        mov     di,szCommon
 35257 00003C91 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35258 00003C92 0E                              push    cs              ;
 35259 00003C93 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35260 00003C94 E8FC01                          call    comp_names      ;
 35261 00003C97 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35262 00003C98 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35263 00003C99 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35264 00003C9A 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35265 00003C9B 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35266 00003C9C 740F                            je	short copyblock_check
 35267 00003C9E 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 35268 00003CA0 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 35269 00003CA2 57                              push    di              ;
 35270 00003CA3 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 35271 00003CA5 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35272 00003CA6 06                              push    es              ;
 35273 00003CA7 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35274 00003CA8 E8E801                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 35275 00003CAB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35276 00003CAC 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35277                                  copyblock_check:
 35278 00003CAD 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35279 00003CAF 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 35280 00003CB1 E85F04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35281 00003CB4 EBCD                            jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 35282                                  
 35283                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 35284 00003CB6 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 35285 00003CB9 E87D04                          call    get_char        ;
 35286 00003CBC 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35287 00003CBE 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35288 00003CC0 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35289 00003CC2 74C6                            je	short copyblock_begin
 35290 00003CC4 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 35291                                  ;
 35292                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 35293                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 35294                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 35295                                  ;
 35296                                  move_config:
 35297 00003CC6 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 35298 00003CC8 51                              push    cx              ;
 35299                                  ;
 35300                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 35301                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 35302                                  ;
 35303                                   	;mov	cx,7
 35304 00003CC9 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 35305 00003CCC BE[E947]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 35306 00003CCF 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 35307                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 35308                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 35309                                  copy_boot: 
 35310                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 35311 00003CD0 2E                              cs
 35312 00003CD1 AC                      	lodsb
 35313 00003CD2 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 35314 00003CD4 47                              inc     di              ;
 35315 00003CD5 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 35316                                  
 35317 00003CD7 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 35318                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 35319                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35320 00003CD8 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 35321 00003CDA 2E8B36[B347]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 35322 00003CDF 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 35323 00003CE1 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 35324 00003CE3 0E                              push    cs              ;
 35325 00003CE4 07                              pop     es              ;
 35326 00003CE5 BE[F647]                        mov     si,szCommon
 35327 00003CE8 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 35328 00003CEB E8B805                          call    any_delim       ;
 35329 00003CEE 7406                            je	short l2	;
 35330 00003CF0 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 35331 00003CF2 46                              inc     si              ;
 35332 00003CF3 47                              inc     di              ;
 35333 00003CF4 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 35334 00003CF6 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 35335 00003CF9 07                              pop     es              ;
 35336                                  
 35337                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 35338                                  
 35339 00003CFA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 35340 00003CFC 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35341 00003D01 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35342 00003D03 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 35343                                  
 35344 00003D04 51                              push    cx              ;
 35345 00003D05 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 35346 00003D07 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35347 00003D08 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 35348 00003D0A 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35349                                  
 35350                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 35351                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 35352                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 35353                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 35354                                  ;   is empty.
 35355                                  
 35356 00003D0B 06                              push    es              ;
 35357 00003D0C 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 35358 00003D0E 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 35359 00003D0F 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 35360 00003D15 E82800                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35361 00003D18 07                              pop     es
 35362                                  
 35363                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 35364                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 35365                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 35366                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 35367                                  
 35368                                  menu_done:
 35369 00003D19 803E[A847]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 35370 00003D1E 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 35371 00003D20 06                              push    es              ;
 35372 00003D21 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 35373 00003D24 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 35374 00003D26 A1[AE47]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 35375 00003D29 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 35376 00003D2D A0[AD47]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 35377 00003D30 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 35378 00003D34 07                              pop     es              ;
 35379                                  menu_exit:
 35380 00003D35 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 35381 00003D39 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 35382 00003D3D 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 35383 00003D3F C3                              retn
 35384                                  
 35385                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35386                                  ;
 35387                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35388                                  ;
 35389                                  ;   INPUT
 35390                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 35391                                  ;
 35392                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35393                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 35394                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 35395                                  ;
 35396                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35397                                  ;       None
 35398                                  ;
 35399                                  ;   NOTES
 35400                                  ;       None
 35401                                  ;
 35402                                  ;   HISTORY
 35403                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35404                                  ;
 35405                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35406                                  
 35407                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35408                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 35409                                  
 35410                                  copy_envvar:
 35411 00003D40 51                              push    cx              ;
 35412 00003D41 56                              push    si              ;
 35413 00003D42 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35414 00003D43 06                              push    es              ;
 35415 00003D44 06                              push    es              ;
 35416 00003D45 8E06[DD14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 35417 00003D49 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 35418                                  
 35419                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 35420                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 35421                                  ;   config.sys line)
 35422                                  ;
 35423                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 35424                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 35425                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 35426                                  
 35427 00003D4A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 35428                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 35429 00003D4C AC                              lodsb                   ;
 35430 00003D4D 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35431 00003D4F F9                              stc                     ;
 35432 00003D50 746C                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35433 00003D52 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr          ;
 35434 00003D54 F9                              stc                     ;
 35435 00003D55 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 35436 00003D57 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf          ;
 35437 00003D59 F9                              stc                     ;
 35438 00003D5A 7462                            je	short copy_envexit
 35439 00003D5C 41                              inc     cx              ;
 35440 00003D5D 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 35441 00003D5F 75EB                            jne	short copy_varlen
 35442 00003D61 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 35443 00003D63 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35444 00003D65 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35445 00003D67 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35446 00003D68 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35447                                  copy_varsrch:
 35448 00003D6A 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35449 00003D6D 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35450 00003D6F 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35451 00003D71 51                              push    cx              ;
 35452 00003D72 56                              push    si              ;
 35453 00003D73 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 35454 00003D75 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35455 00003D76 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35456 00003D77 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35457 00003D79 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 35458 00003D7D 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 35459                                  
 35460                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 35461                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 35462                                  
 35463 00003D7F B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35464 00003D82 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 35465 00003D84 56                              push    si              ;
 35466 00003D85 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 35467 00003D87 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 35468 00003D89 2E8B0E[DB14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 35469 00003D8E 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 35470                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 35471                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 35472                                  
 35473 00003D90 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 35474 00003D91 26                      	es	; 26h
 35475 00003D92 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 35476                                  
 35477 00003D93 5E                      	pop     si
 35478                                  copy_envprep:
 35479 00003D94 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 35480 00003D97 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 35481 00003D99 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 35482 00003D9C 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 35483                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 35484                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35485                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 35486 00003D9E AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 35487 00003D9F 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 35488 00003DA1 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 35489 00003DA3 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 35490 00003DA5 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 35491 00003DA7 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 35492 00003DA8 EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 35493                                  
 35494                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 35495 00003DAA 51                              push    cx              ;
 35496 00003DAB B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35497 00003DAE F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 35498 00003DB0 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35499 00003DB1 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 35500                                  
 35501                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35502                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 35503                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 35504                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 35505                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 35506                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 35507                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 35508                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 35509                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 35510                                  
 35511                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 35512 00003DB3 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 35513 00003DB5 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 35514                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 35515 00003DB6 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 35516 00003DB9 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35517                                  
 35518                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 35519 00003DBE 07                              pop     es              ;
 35520 00003DBF 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35521 00003DC0 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35522 00003DC1 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35523                                  
 35524                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35525 00003DC2 C3                              retn
 35526                                  
 35527                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35528                                  ;
 35529                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 35530                                  ;
 35531                                  ;   INPUT
 35532                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35533                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35534                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 35535                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 35536                                  ;
 35537                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35538                                  ;       Same as above
 35539                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 35540                                  ;
 35541                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35542                                  ;       All
 35543                                  ;
 35544                                  ;   NOTES
 35545                                  ;       None
 35546                                  ;
 35547                                  ;   HISTORY
 35548                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35549                                  ;
 35550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35551                                  
 35552                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35553                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 35554                                  
 35555                                  copy_block:
 35556 00003DC3 E87303                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 35557 00003DC6 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 35558 00003DC8 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35559 00003DCA 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 35560 00003DCC 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 35561                                  
 35562 00003DCE 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 35563 00003DD0 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 35564 00003DD2 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 35565                                  
 35566                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 35567                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 35568                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 35569                                  
 35570 00003DD4 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 35571 00003DD9 57                              push    di              ;
 35572                                  
 35573 00003DDA BF[F147]                        mov     di,szMenu
 35574 00003DDD E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 35575 00003DE0 7425                            je	short copy_skip	;
 35576                                  
 35577 00003DE2 BF[F647]                        mov     di,szCommon
 35578 00003DE5 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 35579 00003DE8 741D                            je	short copy_skip	;
 35580                                  
 35581 00003DEA 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 35582 00003DEC E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 35583 00003DEF 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 35584 00003DF1 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35585 00003DF2 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 35586 00003DF4 51                              push    cx              ;
 35587 00003DF5 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 35588 00003DF7 56                              push    si              ;
 35589 00003DF8 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 35590 00003DF9 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 35591 00003DFB E81003                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 35592 00003DFE E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 35593 00003E01 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35594 00003E02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35595 00003E03 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 35596 00003E05 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 35597                                  
 35598                                  copy_skip:
 35599 00003E07 5F                              pop     di
 35600                                  copy_error:
 35601 00003E08 F8                              clc                     ;
 35602 00003E09 E80304                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 35603 00003E0C EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 35604                                  
 35605                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 35606                                  
 35607                                  copy_line:
 35608 00003E0E 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 35609 00003E10 47                              inc     di              ;
 35610 00003E11 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 35611 00003E13 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 35612 00003E15 2E803E[E014]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 35613 00003E1B 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 35614 00003E1D E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 35615 00003E20 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 35616 00003E22 47                              inc     di              ;
 35617 00003E23 47                              inc     di              ;
 35618 00003E24 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 35619                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 35620 00003E26 E81003                          call    get_char        ;
 35621 00003E29 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 35622 00003E2B 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 35623 00003E2D 47                              inc     di              ;
 35624                                  copy_next:
 35625 00003E2E 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 35626 00003E30 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 35627                                  
 35628                                  copy_nextline:
 35629 00003E32 E8DE02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35630 00003E35 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 35631                                  
 35632                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35633                                  ;copy_done:
 35634                                          ;retn
 35635                                  
 35636                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35637                                  ;
 35638                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 35639                                  ;
 35640                                  ;   INPUT
 35641                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 35642                                  ;
 35643                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35644                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 35645                                  ;
 35646                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35647                                  ;       DX
 35648                                  ;
 35649                                  ;   NOTES
 35650                                  ;       None
 35651                                  ;
 35652                                  ;   HISTORY
 35653                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35654                                  ;
 35655                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35656                                  
 35657                                  get_linenum:
 35658 00003E37 50                              push    ax              ;
 35659 00003E38 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 35660 00003E3A 51                              push    cx              ;
 35661 00003E3B 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 35662 00003E3D 56                              push    si              ;
 35663 00003E3E 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35664 00003E43 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 35665                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 35666 00003E45 E8C602                          call    skip_line       ;
 35667 00003E48 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 35668 00003E4A 43                              inc     bx              ;
 35669 00003E4B 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 35670 00003E4D 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 35671                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 35672 00003E4F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35673 00003E50 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35674 00003E51 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35675 00003E52 C3                              retn
 35676                                  
 35677                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35678                                  ;
 35679                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 35680                                  ;
 35681                                  ;   INPUT
 35682                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 35683                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 35684                                  ;
 35685                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35686                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 35687                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 35688                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 35689                                  ;
 35690                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35691                                  ;       None
 35692                                  ;
 35693                                  ;   NOTES
 35694                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 35695                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 35696                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 35697                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 35698                                  ;
 35699                                  ;   HISTORY
 35700                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35701                                  ;
 35702                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35703                                  
 35704                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 35705 00003E53 50                              push    ax              ;
 35706 00003E54 51                              push    cx              ;
 35707 00003E55 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35708 00003E5A 56                              push    si              ;
 35709 00003E5B 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35710 00003E5D 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35711 00003E5E 06                              push    es              ;
 35712 00003E5F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35713 00003E60 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 35714 00003E63 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 35715 00003E65 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 35716 00003E67 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35717 00003E68 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35718 00003E69 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35719 00003E6A 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35720                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 35721 00003E6B C3                              retn			;
 35722                                  
 35723                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35724                                  ;
 35725                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 35726                                  ;
 35727                                  ;   INPUT
 35728                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 35729                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 35730                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 35731                                  ;
 35732                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35733                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 35734                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35735                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35736                                  ;
 35737                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35738                                  ;       AX
 35739                                  ;
 35740                                  ;   NOTES
 35741                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 35742                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 35743                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 35744                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 35745                                  ;
 35746                                  ;   HISTORY
 35747                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35748                                  ;
 35749                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35750                                  
 35751                                  find_block:
 35752 00003E6C E8CA02                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 35753 00003E6F 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 35754 00003E71 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 35755 00003E73 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 35756 00003E75 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 35757 00003E77 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 35758 00003E79 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 35759 00003E7B 2E800E[E014]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35760 00003E81 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
