 35761                                  check_line:
 35762 00003E83 2E800E[E014]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35763 00003E89 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 35764 00003E8C 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 35765                                  next_line:
 35766 00003E8E E88202                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 35767 00003E91 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 35768                                  ;find_exit:
 35769                                  ;	retn
 35770                                  
 35771                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35772                                  ;
 35773                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 35774                                  ;
 35775                                  ;   INPUT
 35776                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 35777                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35778                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35779                                  ;
 35780                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35781                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 35782                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35783                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35784                                  ;
 35785                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35786                                  ;       AX
 35787                                  ;
 35788                                  ;   NOTES
 35789                                  ;       None
 35790                                  ;
 35791                                  ;   HISTORY
 35792                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35793                                  ;
 35794                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35795                                  
 35796                                  comp_names:
 35797 00003E93 57                              push    di              ;
 35798                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 35799 00003E94 E8A202                          call    get_char        ;
 35800 00003E97 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 35801 00003E99 E80A04                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 35802 00003E9C 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 35803 00003E9E 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 35804 00003EA0 47                              inc     di              ;
 35805 00003EA1 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 35806                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 35807 00003EA4 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 35808 00003EA6 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 35809 00003EA8 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 35810                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 35811 00003EA9 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35812 00003EAA C3                              retn			;
 35813                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 35814 00003EAB 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 35815 00003EAD E8F603                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35816 00003EB0 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35817 00003EB2 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35818                                  
 35819                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35820                                  
 35821                                  comp_names_safe:
 35822 00003EB4 50                              push    ax
 35823 00003EB5 51                              push    cx
 35824 00003EB6 56                              push	si
 35825 00003EB7 1E                              push    ds
 35826 00003EB8 0E                              push    cs
 35827 00003EB9 1F                              pop     ds
 35828 00003EBA E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 35829 00003EBD 1F                              pop     ds
 35830 00003EBE 5E                      	pop	si
 35831 00003EBF 59                              pop     cx
 35832 00003EC0 58                              pop     ax
 35833 00003EC1 C3                              retn
 35834                                  
 35835                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35836                                  ;
 35837                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35838                                  ;
 35839                                  ;   INPUT
 35840                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35841                                  ;
 35842                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35843                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35844                                  ;
 35845                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35846                                  ;       None
 35847                                  ;
 35848                                  ;   NOTES
 35849                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35850                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35851                                  ;
 35852                                  ;   HISTORY
 35853                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35854                                  ;
 35855                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35856                                  
 35857                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35858                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 35859                                  
 35860                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35861 00003EC2 50                              push    ax              ;
 35862 00003EC3 53                              push    bx              ;
 35863 00003EC4 51                              push    cx              ;
 35864 00003EC5 52                              push    dx              ;
 35865 00003EC6 56                              push    si              ;
 35866 00003EC7 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35867 00003EC9 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35868 00003ECD CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35869 00003ECF 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 35870 00003ED0 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35871 00003ED2 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 35872 00003ED4 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 35873 00003ED7 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 35874 00003ED9 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35875 00003EDB 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 35876 00003EDD 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35877 00003EDF 8A26[A747]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35878 00003EE3 3A1E[B147]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35879 00003EE7 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 35880 00003EE9 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35881 00003EEC 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 35882 00003EEE B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 35883 00003EF0 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 35884 00003EF2 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35885 00003EF4 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 35886 00003EF6 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35887                                  print_other:                    ;
 35888 00003EF9 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 35889 00003EFB 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35890 00003EFD 8BBF[D547]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35891 00003F01 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35892 00003F03 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35893 00003F07 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35894 00003F09 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35895 00003F0C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35896 00003F0E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35897 00003F10 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35898 00003F12 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35899                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35900 00003F14 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35901 00003F17 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35902 00003F19 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35903 00003F1B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35904 00003F1D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35905                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35906 00003F1F B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 35907 00003F22 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35908 00003F24 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35909 00003F26 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35910 00003F28 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35911 00003F2A 06                              push    es              ;
 35912                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35913 00003F2B 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35914 00003F2E 47                              inc     di              ;
 35915 00003F2F 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35916 00003F31 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 35917 00003F33 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 35918                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35919 00003F35 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 35920 00003F37 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35921 00003F39 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35922 00003F3B 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35923 00003F3D B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35924 00003F3F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35925 00003F41 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35926 00003F43 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35927 00003F46 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 35928 00003F48 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35929 00003F4A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35930 00003F4C EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 35931                                  print_done:                     ;
 35932 00003F4E 07                              pop     es              ;
 35933 00003F4F 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35934 00003F50 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35935 00003F52 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35936 00003F54 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35937 00003F55 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35938 00003F56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35939 00003F57 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35940 00003F58 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35941 00003F59 C3                              retn			;
 35942                                  
 35943                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35944                                  ;
 35945                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35946                                  ;
 35947                                  ;   INPUT
 35948                                  ;       None
 35949                                  ;
 35950                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35951                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35952                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35953                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35954                                  ;
 35955                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35956                                  ;       None
 35957                                  ;
 35958                                  ;   NOTES
 35959                                  ;       None
 35960                                  ;
 35961                                  ;   HISTORY
 35962                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35963                                  ;
 35964                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35965                                  
 35966                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35967 00003F5A 8A1E[B147]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35968 00003F5E 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 35969 00003F60 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 35970 00003F63 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35971 00003F66 803E[B547]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35972 00003F6B 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35973 00003F6D B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35974 00003F6F CD21                            int     21h             ;
 35975 00003F71 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35976                                  check_time:
 35977 00003F73 A0[B547]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35978 00003F76 2A06[B647]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35979 00003F7A 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 35980 00003F7C 800E[B047]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35981 00003F81 C606[B647]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35982 00003F86 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35983                                  show_time:
 35984 00003F89 53                              push    bx              ;
 35985 00003F8A 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35986 00003F8C 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35987 00003F90 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35988 00003F92 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35989 00003F94 52                              push    dx              ;
 35990 00003F95 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35991 00003F98 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35992 00003F9A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35993 00003F9C BA[6A4D]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35994 00003F9F E8DC05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35995 00003FA2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35996 00003FA4 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35997 00003FA5 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 35998 00003FA7 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35999 00003FA9 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 36000 00003FAB 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36001 00003FAD B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36002 00003FAF CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 36003 00003FB1 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 36004 00003FB3 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36005 00003FB5 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36006 00003FB7 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 36007 00003FB9 5A                              pop     dx
 36008 00003FBA B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was

 36011                                  input_key:

 36021 00003FD4 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one

 36083 00004051 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no

 36226                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36227                                  ;
 36228                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 36229                                  ;
 36230                                  ;   INPUT
 36231                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36232                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36233                                  ;
 36234                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36235                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36236                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36237                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36238                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36239                                  ;
 36240                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36241                                  ;       AX
 36242                                  ;
 36243                                  ;   NOTES
 36244                                  ;       None
 36245                                  ;
 36246                                  ;   HISTORY
 36247                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36248                                  ;
 36249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36250                                  
 36251                                  skip_token:
 36252 000040E9 E84D00                          call    get_char
 36253 000040EC 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 36254 000040EE E8B501                          call    any_delim
 36255 000040F1 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 36256                                  skip_check_eol:
 36257 000040F3 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36258 000040F5 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 36259 000040F7 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36260 000040F9 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 36261 000040FB F8                              clc
 36262                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36263 000040FC C3                      	retn
 36264                                  skip_token_eol:
 36265 000040FD F9                              stc
 36266                                  skip_token_done:
 36267 000040FE C3                              retn
 36268                                  
 36269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36270                                  ;
 36271                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36272                                  ;
 36273                                  ;   INPUT
 36274                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36275                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36276                                  ;
 36277                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36278                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36279                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36280                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36281                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36282                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36283                                  ;
 36284                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36285                                  ;       AX
 36286                                  ;
 36287                                  ;   NOTES
 36288                                  ;       None
 36289                                  ;
 36290                                  ;   HISTORY
 36291                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36292                                  ;
 36293                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36294                                  
 36295                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36296 000040FF E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 36297 00004102 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36298 00004105 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36299 00004107 E8AC01                          call    delim           ;
 36300 0000410A 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 36301 0000410C EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36302                                  
 36303                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36304                                  ;
 36305                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36306                                  ;
 36307                                  ;   INPUT
 36308                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36309                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36310                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36311                                  ;
 36312                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36313                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36314                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36315                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36316                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36317                                  ;
 36318                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36319                                  ;       AX
 36320                                  ;
 36321                                  ;   NOTES
 36322                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36323                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36324                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36325                                  ;
 36326                                  ;   HISTORY
 36327                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36328                                  ;
 36329                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36330                                  
 36331                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36332                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 36333                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36334                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 36335                                       
 36336                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36337                                  
 36338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36339                                  ;
 36340                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36341                                  ;
 36342                                  ;   INPUT
 36343                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36344                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36345                                  ;
 36346                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36347                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36348                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36349                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36350                                  ;
 36351                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36352                                  ;       AX
 36353                                  ;
 36354                                  ;   NOTES
 36355                                  ;       None
 36356                                  ;
 36357                                  ;   HISTORY
 36358                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36359                                  ;
 36360                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36361                                  
 36362                                  skip_line:
 36363 0000410E E82800                          call    get_char
 36364 00004111 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 36365                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36366 00004113 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36367 00004115 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 36368                                  skip_line_done:
 36369                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36370 00004117 C3                              retn

 36399                                  get_number:
 36400 00004118 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36401                                  num_loop:

 36413 0000412F 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;

 36416 00004134 98                              cbw                     ;

 36418 00004137 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;

 36424                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36425                                  ;
 36426                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36427                                  ;
 36428                                  ;   INPUT
 36429                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36430                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36431                                  ;
 36432                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36433                                  ;       AL == next character
 36434                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36435                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36436                                  ;
 36437                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36438                                  ;       AX
 36439                                  ;
 36440                                  ;   NOTES
 36441                                  ;       None
 36442                                  ;
 36443                                  ;   HISTORY
 36444                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36445                                  ;
 36446                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36447                                  
 36448                                  get_char:
 36449 00004139 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36450 0000413C 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36451                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36452 0000413E 26                      	es	
 36453 0000413F AC                      	lodsb
 36454 00004140 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 36455 00004142 C3                              retn			;
 36456                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36457 00004143 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36458                                  nearby_ret:
 36459 00004146 C3                              retn

 36461                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36462                                  ;
 36463                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36464                                  ;
 36465                                  ;   INPUT
 36466                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36467                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36468                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36469                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36470                                  ;
 36471                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36472                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36473                                  ;
 36474                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36475                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36476                                  ;
 36477                                  ;   NOTES
 36478                                  ;       None
 36479                                  ;
 36480                                  ;   HISTORY
 36481                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36482                                  ;
 36483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36484                                  
 36485                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36486                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 36487                                  
 36488                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36489                                  query_user:
 36490 00004147 F606[B047]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36491                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36492 0000414C 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 36493 0000414E E9BA00                  	jmp	skip_all
 36494                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36495                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36496                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 36497                                  qu_1:
 36498 00004151 F606[B047]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36499 00004156 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36500 00004158 50                              push    ax                      ;
 36501 00004159 A0[DF14]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36502 0000415C F606[B047]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36503 00004161 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36504 00004163 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36505                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36506 00004165 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 36507                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36508                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36509                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36510                                  
 36511                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36512 00004167 58                      	pop	ax
 36513 00004168 C3                      	retn
 36514                                  
 36515                                  query_all:
 36516                                  
 36517                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36518                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36519                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36520                                  
 36521 00004169 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36522 0000416A BA[BC4D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36523 0000416D 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36524 0000416F 7451                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36525                                  
 36526 00004171 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36527 00004173 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36528 00004175 BF[FD47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 36529                                  find_match:                             ;
 36530 00004178 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36531 0000417A 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 36532 0000417C 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36533 0000417E 47                              inc     di                      ;
 36534 0000417F 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36535 00004181 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36536 00004183 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36537                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36538 00004186 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36539                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36540 00004188 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36541 0000418B B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 36542 0000418D B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36543                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36544 0000418F 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36545 00004191 47                              inc     di                      ;
 36546 00004192 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 36547 00004194 CD21                            int     21h                     ;

 36549 00004198 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36550 0000419A 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36551 0000419D 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36552 0000419F B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36553                                  cmd_notset:
 36554 000041A1 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36555                                  line_print:                             ;
 36556                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36557 000041A3 26                              es
 36558 000041A4 AC                      	lodsb
 36559 000041A5 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 36560 000041A7 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 36561 000041A9 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 36562                                  non_null:                               ;
 36563 000041AB 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36564 000041AD 7210                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36565 000041AF 7506                            jne	short non_space		;
 36566 000041B1 26803C20                        cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36567 000041B5 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 36568                                  non_space:                              ;
 36569 000041B7 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 36570 000041B9 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36571 000041BB CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 36572 000041BD EBE4                            jmp	short line_print	;
 36573                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36574 000041BF BA[5A4D]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36575                                  
 36576                                  generic_prompt:
 36577 000041C2 E8B903                          call    print                   ;
 36578                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36579 000041C5 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36580 000041C7 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 36581 000041C9 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36582 000041CB 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 36583 000041CD 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36584 000041D0 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 36585 000041D2 A0[664D]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36586 000041D5 800E[B047]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36587 000041DA EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36588                                  not_func:
 36589 000041DC 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36590 000041DE 3A06[664D]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36591 000041E2 7419                            je	short legal_char	;

 36593 000041E8 7413                            je	short legal_char	;

 36596 000041F1 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?

 36599 000041FA A0[624D]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 36600                                  legal_char:                             ;

 36603

 36607 00004207 F8                      	clc
 36608                                  do_cmd:

 36610                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36611                                  	; cf=0
 36612                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36613 00004209 C3                      	retn

 36677                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36678                                  
 36679                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36680                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 36681                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36682                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36683                                  
 36684                                  disable_autoexec:
 36685                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36686                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36687                                  
 36688 00004243 F606[B047]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36689 00004248 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 36690 0000424A F606[A647]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36691 0000424F 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 36692 00004251 800E[A647]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36693                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36694 00004256 810E[B047]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36695 0000425C BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36696                                  dae_1:
 36697                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36698 0000425F A0[E546]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36699                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36700 00004262 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36701 00004264 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36702 00004266 8A1E[E646]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36703 0000426A B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36704 0000426C 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36705 0000426E 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36706 00004271 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36707 00004274 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 36708 00004276 881E[E646]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36709 0000427A 81C3[E746]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36710 0000427E 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36711                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36712 0000427F 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36713 00004282 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36714 00004284 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 36715 00004285 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 36716 00004287 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;

 36720                                  disable_exit:                           ;

 36743                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36744                                  
 36745                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36746                                  ; (SYSINIT:4C45h)
 36747

 36749                                  ;%if 0
 36750                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36751                                  ;
 36752                                  any_delim:
 36753 000042A6 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 36754 000042A8 7427                    	je	short delim_ret
 36755 000042AA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36756 000042AC 7423                    	je	short delim_ret
 36757 000042AE 3C5B                    	cmp	al,'['
 36758 000042B0 741F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36759 000042B2 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'
 36760 000042B4 741B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36761                                  ;
 36762                                  ;;endif ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36763                                  ;%endif ; 02/11/2022
 36764                                  
 36765                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36766                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36767                                  delim:
 36768 000042B6 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36769 000042B8 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36770                                  
 36771 000042BA 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36772 000042BC 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36773                                  
 36774                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36775 000042BE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36776 000042C0 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36777 000042C2 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36778 000042C4 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36779 000042C6 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36780 000042C8 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36781 000042CA 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36782 000042CC 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36783 000042CE 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36784                                  
 36785                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36786                                  
 36787                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36788                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36789                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36790 000042D0 F8                      	clc
 36791                                  ;endif
 36792                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36793                                  delim_ret:
 36794                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36795                                  	; cf = 0
 36796 000042D1 C3                      	retn

 36817                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36818                                  ;
 36819                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36820                                  
 36821                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36822                                  
 36823                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36824                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 36825                                  mapcase:
 36826 000042DF 51                      	push	cx
 36827 000042E0 56                      	push	si
 36828 000042E1 1E                      	push	ds
 36829                                  
 36830 000042E2 06                      	push	es
 36831 000042E3 1F                      	pop	ds
 36832                                  
 36833                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36834                                  
 36835                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36836                                  
 36837                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36838 000042E4 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 36839                                  ;else
 36840                                  ;	xor	si,si
 36841                                  ;endif
 36842                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36843                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36844                                  	;xor	si, si
 36845                                  
 36846                                  convloop:
 36847 000042E6 AC                      	lodsb
 36848 000042E7 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36849 000042E9 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36850 000042EB 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36851 000042ED 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36852 000042EF 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36853 000042F1 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36854                                  noconv:
 36855                                  
 36856                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36857                                  
 36858                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36859                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36860                                  
 36861                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36862                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36863                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36864                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36865                                  ;
 36866 000042F4 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36867 000042F7 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36868 000042F9 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36869 000042FB 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 36870                                  check_eol:
 36871 000042FD 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 36872 000042FF 7406                    	je	short convdone
 36873 00004301 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36874 00004303 7402                    	je	short convdone
 36875                                  ;endif
 36876                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36877 00004305 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 36878                                  convdone:
 36879 00004307 1F                      	pop	ds
 36880 00004308 5E                      	pop	si
 36881 00004309 59                      	pop	cx
 36882 0000430A C3                      	retn

 36886                                  ; procedure : round
 36887                                  ;
 36888                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36889                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36890                                  ;
 36891                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36892                                  
 36893                                  round:
 36894 0000430B 50                      	push	ax
 36895 0000430C 2EA1[6203]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36896                                  
 36897 00004310 E857CE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36898                                  
 36899 00004313 2E0106[6403]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36900 00004318 2EC706[6203]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36901 0000431F 2EA1[6403]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36902 00004323 2E3B06[A502]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36903 00004328 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 36904 0000432A 2EF606[E414]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36905 00004330 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36906 00004332 06                      	push	es

 36908 00004334 2E8B36[E214]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36909 00004339 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36910 0000433B 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36911 0000433D 48                      	dec	ax
 36912                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36913 0000433E 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36914 00004342 2E8026[E414]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh

 36916 00004349 07                      	pop	es

 36918 0000434A 58                      	pop	ax

 36981                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36982                                  ;
 36983                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36984                                  ;
 36985                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36986                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36987                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36988                                  ;
 36989                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36990                                  
 36991                                  getnum:
 36992 00004382 53                      	push	bx
 36993 00004383 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36994                                  b2:
 36995 00004385 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36996 00004388 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36997                                  
 36998 0000438A 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36999 0000438B 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37000                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37001                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37002 0000438C B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37003 0000438E F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37004 00004390 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37005 00004391 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37006 00004393 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37007 00004396 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37008                                  
 37009 00004398 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37010                                  
 37011 00004399 E8FBE5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 37012 0000439C 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37013 0000439E 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37014 000043A0 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37015 000043A2 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37016 000043A4 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37017 000043A6 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37018 000043A8 7417                    	je	short b15
 37019 000043AA 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37020 000043AF 7410                    	je	short b15
 37021 000043B1 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37022                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37023                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37024                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37025                                  	;nop
 37026 000043B3 740C                    	je	short b15
 37027 000043B5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37028 000043B7 7408                    	je	short b15
 37029 000043B9 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37030 000043BB 7404                    	je	short b15
 37031 000043BD 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37032 000043BF 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37033                                  b15:
 37034 000043C1 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37035 000043C6 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37036                                  b1:
 37037 000043CB 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37038 000043CD 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37039 000043CF 5B                      	pop	bx
 37040 000043D0 C3                      	retn
 37041                                  badnum:
 37042                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37043                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37044 000043D1 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37045                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37046 000043D3 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37047 000043D7 5B                      	pop	bx
 37048 000043D8 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37049 000043D9 C3                      	retn
 37050                                  
 37051                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37052                                  
 37053                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37054                                  
 37055                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37056                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37057                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37058                                  ;	si = 0
 37059                                  ;	ax = country id
 37060                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37061                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37062                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37063                                  ;
 37064                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37065                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37066                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37067                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37068                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37069                                  
 37070                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37071                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 37072                                  
 37073 000043DA 57                      	push	di
 37074 000043DB 50                      	push	ax
 37075 000043DC 52                      	push	dx
 37076                                  
 37077 000043DD 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 37078 000043DF 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37079 000043E1 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 37080 000043E4 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 37081 000043E7 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37082                                  
 37083 000043E9 06                      	push	es
 37084 000043EA 56                      	push	si
 37085                                  
 37086 000043EB 0E                      	push	cs
 37087 000043EC 07                      	pop	es
 37088                                  
 37089 000043ED BF[4B46]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 37090 000043F0 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 37091 000043F3 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 37092                                  
 37093 000043F5 5E                      	pop	si
 37094 000043F6 07                      	pop	es
 37095 000043F7 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 37096                                  
 37097 000043F9 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 37098 000043FC 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 37099 000043FF 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 37100                                  
 37101 00004401 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 37102 00004402 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 37103 00004404 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 37104 00004407 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 37105 0000440A E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 37106 0000440D 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37107                                  
 37108 0000440F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 37109 00004411 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 37110 00004415 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37111                                  
 37112 00004417 46                      	inc	si
 37113 00004418 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 37114 00004419 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 37115 0000441A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 37116 0000441B 5F                      	pop	di
 37117                                  
 37118                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 37119 0000441C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 37120 0000441F 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 37121                                  
 37122 00004421 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 37123 00004424 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 37124 00004426 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 37125 00004429 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 37126                                  
 37127                                  setdoscntry_next:
 37128 0000442B 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 37129 0000442D 46                      	inc	si
 37130 0000442E 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 37131 0000442F E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 37132                                  
 37133 00004431 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 37134                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 37135 00004434 F9                      	stc
 37136 00004435 C3                      	retn
 37137                                  
 37138                                  setdosdata_fail:
 37139 00004436 5E                      	pop	si
 37140 00004437 59                      	pop	cx
 37141 00004438 5F                      	pop	di
 37142 00004439 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 37143                                  
 37144                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 37145 0000443B 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 37146                                  
 37147                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 37148 0000443E 2E8916[5346]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 37149 00004443 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 37150 00004446 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 37151 00004449 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 37152 0000444C E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 37153 0000444F 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 37154                                  
 37155 00004451 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 37156 00004453 46                      	inc	si
 37157 00004454 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 37158                                  
 37159                                  setdoscntry_data:
 37160 00004455 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37161 00004456 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 37162 00004457 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 37163                                  
 37164 00004458 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 37165 0000445B E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 37166 0000445E 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 37167                                  
 37168 00004460 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 37169 00004463 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37170 00004466 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37171 00004469 F9                      	stc
 37172 0000446A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37173 0000446C 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37174                                  
 37175 0000446E BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37176 00004471 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 37177 00004474 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 37178 00004476 F9                      	stc
 37179 00004477 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 37180 00004479 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 37181                                  
 37182 0000447B 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37183 0000447D 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 37184                                  
 37185 0000447F 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 37186 00004482 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37187 00004485 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37188 00004488 F9                      	stc
 37189 00004489 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 37190 0000448B 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37191                                  
 37192 0000448D 56                      	push	si
 37193 0000448E BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 37194 00004491 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 37195 00004493 5E                      	pop	si
 37196 00004494 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37197 00004497 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 37198 0000449A B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 37199 0000449C F9                      	stc
 37200 0000449D CD21                    	int	21h
 37201 0000449F 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37202                                  
 37203 000044A1 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37204 000044A3 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 37205                                  
 37206 000044A5 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 37207 000044A8 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 37208 000044AB 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 37209 000044AD 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 37210 000044AE 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 37211 000044AF 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 37212 000044B3 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37213                                  
 37214                                  	;if	bugfix
 37215 000044B5 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 37216                                  	;endif
 37217                                  
 37218 000044B8 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 37219 000044BA 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 37220                                  
 37221 000044BC 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 37222                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 37223 000044C0 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 37224                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 37225                                  	
 37226 000044C4 57                      	push	di			;save di
 37227                                  
 37228 000044C5 50                      	push	ax
 37229 000044C6 2EA1[5346]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 37230 000044CA 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 37231 000044CD 58                      	pop	ax
 37232                                  
 37233                                  setdoscntry_mov:
 37234 000044CE F3A4                    	rep	movsb			;copy the table into dos
 37235 000044D0 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?
 37236 000044D2 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_data_next
 37237                                  
 37238 000044D4 5F                      	pop	di			;restore di
 37239 000044D5 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 37240                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 37241 000044D9 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 37242                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 37243                                  
 37244                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 37245 000044DD 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 37246 000044DE 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 37247 000044DF 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 37248 000044E0 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 37249 000044E2 46                      	inc	si
 37250 000044E3 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 37251 000044E4 49                      	dec	cx
 37252 000044E5 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 37253 000044E8 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 37254 000044EA E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 37255                                  
 37256                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37257                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 37258                                  	;retn

 37262                                  	;if	bugfix
 37263                                  
 37264                                  setdbcs_before_copy:
 37265 000044ED 3C07                    	cmp	al,SetDBCS ; 7		; dbcs vector set?
 37266 000044EF 7516                    	jne	short sdbcsbc		; jump if not
 37267 000044F1 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 37268 000044F5 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 37269                                  
 37270 000044F7 57                      	push	di
 37271 000044F8 50                      	push	ax
 37272 000044F9 51                      	push	cx
 37273 000044FA 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		; load block length
 37274 000044FD 83C702                  	add	di,2			; points actual data
 37275 00004500 30C0                    	xor	al,al			; fill bytes
 37276 00004502 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; clear data block
 37277 00004504 59                      	pop	cx
 37278 00004505 58                      	pop	ax
 37279 00004506 5F                      	pop	di
