 37288                                  getcountrydestination:
 37289                                  
 37290                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37291                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 37292                                  ;
 37293                                  ;input: al - data id
 37294                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37295                                  ;on return:
 37296                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 37297                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 37298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37299                                  
 37300                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37301                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 37302                                  
 37303 00004508 51                      	push	cx
 37304                                  	;add	di,74
 37305 00004509 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 37306                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 37307 0000450C 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 37308 0000450F 47                      	inc	di
 37309 00004510 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 37310                                  
 37311                                  getcntrydest:
 37312 00004511 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 37313 00004514 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 37314 00004516 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 37315 0000451A 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 37316                                  
 37317 0000451C 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 37318 0000451F EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 37319                                  
 37320                                  getcntrydest_1:
 37321                                  	;add	di,41
 37322 00004521 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 37323                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 37324 00004524 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 37325 00004526 F9                      	stc
 37326 00004527 EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37327                                  
 37328                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 37329 00004529 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 37330 0000452B 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 37331                                  
 37332 0000452D 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 37333 0000452E EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37334                                  
 37335                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 37336 00004530 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 37337                                  
 37338                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 37339 00004534 59                      	pop	cx
 37340 00004535 C3                      	retn
 37341                                  
 37342                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37343                                  
 37344                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37345                                  
 37346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37347                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37348                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37349                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37350                                  ;
 37351                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37352                                  ;	 be moved.
 37353                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37354                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37355                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37356                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37357                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37358                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37359                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37360                                  
 37361 00004536 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37362 00004537 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37363 0000453A F9                      	stc
 37364 0000453B CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37365 0000453D 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37366 0000453E 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37367                                  
 37368 00004540 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37369 00004542 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37370 00004544 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37371 00004546 F9                      	stc
 37372 00004547 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37373                                  ricb_exit:
 37374 00004549 C3                      	retn
 37375

 37378                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 37379                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 37380                                  %if 0
 37381                                  
 37382                                  set_country_path:
 37383                                  
 37384                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37385                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37386                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37387                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37388                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37389                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37390                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37392                                  
 37393                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37394                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37395                                  
 37396                                  	push	si
 37397                                  
 37398                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37399                                  	push	es
 37400                                  	pop	ds
 37401                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37402                                  
 37403                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37404                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37405                                  
 37406                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37407                                  	inc	si
 37408                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37409                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37410                                  
 37411                                  scp_default_drv:
 37412                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37413                                  	int	21h
 37414                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37415                                  
 37416                                  scp_setdrv:
 37417                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37418                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37419                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37420                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37421                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37422                                  
 37423                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37424                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37425                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37426                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37427                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37428                                  
 37429                                  scp_root_dir:
 37430                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37431                                  scp_path:
 37432                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37433                                  
 37434                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37435                                  scpath_exit:
 37436                                  
 37437                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37438                                  	push	es
 37439                                  	pop	ds
 37440                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37441                                  
 37442                                  	pop	si
 37443                                  	retn
 37444                                  
 37445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37446                                  
 37447                                  chk_drive_letter:
 37448                                  
 37449                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 37450                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 37451                                  ;carry set if not.
 37452                                  
 37453                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 37454                                  
 37455                                  	push	ax
 37456                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 37457                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 37458                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 37459                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 37460                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 37461                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 37462                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 37463                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 37464                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37465                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 37466                                  
 37467                                  cdletter_no:
 37468                                  	stc
 37469                                  cdletter_exit:
 37470                                  	pop	ax
 37471                                  	retn
 37472                                  
 37473                                  %endif

 37480                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 37481                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 37482

 37484 0000454A A4                      	movsb
 37485 0000454B 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?

 37551 00004588 BA[EC45]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 37552                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37553                                  	;call	open_file
 37554                                  ;of_retn:
 37555                                  	;retn
 37556                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37557                                  	;jmp	short open_file

 37560 0000458D F9                      	stc
 37561 0000458E CD21                    	int	21h
 37562                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 37563 00004590 C3                      	retn

 37575

 37577

 37580                                  
 37581 0000459D B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
